name: CAN 1:1
verse:
. MEENYA ngyiramá apem matow ndwom
Meyi mo Pomfò ayɛw,
Makamfo me Hen N'enyimnyam,
N'adom no konyimdzi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 1:2
verse:
. Mo Wùra dɔyɛfo, me Nyankopon,
Boa m' ma mombɔ dawur,
Memfa Wo dzin n'enyidzi no
Mentahye mbea nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 1:3
verse:
. Jesus! dzin a otu hen suro,
Ͻma ’werɛhow b՝ᴐ adze;
Ͻyɛ sanku wo abᴐn asom’,
Ͻyε nkwa nye asomdwee.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 1:4
verse:
. Ɔkasa, na wotsie Ne ndze a,
Ewufo nya nkwa bio,
Akoma wѐrɛhonyi dzi dɛw,
Hianyi bùrobùro gye dzi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 1:5
verse:
. Odwuruw bᴐn no tum koraa,
Otu daduanyi duam';
No bᴐgyaa tum san fifo ho,
Odzii nyim maa mo so.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 2:1
verse:
. NYIMPA a hom wᴐ wiadze nyina,
Hom mfa enyigye ndze ntow ndwom:
Hom mfa nyi Nyankopᴐn ayεw;
Hom mbra N'enyim hom mbedzi dεw.
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: CAN 2:2
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: CAN 2:3
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: CAN 2:4
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: CAN 3:1
verse:
. WI n‘ase a ɔno dze nyina
Mma Bɔfo n‘ N'ayɛyi mfow sor: 
	Hallejuia !

Gyirama biara ntow Pomfo n'
Ne dzin ho ndwom wo beebiara:
	Halleluja !
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 3:2
verse:
. Nyame, W’ehumbɔbɔr tsim daa;
Onnyiewiei nokwar dwir W'asɛm: 
	Hallelujah!

W‘ayɛyi bɛgyegye mbea nyina,
Kɛpem dɛ ewia nnkɔtɔ bio:
	Halleluia!
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 4:1
verse:
. DOMANKOMA ! Wo sor tsebea
Yɛ fɛw dɛ mbrɛ osɛ Nyame:
Ɔtra wimuwimu n'ekyir noho.
Mbrɛ nworaba wɔkɔ aprɔw.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 4:2
verse:
. Bɔfopanyin rotow W'Ndwom a.
N'enyim suma n'atsaban mu;
Ahotsewfo a woetwa ehyia.
Bom famu wɔ hɔ nyina som Wo.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 4:3
verse:
. Nyame, dɛtse na nso nyɛ dɛn?
Hɛn so yɛbɔsom hen Bɔfo:
Yefi bɔn na huntuma m'frɛ Wo
Kɛse, Kronkronyi, Abɔso.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 4:4
verse:
. Wɔatse Wo nka wɔ ekyirkyir,
Mbɔtoaba esua Wo dzin bɔ;
Na Wo nyansaa N'enyimnyam no
Ma hen adwen nyina tɔ sin.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 5:1
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: CAN 5:2
verse:
. Hom ntow No tum nye N'adom so ho ndwom:
N'atar nye ekan, No buw pretetee;
N'ebufuw tseaseanam hye senaman fua tum,
No kwan yɛ sum wɔ ehum atsaban do.
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: CAN 5:3
verse:
. Asaase nye N'anwanwadze a wɔnnka:
Otumfo! Wo tum bɔɔ adze fi tsetse;
Nam 'mom a wɔnndan n' da etsim no pintsinn,
Na edze epo abᴐ no ho abᴐmprᴐw.
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: CAN 5:4
verse:
. W'ayamúyie no gyirama hɛn botúm aká?
Ogú ahom wɛ wimú, ɔhyerɛn kan mu;
Ofi akoko do pem siansian sar mu,
Na ɔsɔw fénemfénem wɔ bɔw nye
nyankom mu.
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: CAN 5:5
verse:
. Huntuma m' mbá a yɛnnkye so yɛyɛ mbérɛw,
Hɛn wérɛ hyɛ Wo mu, W'ayamúyie
mmpada;
Mbrɛ W'adom dua gow a otsim hɔ dú ewiei,
Hɛn Bɔfo, hɛn Gyefo, Pomfo na Dɔfo!
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: CAN 5:6
verse:
. Tum a wonnsusu! Dɔ a onnyi kabea!
Mbér a abɔfo dzé enyigye tow ndwom no,
Abɔdzé adedafamú so nam hɛn mbérɛwyɛ m'
Bɔtonton Wo atow ndwom eyi W' ayaw!
				   Amen.
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: CAN 6:1
verse:
. O SƆR Ewuradze wɔ krɔnkrɔnyɛ fɛɛfɛw mu
Kotow N'enyim, bɔ N'enyimnyam dawur; 
Fa setsie mapa ɔnye mbrɛhoadze huanhuam,
Kotow huhor No, Ne dzin nye Ewuradze.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75

name: CAN 6:2
verse:
. Fa w'adwendwen adzesoa to N'ananadze, 
Ɔbɔsoa ama wo wɔ N'akoma mu,
Ɔbɛkyekye wo werɛ, na oetsie wo mpaabɔ, 
Na oegya w' taataa dɛ.mbrɛ oye ma w'.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75

name: CAN 6:3
verse:
. Mma nnsuro dɛ ebɛhɛn N'abangua do hɔ, 
Dɛ ahodze a ewɔ no suar ntsi:
Afɔrbɔdze a wɔdze gu N'afɔrmbukyia do 
Nye nokwar fɛɛfɛw na ɔdɔ mapa.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75

name: CAN 6:4
verse:
. Yinom, sɛ yɛdze ba suro na ahopopo m' mpo a, 
Ɔbɛgye wɔ dzin a ɔsorn bo no ntsi; 
Ɔbɛpepa hɛn nyinsu, ɔama yeedzi dɛw, 
Oetu hɛn suro, ɔarna hɛn awerɛhyɛm'.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75

name: CAN 6:5
verse:
. O sɔr Ewuradze wɔ krɔnkrɔnyɛ fɛɛfɛw mu!
Kotow N'enyim, bɔ N'enyimnyam dawur;
Fa setsie mapa ɔnye mbrɛhoadze huanhuam,
Kotow huhor No, Ne dzin nye Ewuradze.
Amen.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75

name: CAN 7:1
verse:
. HƐN akoma, nsa nye ndze
Yɛdze da nyame ase;
Ɔayɛ anwanwadze,
Wiadze dzi ho ehurusi;
Ofi hɛn na ne yamu,
Ɔdze dɔ akyɛ dze
Ehyira hɛen kwan nyina m',
Na ɔda ho yɛ hɛndze.
title: Martin Rinkart, 1586-1649

name: CAN 7:2
verse:
. Ɔkyɛso Nyankopɔn
Ɔnka hɛn ho daa nyina,
Ɔmfa ahotɔ krɔnn,
Ɔndom hɛn akoma daa,
Ɔnkora hɛn N'adom mu,
Ongya hɛn nkɔntɔnkye m',
Na ɔmpa hɛn mbusu,
Sesei na ndaamba so.
title: Martin Rinkart, 1586-1649

name: CAN 8:1
verse:
. Me kra, yi ɔsor hen ayɛw, 
Fa w' ayɛdze bra N' enyim;
Ɔapon wo, dze wo bɔn akyɛ w',
Woana mbɔ nyi No ayɛw?
Yi No ayɛw!
Yi bɛkyebo Hen ayɛw.
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: CAN 8:2
verse:
. Yi N' ayɛw, Nadom na enyimpa 
Hwɛɛ egyanom ahohiam';
Yi No ayɛw, ɔnnsakyer da,
Ɔka enyim nyaa, ohyira ntsɛm:
Yi No ayɛw!
Nyimnyamfo wɔ nokwardzim'.
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: CAN 8:3
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: CAN 9:1
verse:
. Wonyi Nyame Hen ayɛw! 
Wɔmfa ayɛyindwom mbrɛ N';
   N' ehumbɔbor tsim hɔ daa, 
   Osi pi yɛ nokwar daa.
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 9:2
verse:
. Wonyi N' ayɛw: ɔayὲ ewia, 
Dὲ ɔkɔ aprɔw daa daa nyina:
   N' ehumbɔbor tsim hɔ daa, 
   Osi pi yɛ nokwar daa.
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 9:3
verse:
. Na eso ɔayɛ bosoom, 
Ma odu anafua a ɔhyerɛn:
   N' ehumbɔbor tsim hɔ daa, 
   Osi pi yɛ nokwar daa.
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 9:4
verse:
. Wonhyira N' dὲ ɔtɔ nyankom, 
Ma ɔma edziban fifir:
   N' ehumbɔbor tsim hɔ daa, 
   Osi pi yɛ nokwar daa.
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 9:5
verse:
. Na ɔma asaase pa so 
Oyi no ndɔbaa ma hɛn:
   N' ehumbɔbor tsim hɔ daa, 
   Osi pi yɛ nokwar daa.
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 9:6
verse:
. Ɔama buber so aba, 
Ɔahyɛ hɛn asan mama:
   N' ehumbɔbor tsim hɔ daa, 
   Osi pi yɛ nokwar daa.
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 9:7
verse:
. Ɔama edziban a ɔsen dɛm, 
Daa daa dɛw ho ahobadze:
   N' ehumbɔbor tsim hɔ daa, 
   Osi pi yɛ nokwar daa.
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 9:8
verse:
. Enyimnyam nka, Hen dɔyɛfo 
Abɔdze nyina ntow enyimnyam,
      Enyimnyam nka Egya, nye Ba, 
      Nye Sunsum, Ebiasa Kor.   Amen.
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 10:1
verse:
. NYIMNYAN HEN, Asomdwee Hen,
Mobɔdɔ Wo;
Na dɔ no rommbɔ adze da,
Meserɛ Wo.
Ɔwo ama m' m'ebisadze,
Ɔwo etsie me;
Ɔwo hun mbrɛ mo bɔn tse,
Dze mo ho akyɛ m'.
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: CAN 10:2
verse:
. Medze me nyimdzee mapa
M'bɔtow Wo ndwom,
M'akoma m' ndzepa nyina
Medze bɛma W'.
Kaansa mo bɔn kaa m'tsiaa m' mpo a,
Esaan mo ho;
Wɔpraa ano guu mo do no,
Ɔwo 'tsiee me.
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: CAN 11:1
verse:
. Hɛn Nyame N' abɔdze nyina, 
Hom mma hom ndze do nye hɛn ntow
Alleluia, Alleluia!
Ewia hyeehyew, 'hyerɛn dɛ sika,
Bosoom nwinwin, 'tse dɛ dwetε,
      Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
      Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
title: St. Francis of Asissi. 1182-1226;

name: CAN 11:2
verse:
. M-frama a itu ehum dzendzen, 
Esuwusiw a esen wimu,
Yi N' ayɛw, Alleluia!
Bosoom, fa enyigye yi N' ayɛw,
N-woraba, hom mbɔ hom ndzem'
      Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
      Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
title: St. Francis of Asissi. 1182-1226;

name: CAN 11:3
verse:
. N-su krɔngyenn a erepem, 
Tow ndwom ma w' Ewuradze ntse,
Alleluia, Alleluia!
Ogya hurenhuren a eyɛ dzen,
'Wo a ema nyimpa hyew na kan,
     Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
     Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
title: St. Francis of Asissi. 1182-1226;

name: CAN 11:4
verse:
. Asaase pa a Nyame ama 
Daa daa iyi siar ma ne mba,
Yi N' ayɛw, Alleluia!
Wo mu nhyiren nye nduaba so,
Womfifir nkyerɛ N' enyimnyam, 
    Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
    Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
title: St. Francis of Asissi. 1182-1226;

name: CAN 11:5
verse:
. N-korɔfo a hom 'koma dwe nyina, 
Na hom dze bɔn kyɛ, hom so mbra,
Hom so ntow Alleluia!
Amandzehufo, 'werɛhofo,
Hom nyi N' ayɛw, mfa ne nyina nsoa N',
    Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
    Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
title: St. Francis of Asissi. 1182-1226;

name: CAN 11:6
verse:
. Ao, Owu, yamuyiefo a edwe, 
'Wo a itwa hɛn owu ngyam do,
Yi N' ayɛw, Alleluia!
'Wo na 'dze Nyame mba kɔ fie,
Hɛn Wura Christ faa wo kwan n' mu:
   Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
   Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
title: St. Francis of Asissi. 1182-1226;

name: CAN 12:1
verse:
. Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, Otumfo Nyankopɔn! 
Hɛn ndwom bɔfow edu Wo nkyɛn anapahema;
Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, mbɔbɔrhufo, tumfo,
Nyame Baasa Kor, Ɔkorsa siarfo!
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: CAN 12:2
verse:
. Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, ahotsewfo sɔr Wo, 
Wɔtow hɔn sika nhenkyɛw gu ahwehwɛ po n' ho;
Cherubim nye Seraphim twa hwe W' enyim ara,
'Wo a obi annyɛ Wo, na itsim hɔ daa.
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: CAN 12:3
verse:
. Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn; sɛ sum dze  Wo suma, 
Na dasanyi a omuo hu W' enyim a ɔnnyɛ mpo a
Wo nko na yɛ krɔnkrɔn, obi nnka Wo ho bio,
Wo tum, Wo dɔ, Wo krɔnkrɔnyɛ dzi mu!
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: CAN 12:4
verse:
. Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, Otumfo Nyankopɔn! 
W' edwinsa beyi Wo dzin ayɛw wɔ mbea nyina;
Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, mbɔbɔrhufo, tumfo,
Nyame Baasa Kor, Ɔkorsa siarfo!   Amen.
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: CAN 13:1
verse:
. Ɔsor Egya a Wo dɔ kɛse n'
Abɔ werdam ama hɛn kra,
Abɔn yɛkotow W' egua enyim;
Wo bɔnfakyɛ dɔ n' fa dom hɛn.
title: Edward Cooper, 1770-1833.

name: CAN 13:2
verse:
. Ba Tumfo, Asɛm a ɔbrae, 
Hɛn Nkɔnhyɛnyi, Sɔfo, Pomfo,
Abɔn yɛkotow W' egua enyim;
Wo nkwagye adom n', fa dom hɛn.
title: Edward Cooper, 1770-1833.

name: CAN 13:3
verse:
. Sunsum Bɛkyebo a W' ahom ma 
Wɔgye kra fi bɔn nsa na wum',
Abɔn yɛkotow W' egua enyim;
Wo nkwahwea tum no, fa dom hɛn.
title: Edward Cooper, 1770-1833.

name: CAN 13:4
title: Edward Cooper, 1770-1833.

name: CAN 14:1
verse:
. Ewuradze nye mo Guanhwɛfo, 
Biribiara nnkehia m';
Ɔma meda mfunoma mu,
Ogya m' kɔ nsutaae ho.
title: William Whittingham, 1524-79 ; Francis Rous, 1579-1659.

name: CAN 14:2
verse:
. Ɔdze me kra san ba nkwam' bio, 
Na ɔma menantsew
Ne ndzeyɛtsenenee kwan no mu,
Wɔ Noara Ne dzin ntsi.
title: William Whittingham, 1524-79 ; Francis Rous, 1579-1659.

name: CAN 14:3
verse:
. Nyew, sɛ menam wu bɔnsam' a, 
Munnsuro mbusu biara;
Osiandɛ 'nye m' nam, Wo poma
Na W' abaw hyɛ me dzen.
title: William Whittingham, 1524-79 ; Francis Rous, 1579-1659.

name: CAN 14:4
title: William Whittingham, 1524-79 ; Francis Rous, 1579-1659.

name: CAN 15:1
verse:
. Hwɛ, bɔw mpѐtsema hyɛnhyɛnn
Sosɔ nhaban do;
Ber, a wɔrehyѐrɛn, wɔkyѐrɛ
Dɛ, Nyame ye daa.
title: R.A.Ferguson.

name: CAN 15:2
verse:
. Hwɛ ''napa wi nsѐrɛmɛn,
Ͻsesa kwaa mu,
Dzinn, naaso wɔrekã
''Dɛ, Nyame ye daa.
title: R.A.Ferguson.

name: CAN 15:3
verse:
. Tsie koko n'' woraba,
No nko da hɔ no,
Eminim à ɔrobɔ n' kã
Dɛ, Nyame ye daa.
title: R.A.Ferguson.

name: CAN 15:4
verse:
. Dua no sor nhaban mu,
Mbrɛ suro bi nnyi n',
Nnoma rotow ndwom kyѐrɛ
Dɛ, Nyame ye daa.
title: R.A.Ferguson.

name: CAN 16:1
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80

name: CAN 16:2
verse:
. Ayɛyi nka Ewuradze a otu w' edwuma 
    mpon, weɔn wo,
Ampaara Ne yie nye N' adom ka wo do daa wɔ ha:
Dwen ho bio hwɛ
Dza Otumfo No tum yɛ,
Sɛ ɔdze No dɔ fa w' nyɛnko a.
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80

name: CAN 16:3
verse:
. Ayɛyi nka Ewuradze, ɔno a ehumtuber no mu, 
Ɔno na ber a abɔdze nyina etwa ayer wo no,
Ɔma wogyaa,
Begyabegyayɛ taa dzinn,
Ɔma ehum na po yɛ komm n'.
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80

name: CAN 16:4
verse:
. Ayɛyi nka Ewuradze, ɔno a ber a bɔn na sum agye, 
Ɔno na abosonsɔrfo dzi nyim mmbu papayɛ bi a
Ne kan hyerɛn,
Pam sum mu ewurkadze,
N' adom bɔ esiarfo ho ban.
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80

name: CAN 17:1
verse:
. Oyi nye Nyame a yɛsɔr No n', 
Hɛn Dɔfo pa a ɔnnsakyer da n',
No dɔ so dɛ No tum kɛse n',
Onnyi mbanano, nnyi ewiei.
title: Joseph Hart, 1712-68.

name: CAN 18:1
verse:
. Me Nyame, mbrɛ 'dua yɛ nwanwa a 
W' ahentum ne hyerɛn a!
Wo mbɔbɔrhu egua n' ne fɛw a
Wɔ kan a ɔhyerɛn mu!
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: CAN 18:2
verse:
. Wo mfe a ɔmmbɔ adze n' no hu a, 
Domankoma Ewuradze,
Esunsum wotwa hwe W' enyim
Tonton Wo daa nyina.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: CAN 18:3
verse:
. Mbrɛ odua yɛ fɛw, yɛ fɛw a, 
Dɛ yebohu W' enyim
Wo nyansaa bun n', Wo tum kɛse n'
Nyame W' ahotsew nwanwa.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: CAN 18:4
verse:
. Ao Nyame, mbrɛ misi suro Wo a, 
Suro a no mu dɔ,
Na medze ahopopo enyidar,
Nnuhu nyinsu som Wo!
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: CAN 18:5
verse:
. Ma mo so maadɔ W', Ewuradze, 
Ɔwo a 'yɛ Tumfo yi,
Abɔ Wo mu adze ebisa
M' akoma brɛfo no dɔ.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: CAN 18:6
verse:
. Egya bi nnyɛ dɔ dɛ Ɔwo; 
Na bi nndwe dɛ Ɔwo,
Wonnyi abotar dɛ mbrɛ ewɔ n'
Emi babɔn yi ho.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: CAN 19:1
verse:
. Ɔdɔ Hen nye mo Guanhwɛfo, 
N' ayamuyie mmpa ara da;
Meyɛ Nedze ma ɔyɛ medze aba,
Mirinnhia hweeara da.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 19:2
verse:
. Mbrɛ nkwa esutsen fi pem no, 
Hɔ na ogya me kra kɔ,
Ɔdze sor edziban nyɛn me
Wɔ mbrɛ m-funoma wɔ no.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 19:3
verse:
. M-ber pii na mikyiin bɔn mu, 
Na ɔdze dɔ hwehwɛɛ me;
Ɔdze me too Ne batsir do
Dze me baa fie edɛw mu.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 19:4
verse:
. Owu bɔnsam' munnsuro mbusu, 
Ber a, mo Wura, ebɛn me;
W' abaw na Wo poma hyɛ m' dzen,
Na Woara idzi m' enyim.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 19:5
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 20:1
verse:
. Minsi dɛn mondɔ me Nyame, 
Minsi dɛn nyi N' ayɛw?
Minsi dɛn nhu N' adom no war,
Ne trɛ, no krɔn, no bun?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 20:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 20:3
verse:
. Odu wiadze tɛtɛr nyina, 
Ne trɛ nnyi mbanano;
Ɔtrɛ ma onngya baako mpo,
N-kyɛ ɔpaa mo ho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 20:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 20:5
verse:
. Sor abɔfo bɛn botum akyerɛ 
Wo nkwagye dɔ n' no bun?
W' akyɛdze a onnyi kabea yi,
Ao, ma monsɔ monhwɛ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 21:1
verse:
. Enyimnyam nye ntonton nka 
Wo, hɛn Hen Agyenkwa,
Ɔwo a mbofra ndze dɛɛdɛw,
Toow Hosanna maa Wo!
title: Theodulf of Orleans, c. 750-821;

name: CAN 21:2
verse:
. Ɔwo nye Israel Hen, 
Ɔhen David ne Ba a
Enam Ewuradze dzin mu
Reba dɛ hɛn siar Hen.
	Enyimnyam nye¬—
title: Theodulf of Orleans, c. 750-821;

name: CAN 21:3
verse:
. Abɔfo dɔm nyinara 
Kamfo Wo Nyame manm':
Nyimpa nye abɔdze nyina
Bɔ ose gye hɔn do.
	Enyimnyam nye¬—
title: Theodulf of Orleans, c. 750-821;

name: CAN 21:4
verse:
. Hebrewman mu nkorɔfo dze 
Mberɛnkɔnson huaa Wo;
Hɛn so yɛdze ayɛyi
Nye mpaabɔ ba W' enyim.
	Enyimnyam nye¬—
title: Theodulf of Orleans, c. 750-821;

name: CAN 21:5
verse:
. Irikehyia mbusu no, 
Wɔtoow ndwom yii W' ayɛw;
N- dɛ a wɔakrɔn Wo sor yi,
Hɛn so yehuhor Wo.
	Enyimnyam nye¬—
title: Theodulf of Orleans, c. 750-821;

name: CAN 21:6
verse:
.  Egyee Jewfo ayɛyi; 
Gye hɛn so hɛn mpaabɔ,
Ɔhen dɔyɛfo, yamuyiefo a
Ndzepa nyina yɛ W' fɛw. 
 	Enyimnyam nye¬—
title: Theodulf of Orleans, c. 750-821;

name: CAN 22:1
title: Edward Perronet, 1726-92;

name: CAN 22:2
verse:
. 'Sɛmpa n' ho atɔfo, hom nhua N' 
Wɔ N' afɔrmbukyia n' do;
Hom nhua nyia hom tsia N' anamɔnm'
Na hom nhyɛ N' abɔso Hen.
title: Edward Perronet, 1726-92;

name: CAN 22:3
verse:
. Israel mbasantsen, hom a 
Woeyi hom asehwem',
Hom nhua nyia ɔdze N' adom gye hom n',
Na hom nhyɛ N' abɔso Hen.
title: Edward Perronet, 1726-92;

name: CAN 22:4
verse:
. Bɔnyɛfo, mma hom werɛ mmfir 
Bɔwen na bɔwema n';
Hom mfa hom asadze nkɔ nkɛma N',
Na hom nhyɛ N' abɔso Hen.
title: Edward Perronet, 1726-92;

name: CAN 22:5
verse:
. Ebusua na ngyirama nyina, 
Wontwa nhwehwe N' enyim;
Na hɔn nyina wɔntow ndwom nhua
Nyia wɔahyɛ N' abɔso Hen.
title: Edward Perronet, 1726-92;

name: CAN 23:1
verse:
. Jesus dzin bɔ adze nyina do, 
Wɔ hɛll, nye ase, nye sor,
Abɔfo na nyimpa kotow n',
Na mbɔnsam fi enyim guan.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 23:2
verse:
. Jesus! dzin a ɔyɛ abɔn dɛw, 
Dzin a wɔdze akyɛ abɔn;
Ɔhotse hɔn suro nyina,
Na ɔdan hɔn hɛll yɛ heaven.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 23:3
verse:
. Jesus! otu adaduafo apo, 
Otsia abɔnsam tsir do;
Ɔdze tum hyɛ nyia onnyi ahom,
Na ɔma ewufo nkwa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 23:4
verse:
. Ao, nkyɛ N' adom ahonya no 
Wiadze nyina aasɔ ahwɛ!
N-kyɛ No dɔ abaw n' bofua
Adasamba nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 23:5
verse:
. Ne tsenenee na No nkwagye 
Na mobɔ no dawur,
M' edwuma nye dɛ mekam' dɛ,
Wɔnhwɛ Eguambaa no!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 24:1
verse:
. Eguambaa bi, nkwagye dzin bi, 
Enyidar bi nnyi sor anaa ase,
Fɔdzi nye fɛr ho guansumabew bi nnyi,
Dɛ Wo nkotoo.
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: CAN 24:2
verse:
. Me gyedzi suar, m' enyidar suar, 
M' akoma ne hia nye no mbusu nko
Na ɔbɔ mu dɛ senaman wɔ mo mu
Kekam' frɛ Wo.
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: CAN 25:1
verse:
. Mbrɛ Jesus ne dzin dua yɛ dɛw 
Wɔ gyedzinyi asom' a!
Otu ne ya, yɛ ne yar edur,
Na otu no suro nyina.
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: CAN 25:2
verse:
. Ɔbɔ sunsum a oepira esu, 
Na ɔdwe akoma a ɔahaw,
Edziban ma sunsum a kɔm dze n',
Ahomgye ma fonafo.
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: CAN 25:3
verse:
. Dzin pa! Botan a motow do, 
Me kyɛm na mo sumabew,
M' egyapadze a ɔmmpa da,
Adom na ɔahyɛ n' ma!
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: CAN 25:4
verse:
. Jesus, mo Guanhwɛfo, mo Nua 
Mo Sɔfoe na me Hen,
Mo Wura , mo Nkwa, mo Kwan, m' Ewiei,
Bra bɛgye m' ayɛyi.
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: CAN 25:5
verse:
. Mo mbɔdzembɔ ɔyɛ mberɛw, 
M' akoma yɛ wɔɔwɔw;
Na ber a m' bohu W' dɛ mbrɛ Ɔwo tse n',
M' beyi W' ayɛw dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ.
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: CAN 26:1
verse:
. Pomfo kɛse, Nyame Eguambaa, 
Yɛdɔ Wo ho n-sɛm;
Ndwom biara nnyi hɔ a ɔyɛ dɛw
Dɛ Wo dzin nwanwa no.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: CAN 26:2
verse:
. Ber a yɛwɔ wiadze mu yi, 
Jesus nye hɛn nkɔmbɔ:
Na ndzɛmba nyina so sɛɛ a
Jesus bɛyɛ hɛ ndwom.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: CAN 27:1
verse:
. Jesus, Wo ho adwen nko mpo 
Dze dɛw hyɛ mo mu ma;
Na meba m' bohu W' enyim dze a,
Edɛw no bɔbor do.
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-1153.

name: CAN 27:2
verse:
. O adasa hɛn Agyenkwa, 
Dzin biara nnto Wodze a
Yɛdze enyigye bɔtow ho ndwom,
Na yɛadwen ho dɔ mu.
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-1153.

name: CAN 27:3
verse:
. O 'koma bobɔe n' Enyidar, 
Abrɛfo Enyigye,
Iye ma asehwefo na
Hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ Wo.
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-1153.

name: CAN 27:4
verse:
. Na hɔn a wohu Wo nka dɛn? 
Wonnhu dza wɔnka mpo:
Hɔn a wɔtse Wo dɔ nko ara
Na wonyim ne dɛw no.
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-1153.

name: CAN 28:1
verse:
. Jesus, 'koma dɔyɛfo hɔn Dɛw, 
Adasa Kan, nkwa Nsunyiwa,
Wiadze mu ndzepa nntum mmee hɛn,
Yɛdze kɔm yɛdan ba Wo hɔ.
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-1153.

name: CAN 28:2
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-1153.

name: CAN 28:3
verse:
. Yɛsɔ Wo hwɛ, n-kwa Edziban, 
Na hɛn kɔn dɔ yeedzi bi daa;
Yɛnom Wo, n-kwa Esutsen,
Na hɛn kra pɛ ma wɔaahyɛ n' ma.
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-1153.

name: CAN 28:4
verse:
. Hɛn sunsum haahaa hwehwɛ Wo, 
Mbrɛ ɔbra dze hɛn si biara,
Eyaa W' ano hɛn enyi gye,
Yesuo Wom' a siar aka hɛn.
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-1153.

name: CAN 29:1
verse:
. Jesus, me kra no Dɔfo, 
Ma munguan mbɛhyɛ Wo bom',
Ber a esu no repem yi,
Ber a ehum no rutu yi,
Me Gyefo, fa me hunta,
Ma ehum no mbɔ mbɛsen;
Gya me kodu berano,
Ao, ewiei no gye me kra.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 29:2
verse:
. Minnyi sumabew biara, 
Me kra twer Wo nkotonoo;
Mma nndan mo nkotonoo nngya,
Suo mo mu, kyekye mo werɛ:
Mo werɛ gyina Wo do,
Mo mboa nyina fir wo hɔ;
Fa W' atsaban kɛse no
Kata m' etsikwa yi do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 29:3
verse:
. Christ, morohwehwɛ Wo nko, 
Minya W' a menya adze nyina,
Ma mo do si, hyɛ me dzen,
Yɛ m' edur na gye me nkwa:
'Wo na eyɛ tseneneenyi,
'Midze, meyɛ brakyewnyi;
Bɔn na ahyɛ emi ma,
Adom ahyɛ wo so ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 30:1
verse:
. Jesus, hɛn Guanhwɛfo,
Pepa hɛn nyinsuwa;
Sɛ yɛda no bom' a,
Yennsuro biribiara.
Wɔmma yɛnka No do
Mbrɛ ɔbɛkyerɛ biara,
Yɛnka no do sar do na
"Saase pa do
title: Unknown

name: CAN 30:2
verse:
. Jesus, hɛn Guanhwɛfo,
Ne ndze yɛ hɛn dɛw;
Ɔwasa kakra ara a
Nna hɛn enyim mpo a,
Ne ndze n' odo wɔm';
Yɛmmpɛ kwankyerɛfo biara
Dɛ No nkotoo.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 30:3
verse:
. Jesus, hɛn Guanhwɛfo,
No nguan ntsi owui;
No bɔgyaa enuma
No nguambaa nyina.
Ɔwo dza odze hyɛ
Hɔn mu biara nsew,
Hɔn a woyɛ Nedze no
Wɔ no Sunsum.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 30:4
verse:
. Jesus, hɛn Guanhwɛfo,
N'abaw weɔn hɛn daa;
Ngyata kyin hɛn ho mpo a,
Hɔn nsa nnkaka hɛn.
Owu bɔnsa mu hɔ,
Sum huhu hyɛ mpo a,
Yennsuro mbusu biara
Yɛka wu hyɛ.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 31:1
verse:
. MBRƐ mudua dɔ Jesus,
Osiandɛ odzii kan dɔɔ m'.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 31:2
verse:
. Mo werɛ nnkefir N' da,
Ɔno owui maa me.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 31:3
verse:
. Metse mema Jesus:
Ɔdze No nkwa maa me.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 31:4
verse:
. Jesus siarfo, kὸra me:
Motwer Wo dzin nkotoo.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 31:5
verse:
. Ao, Jesus, m' bɔdɔ Wo:
M' bɔdɔ W' akɔ owum'.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 32:1
verse:
. Tsie! abɔfo ruhua dɛ 
Wɔawo hɛn Hen nyimnyamfo n',
Asaase wɔ asomdwee,
Nyame na abɔn abɔm'.
Aman nyina, hom mfa dɛw
Nye sor abɔfo ntseatseam'
Hom nye hɔn mbɔm mpaa mu dɛ,
Wɔawo Christ wɔ Bethlehem.
Tsie! abɔfo ruhua dɛ 
Wɔawo hɛn Hen nyimnyamfo n',
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 32:2
verse:
. Christ a sorsor tonton No, 
Ɔdomankoma Ewuradze n',
Hwɛ N', ɔkyɛree mpo a ɔaba.
Ɔbaabun wotoam' ɔba!
Hwɛ, Nyame hyɛ nyimpadua!
Nyame a wɔayɛ N' onyimpa!
Ɔpɛ dɛ ɔnye nyimpa tsena,
Jesus, hɛn Immanuel.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 33:1
verse:
. Agyedzifo, hom mbra 
Dɛw na konyimdzi mu,
Hom mbra, O hom nyina mbra Bethlehem;
Hom mbra mbɔhwɛ dɛ
Wɔawo abɔfo Hen:
O hom mbra mma yɛntonton Ewuradze Christ.
title: Anonymous, 17th or 18th cent.

name: CAN 33:2
title: Anonymous, 17th or 18th cent.

name: CAN 33:3
verse:
. Abɔfo, hom ntow 
Ndwom ehurusi mu,
Sor ahemfiemba nyina ntow ndwom
Dɛ, Enyimnyam nyina
Nka Nyame wɔ sorsor:
O hom mbra mma yɛntonton Ewuradze Christ.
title: Anonymous, 17th or 18th cent.

name: CAN 34:1
title: John Byrom, 1691-1763.

name: CAN 34:2
verse:
. N-guanhwɛfo a wɔroweɔn hɔn nguan no 
Tsee bɔfo huafo ne ndze dɛ ɔse:
Hwɛ, medze Agyenkwa N' awoo ho nsɛm
Bɔ hom na wiadze nyina amandzɛɛ;
N-dɛ Nyame apon N' anohoba,
Wɔawo Ewuradze Christ, hɛn Agyenkwa.
title: John Byrom, 1691-1763.

name: CAN 34:3
verse:
. Owiee kasaa n', nna sor adwontofo 
Dze enyigye toow ndwom fofor koraa,
Wɔkamfoo Nyame dɔ a ɔropon hɛn,
Na Alleluia gyigyee wim' nyina;
Hɔn ndwom nye dɛ, Enyimnyam nka Nyame,
Asomdwee na enyisɔ mbra nyimpam'.
title: John Byrom, 1691-1763.

name: CAN 34:4
verse:
. Hɔ ara na nguanhwɛfo n', kɔr Bethlehem 
Kɔhwɛɛ dza Nyame ayɛ ama adasa:
Wɔdze enyigye saan kɔhwɛɛ hɔn nguan,
Dɛ wɔda ho riyi Nyame ayɛw,
Yinom nye asomafo a wodzii kan
Wɔbɔɔ Abofra no ho nsɛm dawur.
title: John Byrom, 1691-1763.

name: CAN 34:5
verse:
. N-kyɛ  yaakaa Nyame N' anwanwa dɔ a 
Ogyaa N' ma ɔregye adasa nkwa;
Abofra a ɔama yeenya hɛn siar yi,
Yɛnhwɛ N' mbowadan mu nkɔ mbeamudua n' do:
Ɔmboa hɛn ma yentsia N' anamɔn mu
Nkodu adasa hɛn sor sibea hɔ.
title: John Byrom, 1691-1763.

name: CAN 35:1
verse:
. Adzekyee mba nyinara mu dansewa, 
Pa hɛn isum na fa wo mboa brɛ hɛn;
Boka nworaba a epue ma wim' atsew wann,
Gya hɛn kɔ mbrɛ wɔawo Gyefo ama hɛn.
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: CAN 35:2
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: CAN 35:3
verse:
. Aso ampa dɛ hɛn so yɛbɛkyɛ No 
Edom nduhuam na asomfo akyɛdze,
Mbepɔw do mbobaa, po do nankyenema,
Kwaa mu wandze, daadzetsirmu sika?
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: CAN 35:4
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: CAN 36:1
verse:
. Hwɛ, wɔawo Nyame Eguambaa a 
Wɔdze N' bɔɔ anohoba n',
Oesian aba asaase
Rebɛkyerɛ hɛn ɔsor kwan. 

      Ao, hɛn siar da, aba yie! 
      Hwɛ hɛn nkwahosan aba! 
      Tow ndwom twa Jerusalem: 
      Wɔawo Christ wɔ Bethlehem!
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.

name: CAN 36:2
verse:
. Hwɛ, nyia ɔtse ahengua do 
Wɔ sorsor abɔfo ntam'
Nyia ɔyɛɛ wim' nworaba n',
Da mbowa dzidzidaka mu.
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.

name: CAN 36:3
verse:
. Hom n-guanhwɛfo krɔnkrɔn, 
Hom dze asɛmpa bɛn nam?
Wɔyɛ n' dɛn na hom egya
Hom nguan wɔ haban mu yi?
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.

name: CAN 36:4
verse:
. Esuom a yɛroweɔn no, 
Hwɛ, yehun kan nwanwa bi:
Abɔfo dze adwontow
Kaa dɛ wɔawo Agyenkwa n'.
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.

name: CAN 36:5
verse:
. O Akɔkowaba krɔnkrɔn, 
Wo dɔ yɛ nwanwa dodow!
Dɔ a ogyaa W' ma ifii sor
Baa wiadze a ɔtse dɛm yim'.
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.

name: CAN 37:1
verse:
. Anago bi na nguanhwɛfo 
Tsena fam' roweɔn hɔn nguan,
Ewuradze bɔfo fi sor bae,
Na kan hyerɛɛn hɔ nyina.
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.

name: CAN 37:2
verse:
. Ihu kɛse kaa hɔn n-tsi 
Ɔsee dɛ, Mma hom nnsuro:
Mebrɛ hom na adasa nyina
Asɛmpa a ɔyɛ dɛw.
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.

name: CAN 37:3
verse:
. Wɔawo Agyenkwa ama hom 
Wɔ David ahenkurowm',
Wɔawo Ewuradze Christ n-dɛ;
Yi na hom dze bohu N':
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.

name: CAN 37:4
verse:
. Hom bohu dɛ Akɔkowaba n' 
Da mbowa dzidzidakam',
Hom bohu No nantwibuw mu,
Dɛ tam kyekye No ho.
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.

name: CAN 37:5
verse:
. Nyame bɔfo n' wiee dɛm ka ara, 
Na sor dɔm pii bae a
Wɔdze ndwom yii Nyame ayɛw
Enyigye mu see dɛ:
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.

name: CAN 38:1
verse:
. Ɔsor dɔ no ɔkrɔn dodow, 
Nyame Baatan N' ayamuhyehye;
Ɔdze Agyenkwa fi sor bae,
Ɔmaa da pa n' hyerɛɛn hɛn do,
Na tsenenee ewia no puei,
Bɛtseew hɛn sum wiadze enyi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 38:2
verse:
. Nyame daa edzi wɔ Christ mu, 
Dze Ne kan abɛpam hɛn sum,
Etu hɛn bɔn na enyifura,
Dze hɛn nan esi kwan pa mu;
Na hɛn akra a woenya fakyɛ,
Akɔ daa ahomgye man no '.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 38:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 39:1
verse:
. Adom nwanwa, wɔawo N'
ampa!
Nyame Akyewa ɔabra nyimpa!
Ɔhen Jesus, Siar Enyidar,
Ɔasoa wiadze nkukunkakar.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 39:2
verse:
. Nwanwa bɛn na metse n' wim'
yi?
Enyimnyam wo sor ma Nyame,
Asomdwee wɔ asaase do,
Enyisɔ wɔ adasa mu.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 39:3
verse:
. Ao o! hom ntsie ahobowsɛm,
Nwanwa esi wo Bethlehem:
Ɔsor-asaase Twerammpon,
Wɔayɛ N' ɔbɔn ama abɔn.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 39:4
verse:
. Abɔso Hen esian nyimpam',
N'adae nye mbowa
dzidzidakam',
Mbersantsen do a otra nhum,
Oeku Tamfo, ɔasɛɛ no tum.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 39:5
verse:
. Yɔkaa Wo mbae, Nyame Ba
Christ;
'Wo na abɔpon Paradise.
Akra nyina bɔ se kamfo:
Enyimnyam nka Gyefo siarfo.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 40:1
verse:
. Igyaa W' ahengua 
Na W' ahenkyɛw so,
Ber a 'baa wiadze wɔ me ntsi n';
Na woennya kwan wɔ
Bethlehem fie hɔ,
Amma Wo wiadze ha ne mbae:
Ao, bra m' akomam', Ewuradze,
Ɔkwan wɔ m' akomam' ma Wo.
title: Emily Elizabeth Steele Elliott, 1836-97.

name: CAN 40:2
verse:
. Sor nyina gyigyee 
Ber a abɔfo toow ndwom
Bɔɔ W' adehye dzin no dawur n';
Na mbrɛadzem' ara
Na, Ɔsor Wura,
Ebaa asaase do ha:
Ao, bra m' akomam', Ewuradze,
Ɔkwan wɔ m' akomam' ma Wo.
title: Emily Elizabeth Steele Elliott, 1836-97.

name: CAN 40:3
verse:
. N-sɔ wɔ etu, 
Na nnoma berɛbuw,
Wɔ nkyindur no nwin ase;
Na Wo mpa nye dɛtse,
O Nyankopɔn Ba,
Dɛtse, wɔ Galilee sar do;
Ao, bra m' akomam', Ewuradze,
Ɔkwan wɔ m' akomam' ma Wo.
title: Emily Elizabeth Steele Elliott, 1836-97.

name: CAN 40:4
verse:
. Ao, Ewuradze, 
'Dze nkasɛm no bae,
Dza nkyɛ ɔbɛma fahodzi;
Na wɔdze atwetwesi
Na nsoɛ katraka
Wosunsum Wo kɔr Calvary:
Ao, bra m' akomam', Ewuradze,
Ɔkwan wɔ m' akomam' ma Wo.
title: Emily Elizabeth Steele Elliott, 1836-97.

name: CAN 41:1
verse:
. Woana na n-guanhwɛfo 
Kotow No mbowadan mu hɔ n'?

         Ewuradze a! O anwanwasɛm! 
         Ewuradze a, Enyimnyam Hen n' a. 
         Yetwa hwe N' ananadze; 
         O wɔnhyɛ No abɔso Hen.
title: Benjamin Russell Hanby, 1833-67.

name: CAN 41:2
verse:
. Woana na oridzi edwin 
Wɔ dan kakraba mu hɔ n'?
title: Benjamin Russell Hanby, 1833-67.

name: CAN 41:3
verse:
. Woana na ɔrekyen kɔm, 
Ɔreper wɔ sar do hɔ n'?
title: Benjamin Russell Hanby, 1833-67.

name: CAN 41:4
verse:
.	Woana na orusu wɔ 
Lazarus ne nda do hɔ n'?
title: Benjamin Russell Hanby, 1833-67.

name: CAN 41:5
verse:
. Woana na ɔrobɔ mpaa 
Esuom wɔ Gethsamane n'?
title: Benjamin Russell Hanby, 1833-67.

name: CAN 41:6
verse:
. Woana na ɔserɛ nhyira 
Ma abɔn wɔ Calvary do n'?
title: Benjamin Russell Hanby, 1833-67.

name: CAN 41:7
verse:
. Woana na oefi ewufom' 
Roboa hɛn, regye hɛn nkwa n'?
title: Benjamin Russell Hanby, 1833-67.

name: CAN 42:1
verse:
. Na nyimpa a wɔayɛ petsee yi, 
Wɔnam ɔhyew do yi, ase ɛ?
Ebɛn nye adzekyee ehyia yi?
Wentwiwenti 'i ase nye dɛn?
Okuw n' sii ndze adze buaa dɛ,
Narazeth Jesus na ɔresen n'.
title: Etta Campbell, c. 1863.

name: CAN 42:2
verse:
. Jesus nye woana? Ɔyɛ dɛn 
Na ɔbɔ kurow ebutuw dɛm?
Ɔkwantsennyi a ɔresen,
Ɔdze bɛn twe nyimpa pii yi?
Awɔse ndze no buaa bio dɛ,
Narazeth Jesus na ɔresen n'.
title: Etta Campbell, c. 1863.

name: CAN 42:3
verse:
. Jesus! 'No na ɔbaa wiadze 
Boduaa mbusu kwan yi mu bi n';
Wɔdze ayarfo nyina brɛɛ No,
Etsitsifo ɔnye mpakye:
'Nyifurafo dze dɛw tsiee ntseamu n':
Narazeth Jesus na ɔresen n'.
title: Etta Campbell, c. 1863.

name: CAN 42:4
verse:
. Ɔreba bio, fi ha kɔ ha, 
Yɛtse N' anamɔn wɔ mbeambea,
Oegyina hɛn abobowano,
Ɔahɛn dɛ ɔrobɔsoɛ hɔ;
Ana hɛn so yɛnnkɛpaam' dɛ,
Narazeth Jesus na ɔresen n'.
title: Etta Campbell, c. 1863.

name: CAN 43:1
verse:
. Metsee dɛ Jesus ne ndze se: 
Bra Mo hɔ na bɔhom;
Ɔwo a aberɛ fa wo tsir,
Bɔto Mara Mo bom'!
Mokɔree dɛ mbrɛ metse ara,
Maberɛ, Mo werɛ ahow;
Minyaa ahomgye wɔ No mu,
Na ɔmaa m' enyigye.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 43:2
verse:
. Metsee dɛ Jesus ne ndze se: 
Ɔwo a sukɔm dze wo,
Hwɛ, mema n-kwa nsu no kwa,
Bɔ wo mu adze nom bi!
Mebaa Jesus hɔ mobɔnoom
N-kwa esutsen n' bi;
Mo nsukɔm gyaae, me kra nyaa nkwa,
Na afei metse No mu.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 44:1
verse:
. Ɔwo a wɔpemee betsiee Wo, 
Wotsiee Wo nsɛm, wɔtsee Wo tum;
Ma abɔn kwan ma yɛmbɛn Wo,
Na gye hɛn adom mu ara.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 44:2
verse:
. Ɔwoara na aka dɛ, 
Primprimfo nnhia oduyɛfo;
Emi meyar, mihia Wo mboa,
Mihia Wo tum a ɔgye nkwa n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 44:3
verse:
. Wo tum, nokwar na nyamedɔ, 
Tsim hɔ mbersantsen mfesantsen;
W' asɛm, W' adom asɛm kor mpo,
Otu yarba dzendzen biara.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 44:4
verse:
. Kaansa makyɛr esu yi bo, 
Ma mo sunsum nntum nnka noho a,
W' ano kasa bɛma masoɛr,
Ɔbɔbɔ  m' esu ntsɛmara.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 45:1
verse:
. Jesus frɛ hɛn! Sɛ hɛn bra po 
Wor mpo a, yɛtse Ne ndze,
Ne ndze dɛɛdɛw n' gyigye daa daa,
Ɔse: Christian, ka Mo do.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 45:2
verse:
. Tsetseber do asomafo n' 
Tsee wɔ Galilee po do n',
Wogyaa ebusua, fie nye edwuma,
Kɛkaa' No a wɔdɔ No n' do.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 45:3
verse:
. Jesus frɛ hɛn mma yɛnnsom 
Wiadze mu ndzɛmba huhuw;
Ɔhwɛ ndzɛmba a wɔsom hɛn bo a,
Ɔse: Christian, dɔ M' kyɛn hɔn.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 45:4
verse:
. Enyigye nye awerɛhow mu, 
Dwumadzim' nye ahomgyem',
Ɔda ho frɛ hɛn dɛ yɛndɔ N'
Ma ɔkyɛn adze nyina.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 46:1
verse:
. Ka 'sɛm dadaw no kyerɛ me, 
Sunsum ndzɛmbam' asɛm,
Dza ɔfa Christ N' enyimnyam ho
Dza ɔfa No dɔ so ho.
Ka 'sɛm no pefee kyerɛ m' dɛ
Ereka kyerɛ abofra;
Na meyɛ mberɛw na mafona,
Minnyi ahom, mo ho fi.
Ka 'sɛm dadaw no kyerɛ me, 
Jesus no dɔ ho asɛm.
title: Katherine Hankey, 1834-1911.

name: CAN 46:2
verse:
. Tɔ w' bo ka 'sɛm no kyerɛ me, 
Na meetum medze esie-
Nyame No werdam kɛse a
Ɔdze yɛ bɔn edur.
Si do mber pii ka kyerɛ m'
Na meyar awerɛfir;
Ahanamakye bɔsu
Ewia fir a ɔpa.
title: Katherine Hankey, 1834-1911.

name: CAN 46:3
verse:
. Ka 'sɛm no bɔkɔɔ kyerɛ me, 
Nwinwin mu dɛ ehiasɛm,
Kaa dɛ meyɛ bɔnyɛnyi a
Jesus bɛpeer mo nkwa,
Ka 'sɛm no mber nyinara,
Sɛ epɛ ampaara
Dɛ ema m' akomatɔm'
Wɔ ahokyer ber biaram'.
title: Katherine Hankey, 1834-1911.

name: CAN 47:1
verse:
. Idzii mbuada adaduanan 
Adzekyee nye adzesaa,
Adaduanan wɔ sar no do
Wɔsɔɔ Wo hwɛe na annyɛ bɔn.
title: George Hunt Smyttan, 1822-70.

name: CAN 47:2
verse:
. Ewia sii Wo do adzekyee, 
Bɔw tɔɔ Wo do anago,
Mbowa abɔyafo paar wo ho,
Edaa fam', isum ɔbo.
title: George Hunt Smyttan, 1822-70.

name: CAN 47:3
verse:
. Ma yɛnsɔw Wo bene no bi, 
Yɛmpow wiadze edzifodze;
Na yɛnye Wo nweɔn mpaabɔm',
Nye Wo nsɔw yaw ahoɔdzenm'.
title: George Hunt Smyttan, 1822-70.

name: CAN 47:4
verse:
. Sɛ abɔnsam dze ebufuw 
Toa honam anaa sunsum,
'Wo a edzi no do nyim pɛn,
Dom hɛn mma yaannhwe ase.
title: George Hunt Smyttan, 1822-70.

name: CAN 48:1
verse:
. Jesus, motwer Wo, medze me kra twer Wo, 
Fɔdzifo a mayew, 'Wo na 'botum agye m',
Obi nnyi sor anaa ase a ɔnye W' sɛ;
Ɔwo wui maa abɔn, Ɔwo wui maa me. 

    Motwer Wo dɔ no na mohwehwɛ W' enyim; 
    W' adom nwanwa no ntsi na muhuhor Wo. 
    Jesus, motwer Wo, medze me kra twer Wo, 
    Fɔdzifo a mayew, 'Wo na 'botum agye me.
title: Mary Jane Walker, 1816-78.

name: CAN 48:2
verse:
. Jesus, m' bɔtwer Wo, m' bɔtwer Wo Kyerɛwsɛm; 
Osiandɛ matse Wo mbɔbɔrhu ndze no.
Wo Sunsum kyerɛkyerɛ m' a, ɔyɛ m' dɛw dodow,
Ma mentsena W' anan ho ara mintsie.
title: Mary Jane Walker, 1816-78.

name: CAN 48:3
verse:
. Jesus, m' bɔtwer Wo, mobɔdwen W' akwan do, 
Ewɔ wiadze n' eyɛɛ dɔ nye mbɔbɔrhu,
Ndzebɔnyɛfo fɔɔr Wo, 'kwatafo hwehwɛɛ W',
Hɔn mu biara ho annyɛ Agyenkwa nkɔw.
title: Mary Jane Walker, 1816-78.

name: CAN 49:1
verse:
. Mma nnsu mma Nyia ɔso mbeamudua 
Dze rokɔ Calvary no;
Ɔnnserɛ dasanyi ne nyinsu,
Ɔapen dɛ obowu.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: CAN 49:2
verse:
. Yaw huhu bi a atow N' enyim, 
Oegura ne nyimpadua n',
Mmfir amenhyɛ anaa 'nyimguase:
Onnsuro mbeamudua n'.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: CAN 49:3
verse:
. Yaw wenwen a ɔbor do yi, 
Ahoguan a ɔnnka,
Dza Wo dɔ nnya mu ahotɔ yi,
Wo nko so ne nyina.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: CAN 49:4
verse:
. Ohu akra a hɔn ntsi oruwu 
Dɛ wɔtar hɔn bɔn ho,
Hɔn a ɔsor-man dzi wɔ hɔn
Wɔmmpɛ dɛ wɔhɛn mu.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: CAN 50:1
verse:
. Yaw Nyimpa! Wɔnhwɛ dzin bi a 
Wɔdze frɛɛ Nyame Ne Ba a
Ɔbɛgyee adasa nkwa
Alleluia! Ɔgyefo bɛn a!
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.

name: CAN 50:2
verse:
. Wɔhyɛɛ N' fɛr, woyii N' ehi, 
Wɔdze m' afɔdzi soaa No;
No bɔgyaa sii m' fakyɛ pi:
Alleluia! Ɔgyefo bɛn a!
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.

name: CAN 50:3
verse:
. Yedzi fɔ, hɛn ho yɛ nkɔw 
Na Ɔno nye mpata-guan:
Bo adwe koraa!- aso ampa?
Alleluia! Ɔgyefo bɛn a!
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.

name: CAN 50:4
verse:
. Ɔsɛn wimu na owui, 
Ɔkaam' dɛ, Afei mewie!
N-dɛ wɔakrɔn No wɔ sor
Alleluia! Ɔgyefo bɛn a!
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.

name: CAN 51:1
verse:
. Aa! Jesus krɔnkrɔn, ebɛn na ayɛ, 
Na nyimpa dze enyitan bu Wo fɔ yi?
Atamfo si W' atwetwe, wodze apa W',
Ao, mandzehunyi.
title: Johann Heerman, 1585-1647;

name: CAN 51:2
verse:
. Woana dzi so? Woana dze yi baa Wo do? 
Ao, Jesus, mo bɔn na ɔabɔ W' mbusu yi;
Mara a, Wura Jesus, emi na mepaa W':
'Mi mobɔɔ W' mbeamuduam':
title: Johann Heerman, 1585-1647;

name: CAN 51:3
title: Johann Heerman, 1585-1647;

name: CAN 51:4
verse:
. 'Mi ntsi, Jesus pa, na ebɛyɛɛ nyimpa, 
Wo wuyaw wenwen, na wo nkwa afɔrbɔ;
Wo wum' ahoguan, W' amandzehu yawyaw,
'Mi mo nkwagye ntsi a.
title: Johann Heerman, 1585-1647;

name: CAN 52:1
verse:
. Kokwaa bi wɔ ekyirkyir noho, 
Kurow bi ban ekyir,
Hɔ na wɔsɛɛn Ewuradze a
Owui dze gyee hɛn nkwa n'.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 52:2
verse:
. Yennkotum yeehu, yɛakyerɛ yaw 
A ɔsɔwee no dur;
Na yɛgye dzi dɛ hɛn ntsi na
Ɔsɛɛn hɔ na owui.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 52:3
verse:
. Owui ma yeenya bɔnfakyɛ, 
Owui ma yaayɛ yie,
N' adehye bɔgya n' aagye hɛn,
Ewiei n' yaakɔ sor manm'.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 52:4
verse:
. Obi nnyihɔ a oye dɛ Ɔno 
Na oeetua  bɔn ho kaw n';
No nko na otum bue sor abow n'
Na ɔdze hɛn kɔ mu.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 53:1
verse:
. Nyame Eguambaa, yɛrekaa, 
Wo dɔ a woepira no n',
Fi sor noho gye hɛn do,
Na bohu hɛn mbɔbɔr:
Kaa hɛn a yɛdwen Wo ho;
Na gye kra biara a ɔreper;
O, yɛserɛ W', kaa Calvary,
Na ma yɛnkɔ asomdweem'!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 53:2
verse:
. W' amandzehu yayaw no, 
Wo bɔgyaa fifir no,
Wo dɔ a ɔmaa iwui ntsi,
Yɛserɛ W' , yi hɛn bɔn kɔ;
Bubu hɛn mpokyerɛ mu na
Gye hɛn emumuyɛ nyinam';
O, yeserɛ W', kaa Calvary,
Na ma yɛnkɔ asomdweem'!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 54:1
verse:
. Moto m' enyi hwɛ anwanwa dua a 
Enyimnyam Hen no tɔɔr do n' a,
M' adze pa biara mummbu n' hwee,
M' ahopɔw nyina yɛ m' nkɔnkɔw.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 54:2
verse:
. Mo Wura, ɔmpar me dɛ m' botuw, 
Gyedɛ m' Agyenkwa No wu  mu:
Egyangyandze a modɔ kɛse n',
Mobɔ n' afɔr ma No bɔgyaa.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 54:3
verse:
. Hwɛ mbrɛ yaw na ɔdɔ rosɔn 
Ne tsir, Ne nsa, nye N' anan ho:
Dɛm dɔ na yaw yi mmbɔɔ mu pɛn,
Na nsoɛ kyɛw yi bi nnsoaa bi da.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 55:1
verse:
. Onyame dɔ! 'bɛn na ayɛ 'i? 
Bɛkyebo Nyame ewu ama m'!
Egya No domankoma Ba N'
Soaa mo bɔn nyina wɔ dua n' do;
Bɛkyebo Nyame ewu ama m'!
Mo Wura, mo Dɔ, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 55:2
verse:
. Akwantsemfo nyina hom nhwɛ 
N-kwa na Asomdwee Hen ruwu!
Abɔn hom Bɔfo na oruwu 'il!
Aso yaw bi nye Nedze 'i sɛ?
Hom nye m' mbɔsɔ No bɔgyaa nhwɛ:
Mo Wura, mo Dɔ, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 55:3
verse:
. Woeku No ama wo nye me, 
Ma yɛnye Nyame abɔ mu:
Hom ngye Nsɛmpa n' ara ndzi dɛ,
Jesus bɔgyaa pon hɛn nyina,
Fakyɛ pem Ne mfem' ma obiara;
Mo Wura, mo Dɔ, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 56:1
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: CAN 56:2
verse:
. Worisi No atwetwe yi, 
Ana yennkosu ama No?
Ao! hwɛ mbrɛ ɔayɛ komm sɛn hɔ:
Hɛn Wura Jesus, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: CAN 56:3
verse:
. Wɔbɔɔ Ne nsa nye N' anan mu 
Ne men mu wewee, nsukɔm twaar No!
Mbusu dze sum hyɛɛenyi do:
Hɛn Wura Jesus, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: CAN 56:4
verse:
. Ɔkaa ɔdɔ nsɛm mpɛn esuon; 
Ndɔnhwer ebiasa na ɔtaa dzinn
Serɛɛ mbɔbɔrhu maa adasa:
Hɛn Wura Jesus, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: CAN 56:5
verse:
. Ma yengyina mbeamudua n' ase, 
Na bɔgya a ofi Ne mfem' no,
Ɔbɔhor hɛn ho bɔn nyina:
Hɛn Wura Jesus, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: CAN 56:6
verse:
. Koma bobɔe na nyinsuwa, 
Wɔmmfa nnkam hɔn a wobisa;
Dɔ ahyɛse nye 'koma bobɔe:
Mo Wura Jesus, wɔabɔ N' mbeamuduam.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: CAN 57:1
verse:
. Ko do  kɔ kan ahentum mu! 
N-tar saw abowa no do;
Tsena do, na eyɛ Ɔhen mu,
David ne Ba, wiadze Gyefo.
title: Henry Hart Milman, 1791-1868.

name: CAN 57:2
verse:
. Ko do  kɔ kan ahentum mu! 
Ɔwo na Sion rotweɔn Wo;
Wɔdze n-tar nye mberɛnkɔnson
Egu Wo kwan mu dɛ fa do.
title: Henry Hart Milman, 1791-1868.

name: CAN 57:3
verse:
. Ko do  kɔ kan ahentum mu! 
Ɔkatakyi, hell ne sɛɛfo;
'Wo na ibue sor ahenman
To hɔ petee ma Wo nkorɔfo.
title: Henry Hart Milman, 1791-1868.

name: CAN 57:4
verse:
. Ko do  kɔ kan ahentum mu? 
Dɔmtutuw fi sor rohwɛ Wo,
Dɛ 'rokɔbɔ afɔr huhu
Ana akɔko W' ahengua do.
title: Henry Hart Milman, 1791-1868.

name: CAN 58:1
verse:
. Hwɛ adasa hɔn Agyenkwa 
Wɔ enyimguase dua n' ho!
Dɔ a ɔkaa N' ma okyii bɔgya
Wui maa wo n' so so pa!
title: Samuel Wesley, 1662-1735.

name: CAN 58:2
verse:
. Tsie, ɔrepen! abɔdze rihim, 
Asaase rowosow;
Asɔrdan mu ntwamutam atsew,
Abotan repaapaa.
title: Samuel Wesley, 1662-1735.

name: CAN 58:3
verse:
. Oewie! wer a ho hia n' ɔatɔ; 
Ɔrekam', Gye Mo sunsum!
Hwɛ mbrɛ ɔabɔ Ne tsir adze,
Ɔabɔ n' adze ewu!
title: Samuel Wesley, 1662-1735.

name: CAN 59:1
verse:
. Yɛtow ayɛyindwom kamfo 
Jesus a owuu mbeamudua do n':
N-dzebɔnyɛfo enyidar;
Ne ntsi yemmbu wiadze yi hwee.
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1769-1854.

name: CAN 59:2
verse:
. Ne mbeamudua no kyerɛ petee 
Ma yehu dɛ Nyame nye dɔ:
Ɔsoa hɛn bɔn wɔ dua no do;
Ɔdze Nyame adom brɛ hɛn.
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1769-1854.

name: CAN 59:3
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1769-1854.

name: CAN 59:4
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1769-1854.

name: CAN 60:1
verse:
. Jesus, fa m' sie mbeamudua n' ho, 
Hɔ na nsu a ɔyɛ edur n'
Fi Calvary koko no do
Pem kwa ma obiara.

       Mbeamudua n' mu, mbeamudua n' mu, 
       Na menhyehyɛ moho, 
       Nkɛpem dɛ me kra bɔhom 
       Wɔ esutsen n' ekyir hɔ.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 60:2
verse:
. Mbeamudua n' ho na dɔ na adom 
Too me kra bɔbɔfo;
Adzekyee Nworaba hyɛnhyɛnn n'
Ne nserɛmɛn hyerɛɛn mo do.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 60:3
verse:
. Dza osii mbeamudua no ho n', 
Nyame Eguambaa, yi kyerɛ m';
Ao, boa me ma mennantsew
No nwin ase daa daa.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 61:1
verse:
. Bura bi wɔ hɔ bɔgya ma, 
Wɔtwee n' Immanuel mfem',
Na ndzebɔnyɛfo bɔtɔm' a,
Wɔyew hɔn ho fi nyina.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 61:2
verse:
. Owifo no ɔdze dɛw hun 
Bura n' wɔ n' aber do;
Hɔ na kaansa mo ho yɛ nkɔw a,
M' bɔhor mo ho bɔn nyina.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 61:3
verse:
. Nyame Eguambaa, Wo bɔgyaa 
No tum ɔnnkɛpa da,
Gyedɛ W' asɔrmba nyina enya nkwa,
Mma wɔnnkɛyɛ bɔn bio.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 61:4
verse:
. Ofitsi dɛ me gyedzi hun 
Esu a ofi Wo mfem',
Onyame dɔ ayɛ mo ndwom,
Na ɔbɛyɛ edu wum'.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 62:1
verse:
. O tsir Krɔnkrɔn, wopiraa Wo, 
Yaw mbordo hyɛɛ Wo do,
Wɔdze nsoɛ yɛɛ W' ahenkyɛw
Dze sii Wo atwetwe!
Mbrɛ W' enyim esi atow,
Ɔnam ahoguan ntsi;
Enyim a nkyɛ ɔkyɛn wi,
Hwɛ mbrɛ oesi enyam.
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.

name: CAN 62:2
verse:
. Enyimnyam nye nkwa Wura, 
Dɛw krɔnkrɔn bi a nkyɛ ewɔ a!
Mekenkan nsɛm nwanwa yi a
Dɛw ka m' dɛ 'yɛ medze.
W' awerɛhow n', W' ayamuhyehye n',
Abɔn nya mu mfaso;
Emi mbom na motoo mbra,
Ɔwo na inyaa wuyaw.
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.

name: CAN 62:3
verse:
. Minya gyirama wɔ hen 
Dze eyi Wo ayɛw
Wɔ W' amandzehu wu yi,
Wo tsema a ɔmmbɔ adze yi?
Mo Wura, fa m' yɛ Wodze koraa;
Mma memmpa W' ara da;
Pa gu ma m' dɛ m' betsiatsia
W' anwanwa dɔ yi do!
title: Bernard of Clairvaux, 1091-66.

name: CAN 63:1
verse:
. EWURADZE Christ asoɛr ndɛ: 
Alleluia!
Nyimpa nye abɔfo ka:
Alleluia!
Hom mma dɛw na ehurusi do:
Alleluia!
Ɔsor ntow, wiadze ngye do:
Alleluia!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 63:2
verse:
. Ɔdɔ edzi dwuma no;
Alleluia!
Ɔako, oedzi nyim koraa:
Alleluia!
Ɔbo nye aweɔmfo n' yɛɛ kwa;
Alleluia!
Christ efi samanadze:
Alleluia!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 63:3
verse:
. Hɛn enyimnyam Hen tse ase;
Alleluia!
Owu, wo hwirom wɔ hen? 
Alleluia!
Prɛko na owui gyee hɛn: 
Alleluia!
Owu, wo konyim wɔ hen?
Alleluia!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 63:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 64:1
verse:
. Jesus Christ asoɛr n-dɛ, 
	Hallelujah! 
Hɛn konyim dapɔn krɔnkrɔn, 
	Hallelujah!
Ogyaam wɔ Mbeamudua no do, 
	Hallelujah!
Dze poom hɛn a yɛayew no, 
	Hallelujah!
title: Anonymous: Lyra Davidica. 1708;

name: CAN 64:2
verse:
. Wɔmma yɛmfa ayɛyindwom,
Ntonton Christ, hɛn sor Hen a, 
Ɔsɔɔw Mbeamudua nye wumaa, 
Dze poon abɔn gyee hɔn nkwa n'.
title: Anonymous: Lyra Davidica. 1708;

name: CAN 64:3
verse:
. Na amandze a ohunii n', 
Ɔdze nkwagye abrɛ hɛn; 
Afei odzi hen wɔ sor, 
Mbrɛ abɔfo tow ndwom daa.
title: Anonymous: Lyra Davidica. 1708;

name: CAN 65:1
verse:
. Christ asoɛr o! Hallelujah! 
Hɛn konyim adamfo asoɛr.
Wonyi N' ayɛw! Hallelujah!
Christ asoɛr ewufo mu.
Hɛn 'koma dze ndaase tonton N',
Dɛ Ne kan ahyerɛn bio;
Yɛdze dɛw bu ntwɛr wɔ N' enyim,
Yɛsoɛr fi yaw na nyinsuam.
 
   Christ asoɛr o! Hallelujah! 
   Hɛn konyim adamfo asoɛr. 
   Wonyi N' ayɛw! Hallelujah! 
   Christ asoɛr ewufo mu.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: CAN 65:2
verse:
. Christ asoɛr! No wiadze abrabɔm' 
Awerɛhow nyina abɔ adze,
Ɔnam enyigye mbotsen mu
Asan aba nkwa mu bio;
Owu na hɛll akotow No;
Ɔasoɛr, oedzi konyim ndɛ
Abɔfo dzi N' ekyir roweɔn N'
'Nyimnyam abɔ N' abɔtsir.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: CAN 66:1
title: Michael Weisse

name: CAN 66:2
verse:
. Nyia ɔdze No nkwa maa hɛn n', 
Ɔno a hɛn ntsi ɔsɔɔw ko n'
Ɔyɛ hɛn Mpataguan ndɛ;
Hɛn so dɛw tow ndwom dɛ:
                          Hallelujah!
title: Michael Weisse

name: CAN 66:3
verse:
. Nyia ɔsɔɔw obene nyina 
No werɛ hoow wɔ mbeamudua n' do n',
Ɔtse enyimnyam' wɔ sor ndɛ,
Odzi ma hɛn, tsie hɛn su.
                          Hallelujah!
title: Michael Weisse

name: CAN 66:4
verse:
. Ɔno a wɔnnto No kwan dzin, 
Ɔno a osianee kɔr hɛll,
Nyia katakyi too n' mpokyrɛ n'
Ndɛ wɔasoa N' 'henkyɛw wɔ sor.
                          Hallelujah!
title: Michael Weisse

name: CAN 66:5
verse:
. Ɔno a ɔdaa nda n' mu n' 
Wɔakrɔn No dɛ ɔngye nkwa;
Ndɛ wohua N' Christianman mu
Dɛ Eguambaa N' yɛ ahemfo Hen.
                          Hallelujah!
title: Michael Weisse

name: CAN 66:6
verse:
. Ndɛ ɔse yɛmbɔ n' dawur 
Mbrɛ abɔn besi enya nkwa,
Mbrɛ nnuhofo enya fakyɛ
Mbrɛ hɛn so bɛyɛ ahɛn sor,
                          Hallelujah!
title: Michael Weisse

name: CAN 67:1
title: Anonymous, c. 12th cent;

name: CAN 67:2
verse:
. Owu hyehyɛɛ no dɔm petsee, 
Na Christ abɔ hɔn apetse;
Wɔmbɔ se ntow enyigye ndwom: 
	Alleluia!
title: Anonymous, c. 12th cent;

name: CAN 67:3
title: Anonymous, c. 12th cent;

name: CAN 68:1
verse:
. Christ tse ase! afei Owu, 
Wo hu nnkotum etu hɛn bo;
Christ tse ase! yi ma yehu
Dɛ samanadze nnkɛmen hɛn.
                        Alleluia!
title: Christian Furchtegott Gellert, 1715-69.

name: CAN 68:2
verse:
. Christ tse ase! sor nye asaase 
Tum nyina wɔdze ama No;
Hɛn so yɛbɔkɔ Ne nkyɛn,
Yɛnye N' ekedzi Hen sor hɔ.
                        Alleluia!
title: Christian Furchtegott Gellert, 1715-69.

name: CAN 68:3
verse:
. Christ tse ase! hɛn ntsi owui; 
Dɛm ntsi yɛbɛtsena ama No,
Yɛatsew nyɛe nye adwen ho,
Yɛdze hɛn bra eyi N' ayɛw.
                        Alleluia!
title: Christian Furchtegott Gellert, 1715-69.

name: CAN 68:4
verse:
. Christ tse ase! yenyim ampa 
Dɛ hwee nnkɛpaa hɛn No dɔ ho;
Wu o, n-kwa o, samanadze o,
Nnkɔtwe hɛn efi No ho da.
                        Alleluia!
title: Christian Furchtegott Gellert, 1715-69.

name: CAN 69:1
verse:
. Tsetse mbobow, hom mbuebue
yie!
Enyimnyam Hen n' reba o!
Sahen n' dze ndɔmmum reba
fie:
Wonhyira N', wɔmma No mbo.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 69:2
verse:
. Mununkum kumbɔɔ yi ase ε?
Nkɔntwe pii yi so dεn?
Werdam son no oewie pεsɛɛ;
Wɔmfa abɔso nhyɛ N'.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 69:3
verse:
. Konyim Damfo kɔ sor no sor,
Ɔse, ɔfata nwionn;
No sor-kɔ tɔ N'Asɔr bobor,
Naaso ɔbεba bio.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 69:4
verse:
. Orisiesie adampan pii
Wɔ hɛn Egya kurowm';
N'Egya N'abanyimfa na ofi
Soma Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 69:5
verse:
. Ɔrennkyɛr san; hɛn Nkwa bɛba
Abɛfa hɛn ako.
Ɔsor noho mbrɛ wu nndu da
Na hɛn so yεbɔkɔ.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 69:6
verse:
. Wiadze Kasamaafo Kortoo
Ɔakrɔn emi saa yi;
Ɔapɛ enyimnyam kokroko
Ama Ne gyedzinyi.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 70:1
verse:
. Hwɛ da a Christ fowee kɔr sor; 
	Alleluia! 
Ma hɛn enyi egyina N' 
	Alleluia!
Ɔannkyɛr adasamba nkyɛn, 
	Alleluia!
Na ɔasan kɔ no sor fie.  
	Alleluia!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 70:2
verse:
. Wɔrotweɔn wɔabɔ No se:
M-botsen n' mma hɔn tsir do; 
Hom nyina mbuebue petee, 
Ma Enyimnyam Hen n' nkɔ mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 70:3
verse:
. Kaansa ɔahɛn ɔsor mpo a,  
Ɔda ho dɔ nyimpamba; 
Ɔasan kɔ N' ahenguam' mpo a, 
Ɔda ho frɛ hɛn Nedze.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 70:4
verse:
. Hwɛ! ɔama Ne nsa do sor,  
Hwɛ! No dɔ epiratua n'; 
Tsie! N' anofamfa kasa 
N-hyira gu N' Asɔr do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 71:1
verse:
. Hwɛ Konyimdzifo n' afow sor, 
Hwɛ Hen n' ahyɛ N' ahentar
Dze Ne tseaseanam fua do
Rokɔ No sor ahemfie;
Tsie! sor adwontow kuw ruhur
Hallelujah enyigyem',
Na sor mbotsen no ebuebue
Regye hɔn sor Hen akɔm'.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: CAN 71:2
verse:
. Woana na ɔreba 'nyimnyam mu 
Ma ehurusi mbɛn ka do 'i?
Ɔko Wura, dɔm Nyankopɔn.
Ɔno na oedzi konyim
Ɔno a ɔsɔɔw mbeamudua do fona
Ɔno a ofi ndam' soɛree,
Ɔaka bɔn na Satan egu,
Nam wu do asɛɛ N' atamfo.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: CAN 71:3
verse:
. Ɔama hɛn nyimpasu no do 
Fi fuam' kɔ Nyame nyimfa;
Ɔsor hɔ na yɛbɛtsena,
Yɛnye N' egyina 'nyimnyam mu:
Jesus dzi hen, abɔfo sɔr N';
Nyame Nyimpa tse ahenguam'
Ewuradze Tumfo, Wo sorkɔm'
Yɛdze gyedzi hu hɛndze.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: CAN 72:1
verse:
. Sika mbotsen no ebuebue, 
Kwan ada mu petee;
Enyimnyam Hen no ahɛn mu,
Ɔkɔ N' Egya Ne nkyɛn.
title: Cecil  Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 72:2
verse:
. Ewuradze, edzi hɛn kan, 
'Rekɛpɛ hɛn tsenabew,
Ama yeekefir mbrɛ ewɔ,
Na yeehu Nyame enyim.
title: Cecil  Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 72:3
verse:
. Dɛm n-tsi enyimnyam hyerɛn 
Hɛn kwan do wɔ asaase;
Fua a osiiw W' hɛn enyi do n',
Kan fi sor hotse no.
title: Cecil  Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 72:4
verse:
. Ma hɛn 'koma nye adwen do, 
Fa W' adom pa n' dom hɛn,
Na yɛnenam asaase ha 'i,
Hɛn 'koradze ada sor.
title: Cecil  Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 73:1
verse:
. Mbowa a Jewfo dze bɔɔ afɔr, 
Hɔn bɔgyaa nyinara
Nn-kotum ama etsidaa,
Anaa ɔatsew hɛn ho.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 73:2
verse:
. Christ, sor Eguambaa n' dze, 
Oyi hɛn bɔn nyina;
Afɔrbɔdze a ɔwɔ dzin,
Na ɔsom bo kyɛn hɔn nyina.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 73:3
verse:
. Me gyedzi nsa bɛda 
W' etsifi pampam' hɔ,
Ber a medze nnuho gyina ha
Mereka mo bɔn yi.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 73:4
verse:
. Me kra twa n' enyi hwɛ 
Dza obuu Wo kɔn a,
Ohu dɛ n' afɔdzi ka ho
Ma 'sɛn mbusu dua n' do.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 74:1
verse:
. Me gyedzi tsim Wo do, 
CalvaryEguambaa,
Gyefo Krɔnkrɔn:
Morosɔr yi, tsie me;
Yi mo bɔn nyinara;
Ma ofir ndɛ menyɛ
Wodze koraa.
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.

name: CAN 74:2
verse:
. Ma W' adom kɛse no 
N-hyɛ m' akoma dzen,
Ma menyɛ ndam;
Dɛ mbrɛ iwui maa me n',
Ao, ma mo so mo dɔ
Ɔmfram dzendzen mma Wo
Na mma ɔnndan da.
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.

name: CAN 74:3
verse:
. Menam bra sum mu yi, 
Na yaw etwa mo ho 'i,
Woara kyerɛ m' kwan;
Ma sum ndan adzekyee,
Pepa me nyinsuwaEso mma monntɔ gon
Mimmfi Wo nkyɛn.
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.

name: CAN 75:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 75:2
verse:
. Agyenkwa Christ dzi hen, 
Nokwar nye dɔ dzi wɔ n';
Ɔhoor hɛn ho fi no,
Ɔgyee egua wɔ sor:
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 75:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 75:4
verse:
. Ɔtse Nyame nyimfa 
Kɛpem dɛ N' atamfo
Bɔbɔ hɔn mu adze
Edzi N' ahyɛdze do:
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 75:5
verse:
. Obedzi nyim ewie, 
Oetu hɛn bɔn nyina,
Ma dasanyi biara
Eenya sor enyigye:
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 76:1
verse:
. O bra, O bra Immanuel, 
Na bɔpɔn ndɔmmum Israel,
Ɔka mmɔn ananabea ha
Kodu dɛ Nyame Ba bɛba.
 
Dzi dɛw! Dzi dɛw! Immanuel 
Bɛba wo nkyɛn, O Israel.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: CAN 76:2
verse:
. O bra, O bra, Wura Tumfo, 
Ɔwo a tsetse n' edze mbra
Maa mbusuakuw wɔ Sinai do
Wɔ fua, hu, nye ahentum mu.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: CAN 76:3
verse:
. O bra jesse Poma, bɛgye 
Wo man fi Satan tum ase;
Gye Wo nkorɔfo fi hɛll bun mu,
Ma hɔn konyimdzi wɔ wu do.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: CAN 76:4
verse:
. O bra, Adzekyee Woraba
Ma wo mbae nkyenyan hɛn sunsum;
Bɔbɔ anago sum hwetse,
Bɔ owu sunsuma petse.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: CAN 77:1
verse:
. Hwɛ! Ɔdze mununkum risian, 
Nyia da bi ɔtɔɔr hɛn ntsi n';
Ahotsewfo mpempem ka ho,
Dzi N' ekyir kumbɔɔ reba:
Alleluia!
Nyame reba ebedzi hen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 77:2
verse:
. Enyienyi nyina bohu No 
Dɛ oewuna ahentar wusuww;
Hɔn a woemmbu N' bi, wɔtɔɔn No n',
Wopirapiraa N', bɔɔ N' mbeamudua mu n'
Wobotwa ewuo,
Da a wobohu Messiah n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 77:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 78:1
verse:
. Kwantunyi ankonam ne kan, 
Adzekyee Woraba,
Pue, na tow W' anapa nserɛmɛn n'
Fa pam hɛn yaw nyina.
title: Edward Denny, 1796-1889.

name: CAN 78:2
verse:
. Ewuradze siarfo, ma mbeambea 
Na nsupruw nyina ntow
Ndwom nyi W' adehye Dzin ayɛw,
Wɔmfa Wo nyɛ hɔn Hen.
title: Edward Denny, 1796-1889.

name: CAN 78:3
verse:
. Ma wiadze nyinara a afei 
Wɔasɛ sor man hyɛnhyɛnn n',
Wɔmma ehurusi ndwom do
Wɔmfa nkaa Wo dɔ no.
title: Edward Denny, 1796-1889.

name: CAN 78:4
verse:
. Jesus, W' abɔdze risi nkrum- 
Asaase, Po, nye wim'-
Wɔnye hɛn akoma yɛ kor
Kekam' dzendzen frɛ Wo.
title: Edward Denny, 1796-1889.

name: CAN 79:1
verse:
. BEEBIARA mbrɛ ewia ɔhyerɛn, 
Jesus twa dɛ obedzi hen;
N' ahendzi tsen fi pomu' du pomu',
Gyedɛ ewia fir dɛ ɔnntɔ bio.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 79:2
verse:
. Asɔr nyina wɔbɛyɛ ama N', 
Na wɔdze ayɛyi ebu N' kyɛw;
Ne dzin, tse dɛ eduhuam a,
Nye afɔr nyina botu akɔ sor.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 79:3
verse:
. Nkorɔfo na ngyirama mpem nyina 
Dze No dɔ ho ndwom dɛɛdɛw mu;
Na mbofra so ma hɔn ndze do,
Wɔtow Hosanna ma Ne dzin.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 79:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 79:5
verse:
. Beebiara mbrɛ ɔkyerɛ No tum, 
Wu na mbusu fi hɔ koraa:
No mu na nhyira a Adam yeew no n',
Ne mbanana nya ma ɔbor do.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 80:1
verse:
. O Nyame Dɔ, sian famu, 
Bra bɔhwehwɛ me kra,
Fa Woara Wo hyew dzendzen bi n' bɔsoɛ mu;
Kyigyinafo e, twe bɛn!
Bopue m' akoma mu,
Na ma Wo gya krɔnkrɔn no mbɛfram me kra.
title: Bianco da Siena, d. 1434;

name: CAN 80:2
verse:
. Ma ɔndzɛw ara yie, 
Nkodu dɛ ɔbɛhyew
Wiadze akɔndɔ nyina ma ɔaatɔ nso;
Na ma W' enyimnyam kan n'
Ɔnhyerɛn m' enyim daa,
Ɔnhyerɛn mo ho nye mo kwan mu nyina.
title: Bianco da Siena, d. 1434;

name: CAN 80:3
verse:
. Na ma ɔdɔ krɔnkrɔn 
Ɔnyɛ m' egudo atar,
Na ma menhyɛ ahobrɛadze wɔ ase;
Ahobrɛadze 'koma a,
Ɔdze noho to famu,
Na ɔdze nyinsuwa kyir noara n' esintɔ.
title: Bianco da Siena, d. 1434;

name: CAN 81:1
verse:
. TSETSEBER a Nyame siaan wiadze n', 
Ɔbaa n' tum nye ebufuwm';
Fua bɔɔ apetse N' ananadze,
Fa yɛɛ sum, fa daan gya.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 81:2
verse:
. Na ne mprɛnu no a ɔbae no, 
Ɔbaa n' tum nye dɔ mu;
Bɔkɔɔ kyɛn anapa mframa
Nna Ebubur Krɔnkrɔn n' bae.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 81:3
verse:
. Ogya a osiaan Sinai do no 
Ɔframee ma ɔyɛɛ hu,
Ɔdaan enyimnyam ahenkyɛw
Wɔ ahotseweefo tsir do.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 81:4
verse:
. Na dε mbrε Israel dze hu
Tsee ndze kεse mbordo n’,
Abεn a abᴐfo mpo suro,
Gyigyee fua kebii mu.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 81:5
verse:
. Dεm na hεn Nyame no Sunsum
Bodwiir no nguankuw do n’,
Wᴐtsee ndze fi sor wᴐ mbea nyina,
Dε mframa a ᴐyε dzen.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 81:6
verse:
. Ͻhyε Nyankopᴐn N’Asᴐr ma,
Twa bᴐn wiadze yi ho hyia:
Gyedε ntsintsiman ‘koma nko
Nna onnya no mu kwan.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 82:1
verse:
. Egya, hyɛ Wo Ba enyimnyam, 
Yɛ dza Ne mpaabɔ bisa n'':
Ma Kasamaafo no mbra,
Fa Werɛkyekyefo n' ma hɛn
Yɛnam gyedzi do regye N',
Jesus dzin ntsi, fa N' ma hɛn.
title: Edward Shillito, 1872-1948.

name: CAN 82:2
verse:
. Yɛnam gyedzi do bohu 
Na yɛatse Sunsum no nka;
Ɔdze N' adom nye No dɔ
Bɛtsena hɛn akoma mu:
Hɛn mboa nye papa nyina
Pem fi No nkotoo mu ba.
title: Edward Shillito, 1872-1948.

name: CAN 83:1
verse:
. Ansaana hɛn Gyefo siarfo 
Nye hɛn ridzi mpaamu n',
Ogyaa hɛn Ɔkwankyerɛfo dɛ
Ɔnye hɛn ntsena.
title: Harriet Auber, 1773-1862.

name: CAN 83:2
verse:
. Ɔbae wɔ ebubur suban mu, 
Dɛ ɔatrɛ n' atsabanm',
Ɔdze dɔ na asomdwee boguu
No nkorɔfo do.
title: Harriet Auber, 1773-1862.

name: CAN 83:3
verse:
. Ɔdze ogya ngyrama bae dɛ 
Ɔrebɛkyerɛkyerɛ hɛn;
Ɔtse dɛ mframa, ɔyɛ dzen,
Na wonnhu so.
title: Harriet Auber, 1773-1862.

name: CAN 83:4
verse:
. 'Koma biara a ɔbrɛ adze n', 
Ɔba bɛtsena mu hɔ,
Na ɔdae ahom dɛɛdɛw bi
Dze gye no do.
title: Harriet Auber, 1773-1862.

name: CAN 83:5
verse:
. Ne ndze na yɛtse no bi 
Dɛ ewimbir mframa n';
Osiw mfomso kwan,
Ka sor ho nsɛm.
title: Harriet Auber, 1773-1862.

name: CAN 83:6
verse:
. Papa biara a ɔwɔ hɛn ho, 
Konyim biara a yedzi,
Adwen krɔnkrɔn biara a yenya,
Ofir Noara.
title: Harriet Auber, 1773-1862.

name: CAN 84:1
verse:
. Ao o, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, bra!
Fi sor noho dwir hɔn do,
Tow Wo kan hyerɔn hɔn do.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 84:2
verse:
. Ehiafo hɔn Boafo, bra!
'Wo a ema sɔr ahonya,
Akoma nyina kan, bra.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 84:3
verse:
. Ɔwerɛkyekyefo kɛse,
Bɔsoɛ hɛn akoma mu,
Na ma yennya Wasomdwee.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 84:4
verse:
. Ɔfona mu ahomgye,
Ahohyehyem' ahotɔ,
Bra beyi hɛn nyinsuwa mu.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 84:5
title: Unknown

name: CAN 84:6
verse:
. Sɛ wo ammboa hɛn a,
Yɛbo mbɔdzen dɛn ara a,
Ne nyinara bɛyɛ gyan.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 84:7
verse:
. Hohor hɛn mu fi nyina,
Fɔw hɛn akoma a woetwie,
Yɛ sunsum pirafo edur.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 84:8
verse:
. Ma asoɔdzenfo nyɛ Wo pɛ,
Bɔ hɔn a wɔyɛ nwin hyew,
Fa akobɔfo bra fie.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 84:9
verse:
. Dom agyedzifo nyina,
Ma wontsimtsim Woara,
Ma hɔn Wo dɔ akyɛdze n'.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 85:1
verse:
. Nyame sunsum, tsie hɛn mpaabɔ, 
Fa dan yi yɛ wo fie,
Fa W' adom no tum nyina sian;
Bra, Sunsum kɛse, bra.
title: Andrew Reed, 1787-1862.

name: CAN 85:2
verse:
. Bra dɛ ekan: ma yenhu hɛn 
Mbɔbɔryɛ na mbusu
Na fa hɛn dua ɔbra kwan a,
Atseneneefo nyina duam'.
title: Andrew Reed, 1787-1862.

name: CAN 85:3
verse:
. Bra dɛ ogya, bɛtsew hɛn ho, 
Dɛ afɔrbɔ gyaframee;
Ma hɛn kra nyina nyɛ afɔr
Mma hɛn Pomfo Ne dzin.
title: Andrew Reed, 1787-1862.

name: CAN 85:4
verse:
. Bra dɛ ɔbɔw, na dɛw mu ara 
Hyira ber krɔnkrɔn yi,
Ma dza etwie ndzi dɛw dɛ onya,
Wo prɔmprɔmyɛ tum no.
title: Andrew Reed, 1787-1862.

name: CAN 85:5
verse:
. Bra dɛ ebubur, tserɛw  W' atsabanm' 
Asomdwee dɔ atsaban n';
Na ma W' asɔr a ɔwɔ asaase
Nyɛ siar dɛ sor Asɔr n'.
title: Andrew Reed, 1787-1862.

name: CAN 85:6
verse:
. Bra dɛmframa a ɔdze twitwi 
Na Pentecost adom,
Ma hɔn a Ɔbaa awo hɔn nyina
Eehu W' enyimnyam no.
title: Andrew Reed, 1787-1862.

name: CAN 86:1
verse:
. Nyame ahom, gu mo do; 
Hyɛ mo mu nkwa fofor,
Ma mondɔ dza Ɔwo edɔ
Na menyɛ dza eyɛ.
title: Edwin Hatch, 1835-89.

name: CAN 86:2
verse:
. Nyame ahom, gu mo do; 
Ma m' akoma mu ntsew,
Kɛpem dɛ menye W' nya pɛ kor
Dze sɔw fona, dze bɔ bra.
title: Edwin Hatch, 1835-89.

name: CAN 86:3
verse:
. Nyame ahom, gu mo do; 
Ma menyɛ Wodze koraa,
Kɛpem dɛ me nyimpadua mpo
Nyame kan bɛhyerɛn mu.
title: Edwin Hatch, 1835-89.

name: CAN 87:1
verse:
. Ͻkorsa Nyame, yesͻr Wo,
Ndzɛmba nyinara do Tumfo;
Enyiasombea, nyansabuakwa,
W'akwan nyinara yɛ nwanwa.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 87:2
verse:
. Yɛnam nokwar gyedzi do pen
Ͻkorsa krͻnkrͻn n' de hɛn Hen;
Yɛkotow sͻr Wo Nyame-su
Wͻ W'ahendzi ahoͻdzen n' mu.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 87:3
verse:
. Krͻnkrͻn, krͻnkrͻn, krͻnkrͻn,
mprɛnsa,
Wo họ adwen tra hɛn nyansaa;
Ndzebɔnyɛfo twa hwe W'enyim
Yɛserɛ fakyɛ, adom, konyim.
Amen.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 87:3
verse:
. Egya no hyɛ Ͻba N' No mu
Regye hɛn nkwa ma yeedzi mu;
Sunsum no dze Ͻba N' N'adom
Tsew hɛn ho ma Nyame No
som.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 88:1
verse:
. Mbɔbɔrhu Egya, W' asɛm mu 
Enyimnyam ahyɛ ma!
Abɔdzin nyinaa nka Wo dzin
W' adom nsɛmpa yi ntsi.
title: Anne Steele, 1716-78.

name: CAN 88:2
verse:
. Ha na akɔhweaban nyina 
Nya ahonya mbordo;
Ahonya a bi nnyi wi ase,
Otsim hɔ afebɔɔ.
title: Anne Steele, 1716-78.

name: CAN 88:3
verse:
. Ha na nyimdzee nduadzewa fifir 
Ma hɔn a kɔm dze hɔn;
Edziban pa a wiadze nnyi bi,
Rotweɔn nyia no kɔn dɔ.
title: Anne Steele, 1716-78.

name: CAN 88:4
verse:
. Ha na hɛn Pomfo N' ndze dɛɛdɛw 
Ka asomdwee kasa;
Na nkwa na dɛw a onyi ewiei
Wɔ Ne nsɛm nyinaa mu.
title: Anne Steele, 1716-78.

name: CAN 89:1
verse:
. Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, bra hɛn 'komam', 
Ma yɛntse Wo tum no,
Wo na tsetse wɔdze W' hyɛɛ nkɔm,
Na kan na dɔ fir Wo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 89:2
verse:
. Bra, na Ɔwo na nkɔnhyɛfo n' 
Dze W' kyerɛwee, dze Wo kae;
Bue nokwar no, Ɔwo nye saafee n',
Tsew nwoma krɔnkrɔn n' ano.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 89:3
verse:
. Sor Ebubur, trɛ W' atsabanm' 
Wɔ hɛn isum no do,
Butuw hɛn kra no sum no do,
Na ma hɔ ɔnyɛ kann.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 90:1
verse:
. Ewuradze, W' asɛm tsim, 
'No na yɛhwɛ nantsew,
Nyia ɔgye no nokwar
Nya kan nye enyigye.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 90:2
verse:
. Atamfo ba hɛn do a, 
W' asɛm yi hyɛ hɛn dzen,
Awerɛkyekyer nsɛmpa,
N-kwagye amandzɛɛ.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 90:3
verse:
. Ɔbra n' ehum tu hɛn, 
Na sum gye hɛn do a,
Ne kan hyerɛn ma hɛn,
Na ɔkyerɛ hɛn kwan.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 90:4
verse:
. Woana botum akyerɛ 
Ahotɔ nye dɛw a
W' asɛmpa yi dze ma
N-tsetsekwaa nyinaa?
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 90:5
verse:
. Ehumbɔbɔr nsɛmpa, 
Ɔboa atseasefo;
N-kwasɛm, ɔkyekye
Hɔn a wɔda wuso werɛ.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 91:1
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.

name: CAN 91:2
verse:
. Edziban a ofi sor tɔ
Ma yɛdze nyɛn hɛn kra:
Nwomà a yɛkenkan a yehu
Mbrɛ ɔsor man mu tse;
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.

name: CAN 91:3
verse:
. ꓛyɛ gyafadum anago,
Munumkum adzekyee;
ꓛbra po tu ne tsir gu do a,
Hɛn sekyɛ nye tabon.
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.

name: CAN 91:4
verse:
. Onyame Twerammpon N' Asɛm,
N' enyimmyam Ba N' Ahyɛmù,
Yeennya wo a yenntum bra yi bɔ,
Yenntum nnya Nyame man.
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.

name: CAN 92:1
verse:
. Ma yɛntow anwanwa dɔ bi ho ndwom, 
Nokwar ɔdɔ a,
Ɔdɔ a ofi Sor Egya N' akomam'
Rehyɛ adasamba ma:
Anwanwa dɔ
Ɔwɔ hɛn Ɔsor Egya N' akomam'.
title: Robert Walmsley, 1831-1905.

name: CAN 92:2
verse:
. Jesus, Agyenkwa n', dze dɛw sianee bae 
Bɛkaa 'Sɛmpa n';
Ɔduaa N' amandzehu pii do hwehwɛɛ
Hɔn a hɔn enyidar asa n'.
Hɔn a wɔayew n',
Otuaa kaw mbordo na ɔgyee hɔn nkwa.
title: Robert Walmsley, 1831-1905.

name: CAN 92:3
verse:
. Jesus da ho hwehwɛ hɔn a wɔayew n': 
Wokyin yɛ dɛn?
No dɔ pɛ dɛ ɔkata hɔn bɔn do:
Afonafo, hom mbra fie!
Anwanwa dɔ
Ɔwɔ hɛn Ɔsor Egya N' akomam'.
title: Robert Walmsley, 1831-1905.

name: CAN 93:1
verse:
. Ana ahaw, na aberɛ, 
Na wo kɔn ebu?
Tsie! Obi dɛ, Bra, na m' bɛma w'
Ahomgye.
title: St. Stephen the Sabaite, 725-794;

name: CAN 93:2
verse:
. Ana akam bi wɔ No a, 
Medze m' bohu No?
N' anan ho, Ne nsam', nye Ne mfem'
Wɔ epiratua.
title: St. Stephen the Sabaite, 725-794;

name: CAN 93:3
verse:
. Ana kyɛw bi so N' a ɔma 
Ɔyɛ dɛ ɔhen?
Nyew, ahenkyɛw ara ampa;
Na nsoɛ dze a.
title: St. Stephen the Sabaite, 725-794;

name: CAN 93:4
verse:
. Sɛ muhu N' n a meka No do a, 
Ebɛn na m' benya?
Amandzehu, nye ɔfona,
Nye nyinsuwa.
title: St. Stephen the Sabaite, 725-794;

name: CAN 93:5
verse:
. Sɛ menngyaa dɛ meka No do a, 
'Bɛn na nkyii m' benya?
Ɔfona, nye yaw, nye Jordan
Botwa mu.
title: St. Stephen the Sabaite, 725-794;

name: CAN 93:6
verse:
. Ana mese N' dɛ ɔngye m' a, 
Ɔbɛse m', Oho?
Dabi; gyedɛ sor nye asaase
Etwam' kɔ.
title: St. Stephen the Sabaite, 725-794;

name: CAN 94:1
verse:
. Ewuradze, matse nka dɛ 
'Rowora nhyira nsu pii,
Edze rofɔw daadze a oetwie,
Ma bi nsosɔ mo so do,
                   'Mi dɛm yi.
title: Elizabeth Codner, 1824-1919.

name: CAN 94:2
verse:
. Mma mmpa mo ho, dɔyɛfo Egya, 
M' akomam' wɔ bɔn so ampa;
Ɔfata dɛ igya m' hɔ dze,
Na fa mbɔbɔr hu me so,
title: Elizabeth Codner, 1824-1919.

name: CAN 94:3
title: Elizabeth Codner, 1824-1919.

name: CAN 94:4
verse:
. Mma mmpa mo ho, Sunsum tumfo, 
'Wo na ibue furafo enyi;
Jesus Ne yie ho Dasefo,
Ka tum kasa n' kyerɛ me so,
title: Elizabeth Codner, 1824-1919.

name: CAN 95:1
verse:
. Jesus gye ndzebɔnyɛfo; 
Bɔ adomsɛm yim' kyerɛ
Hɔn a wofi sor kwan mu,
Wɔahwe ase, reyɛ ekyim. 
Si do tow, si do tow bio; 
(Si do ara tow, Si do ara tow)
Christ ɔgye ndzebɔnyɛfo
(Christ ɔgye ndzebɔnyɛfo)
Amandzɛɛ n' ma wɔntse ase;
(Amandzɛɛ n', kyerɛ mu yie)
Christ ɔgye ndzebɔnyɛfo.
title: Erdmann Neumeister, 1671-1756.

name: CAN 95:2
title: Erdmann Neumeister, 1671-1756.

name: CAN 95:3
verse:
. M' akoma mmubu me fɔ bio, 
Mo ho san wɔ mbra n' enyim;
Nyia ɔhoor mo ho fi no
Apata mbra no koraa.
title: Erdmann Neumeister, 1671-1756.

name: CAN 96:1
title: Joseph Hart, 1712-68.

name: CAN 96:2
verse:
. Hom mbra, akɔhweaban, hom mbra; 
Hom nhuhor Nyame ayamuyie,
Nokwar gyedzi, nnuho mapa,
Adom a ɔtwe hɛn bɛn N',
Wɔmmfa sika,
Bra Jesus hɔ bɔtɔ bi.
title: Joseph Hart, 1712-68.

name: CAN 96:3
title: Joseph Hart, 1712-68.

name: CAN 96:4
verse:
. Mma tsibowaba nnyɛ w' mma nkyinkyin, 
Mma emudzi nnyɛ w' adwendwen,
Emudzi a ɔregye ara nye,
Ibohu wo hia a ihia N':
                   'Yi ɔdze ma w';
Ɔyɛ Sunsum 'napawi.
title: Joseph Hart, 1712-68.

name: CAN 97:1
verse:
. Bra ma hɛn a yɛgye Christ dzi 
Ntonton hɛn Agyenkwa,
Yɛmfa enyigye ndze nkamfo
N' adom enyimnyam no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 97:2
verse:
. Ogyina bɔnyɛnyi biara 
N' akoma ekyir robɔm';
Nyia ɔasɛɛ koraa nnyi dɛ ɔpam N' bio,
Anaa ɔyɛ ma ɔkɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 97:3
verse:
. Yɛnam adom do tsie Wo ndze, 
Pen do dɛ yi hɛn bɔnm',
Yesi pi dzi dɛw enyidarm',
Dɛ Ɔwo 'bɛhɛn mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 98:1
verse:
. Mma mmpa mo ho, Agyenkwa brɛfo, 
Tsie mo mbɔbɔr su;
'Reyaa W' ano kyerɛ binom,
Mma mmpa mo nko ho.

  Agyenkwa, Agyenkwa, 
  Tsie mo mbɔbɔr su!
  Na 'refrɛfrɛ m' asɛfo yi,
  Mma mmpa mo nko ho.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 98:2
verse:
. Mbɔbɔr ahengua enyim ha 
ma m' akomatɔm';
Mokosɔw ha awerɛhow mu
Na pa m' ekyingye.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 98:3
verse:
. Motwer Wo yie no nkotonoo, 
Mohwehwɛ W' enyim;
Yɛ mo sunsum pirafo edur,
Nam W' adom do gye m'.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 98:4
verse:
. M' aweɛkyekyer n- sunyiwa, 
'Wo 'kyɛn me nkwa mpo;
Mowɔ woana wɔ ase ha,
Anaa sor dɛ 'Wo?
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 99:1
verse:
. Per gye hɔn a wɔreyew, 
Tse ma hɔn a woruwu,
Hwim hɔn fi bɔn na adakamaa mu:
Su ma dza ɔafom kwan,
Ma asehwefo do,
Se hɔn dɛ Jesus tum dɛ ɔgye nkwa.

   Per gye hɔn a wɔreyew, 
   Tse ma hɔn a woruwu,
   Jesus yɛ mbɔbɔrhu, ɔbɛgye nkwa.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 99:2
verse:
. Sɛ wɔmmfa N' nnyɛ hwee mpo a, 
Ɔda ho rotweɔn.
'Rotweɔn ɔba a oenu noho n' ɔagye n'.
Enye hɔn nka n' ka pa,
Enye hɔn nka n' berɛww;
Sɛ wɔgye dzi ara a ɔdze bɛkyɛ.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 99:3
verse:
. Sɛ abɔnsam daadaa 
'Nyimpa n' akoma a,
Nyame N' adom twe n' ekyir a ɔyɛ:
Eyɛ no ayamuyie,
Ekyerɛ no Wo dɔ a,
Dza nkyɛ ɔnntse no afei ɔbɛtse.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 100:1
verse:
. Abow bi wɔaka awaw hɔ,
Na kan fi mbeamudua ho
Gyigye no mu hyɛnhyɛnn
Yi Gyigye no kwan no mu hyenhyen
Yi Gyefo No dɔ n'edzi.

      Ao, ehumbɔbɔr no bun ny' 'i:
      Abow n' wɔkae waaw hɔ maa me!
      Maa me! Maa me!
      Wɔkae waaw hɔ maa me!
title: Mrs. L. Baxter.

name: CAN 100:2
verse:
. Abow n' waw hɔ ma nyimpa nyina a
Wodua mu hwehwɛ nkwagye;
Ebirɛmpɔn nye akɔhweaban,
Akɛse nye nkakraba.
title: Mrs. L. Baxter.

name: CAN 100:3
verse:
. Bѐr a adom abow n' da hɔ yi
Sɛ dɔm rusuar mpo a, hom do
Soa mbeamudua n', kɛfa nkwa kyɛw n'a
Ɔyɛ dɔ n'a sɛnkyerɛdze n'.
title: Mrs. L. Baxter.

name: CAN 101:1
verse:
. Bra fie, bra fie!
Na w'akoma apa;
Ɔkwan mu ayɛ sum,
Ayɛ kɔnn, ayɛ hu;
Ɔba dzesɛɛfo!
Bra fie, ao, bra fie!

     Bra...fie....
      Bra; ao, bra fie!
title: Mrs. E.H. Gates.

name: CAN 101:2
verse:
. Bra fie, bra fie!
Yɛrohwɛ, yɛrotweɔn;
Yegyina abowano
Nwin ano tɔ-ber yi
Ɔba dzesɛɛfo!
Bra fie, ao, bra fie
title: Mrs. E.H. Gates.

name: CAN 101:3
verse:
. Bra fie, bra fie!
Fi awrɛhow n' mu bra,
Fi bɔn nye fɛr no mu,
Fi gyigyefo no nsa,
Ɔba dzesɛɛfo!
Bra fie, ao, bra fie!
title: Mrs. E.H. Gates.

name: CAN 102:1
verse:
. Bra Agyenkwa hɔ, mma nnyɛ ekyim:
Ɔakyѐrɛ hɛn finimfin ha n-dɛ,
Reka No mberɛwm'dɛ, Bra.

      N-hyiamu no bɛyɛ enigye
      Ber-a hɛn akomam' astsew wɔ bɔn ho
      Na yɛnye Ɔwὸ Agyenkwa atsena
      Hɛn fi a onnyi ewiei n'mu.
title: G.F. ROOT, 1820-95.

name: CAN 102:2
verse:
. Tsie, ɔse dɛ: Wɔmma mbofra kwan!
Wɔmma akoma nyina ndzi ehurusi;
Ma yɛmfa No nyɛ hɛn afamudze:
Mma nnyɛ ekyim, na bra.
title: G.F. ROOT, 1820-95.

name: CAN 103:1
verse:
. Oduyɛfo kɛse n' abɛn
Ɔnye tsimbɔbɔr Jesus;
Ɔkasa mà akoma tɔ yam';
Dɔfo, tsie Jesus Ne ndze!

    Ndwom bi a ɔyɛ dɛw wɔ sor,
    Dzin bi a ɔyɛ dɛw wɔ ase,
    Enigye ndwom à ɔwɔ beebi:
    Jesus, siarfo Jesus!
title: William Hunter

name: CAN 103:2
verse:
. Wɔdze wo bɔn nyina akyɛ w'
Dɔfo, tsie Jesus Ne ndze;
Fà asomdwee tu wo kwan kɔ sor
Kɛnye Jesus nsoà ahenkyɛw.
title: William Hunter

name: CAN 103:3
verse:
. Enyimynam nkã Nyamѐ Eguambaa!
Megye Jesus Ne dzin dzi;
Modɔ Gyefo siarfo Ne dzin,
Modɔ me Jesus Ne dzin.
title: William Hunter

name: CAN 103:4
verse:
. Ne dzin pa m'afɔdzi nyina,
Dzin bi nnyi hɔ dɛ Jesus!
Me kra dze enyigye dze tsie
Jesus dzin a ɔsom bo n'.
title: William Hunter

name: CAN 104:1
verse: . Abɔfo rikyin hɛn ho.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 104:2
verse: . Na wɔdze nsɛmpa akɔ fie.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 104:3
verse: . Wɔ Salem fofor no mu.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 104:4
verse: . Dɛ bɔnyɛfo reba fie,
title: Unknown

name: CAN 104:5
verse: . M-bofra so reba fie,
title: Unknown

name: CAN 105:1
verse:
. Werɛhonyi, 'wɔ hen arà a,
Mbeamùdua n' ho wɔ kwan!
Kã dza ɔhow wo werɛ,
Mbeamùdua n' ho wɔ kwan!
Kã ma w' Agyenkwa no ntse,
Gyaa suro nyinaa mu mà ɔnkɔ,
Kasà ara na ɔbɛtse;
Mbeamudua n' ho wɔ kwan!
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 105:2
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 105:3
verse:
. Bɔnyɛnyi a enndwen, ndɛ bra,
Mbeamùdua n' ho wɔ kwan!
Tsie! Sunsum n' nyѐ Asɔrmba se,
Mbeamùdua n' ho wɔ kwan!
Hwɛ nkwa nsubùra woebue n' hɔ,
Woebue ama me nye wo,
Ebirɛmpɔn nyѐ akɔhweaban
Mbeamùdua n' ho wɔ kwan!
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 106:1
verse:
. Ɔbon, yɛ ntsɛm hu nyansa!
Mma nntweɔn da fofor bi ana;
Sɛ eda ho pow nyansa a
ɔyɛ dzen ma w' dɛ ibenya.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 106:2
verse:
. Su frɛ ehumbɔbɔr ntsem!
Mma nntweɔn da fofor bi ana;
Ansaana ndɛ wi bɔtɔ,
Nna annyɛ a wo mber abɛsen.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 106:3
verse:
. Bɔnyɛnyi, san w'ekyir ntsɔm!
Mma nntweɔn da fofor bi ana;
'Bɛyɛ na wo kanea edum,
Ma wo nkwahosan abɔ w'.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 106:4
verse:
. Bɔnyɛnyi, yɛ ntsɛm gye siar!
Mma nntu nnhyɛ da bio ana;
'Bɛyɛ na mbusu ato w'
Ansaana adze akye.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 107:1
verse:
. Jesus Christ na ɔresen n'
Bɔnyɛnyi, to w'enyi hwɛ N';
Bѐr a ɔho wɔ na resa,
Kekam' dɛ, Hu me mbɔbɔr.
title: Rev. J. Denham Smith.

name: CAN 107:2
verse:
. Jesus Christ na ɔresen n'!
Aso ɔbɛbɛn wo dɛm daa?
Seiseiara nye ɔgye da,
Hwehwɛ nkwa ber a ibenya.
title: Rev. J. Denham Smith.

name: CAN 107:3
verse:
. Hwɛ, Ogyina hɔ refrɛ wo.
Ɔse dɛ, 'Rohwɛ bɛn?
Soɛr, ka wo hia nyinaa kyerɛ m'
Soɛr, ɔfrɛ wo ampaara.
title: Rev. J. Denham Smith.

name: CAN 108:1
verse:
. Si do, si do tow kyerɛ m' bio,
Nkwasɛm ɔyɛ nwanwa!
Ma munhu ne dɛw bi so,
Nkwasɛm ɔyɛ nkwa, yɛ dɛw,
Kyerɛ m' gyedzi nye edwuma!
      
      Nsɛm ɔyɛ dɛw! nsɛm nwanwa!
      Nkwasɛm ɔyɛ nwanwa!
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.

name: CAN 108:2
verse:
. Christ, siarfo n' , dze ma hɔn nyina,
Nkwasɛm ɔyɛ nwanwa!
Bɔnyɛnyi tsie dɔ frɛ no,
Nkwasɛm ɔyɛ nwanwa!
Ne nyina wɔdze ma kwa,
Ɔrotwe hɛn akɔ heaven.
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.

name: CAN 109:1
title: Unknown

name: CAN 109:2
title: Unknown

name: CAN 109:3
verse:
. Wonyi Eguambaa n'ayɛw,
Mbusupadze Eguambaa n';
Werdam wɔ No bɔgyaam'-
Wɔnkã wɔ aman nyina do.
Afahodzi afe n' aba!
Hom a wɔapon hom, hom nsan mbra.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 109:4
verse:
. Hom, bɔn nye hɛll n-kὸwaa,
Hom mfa homho hom ndzi,
Hom nnya nkwa ntsena Christ mu,
Hom nyi Jesus ayɛw;
Afahodzi afe n' aba!
Hom a wɔapon hom, hom nsan mbra.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 109:5
verse:
. Hom a wɔatɔn hom sor
Egyapadze koraa,
Christ dɔ hὸ akyɛdze ny' yi,
Hom ngye hom adze kwa bio:
Afahodzi afe n' aba!
Hom a wɔapon hom, hom nsan mbra,
title: Unknown

name: CAN 110:1
verse: . Bra Jesus hɔ sesei.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 110:2
verse: . Ɔbɛgye w' nkwa sesei.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 110:3
verse: . Woana gye dzi sesei?
title: Unknown

name: CAN 110:4
verse: . 'Mi megye dzi sesei.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 111:1
verse:
. 'Rotweɔn ayɛ dɛn, mo dɔfo?
Tsie w' Agyenkwa bɔn Adamfo
Rowasa bɔkɔɔ tu Wo fo
Dɛ, 'Mo nua, rotweɔn ayɛ dɛn?
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 111:2
verse:
. Aso nkobu ne pɛ no hwee
Nyia No bɔgyaa kyii maa wo yi?
Ekyim dzi mbusu, soɛr si n' pi
Ao, mo nua, rotweɔn ayɛ dɛn?
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 111:3
verse:
. Soɛr, bɛkamfo Ne dzin nwanwa n'
Jesus Ɔdomankoma Ba n'
Ka No do daa, onnkowie gyan;
Bra, mo nua, rotweɔn ayɛ dɛn?
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 111:4
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 112:1
title: Cornelius Elven, 1797-1873.

name: CAN 112:2
title: Cornelius Elven, 1797-1873.

name: CAN 112:3
title: Cornelius Elven, 1797-1873.

name: CAN 112:4
verse:
. Nyɛ ayamuyie na ndzepa a mayɛ 
Na obotum etua bɔn kor kaw;
Calvary nkotoo na muguan kɔ
Me Nyankopɔn, hu me mbɔbɔr.
title: Cornelius Elven, 1797-1873.

name: CAN 113:1
verse:
. METSE Wo ndze dɛɛdɛw n' 
Ewuradze, dɛ erefrɛ m'
Ma maatsew moho, wɔ bɔgyaa a
Ɔpem Calvary do n' mu.

    Ewuradze, maba! 
    Maba Wo hɔ ndɛ! 
    Guar m', tsew mo ho, wɔ bɔgyaa a 
    Ɔpem Calvary do n' mu.
title: Lewis Hartsough, 1828-1919.

name: CAN 113:2
verse:
. Kaansa meba mberɛwm' a, 
Woara bɛhyɛ me dzen:
Ebɔhor mo ho bɔn nyina
Ma mo ho aatsew koraa.
title: Lewis Hartsough, 1828-1919.

name: CAN 113:3
verse:
. Jesus, 'Wo na efrɛ m' 
Kɔ gyedzi na dɔ mu;
Ema m'enyidado asomdwee
Wɔ ha a wɔdze kɔ sor.
title: Lewis Hartsough, 1828-1919.

name: CAN 113:4
verse:
. M'akomam' siar dwuma n' 
'Wo na ehyɛ no ma;
Edze adom gu adom do
Ma ɔhyɛ bɔn tum do.
title: Lewis Hartsough, 1828-1919.

name: CAN 114:1
verse:
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, minyi hwee ka 
Dɛ wɔkaa Wo bɔgyaa gui maa m',
Na efrɛ m' dɛ membra Wo nkyɛn,
Nyame Eguamba, maba!
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: CAN 114:2
verse:
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, monnkɔtweɔn dɛ 
Mara meper tu me kra ho fi,
'Wo na Wo bɔgyaa tum tu fi,
Nyame Eguambaa, maba!
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: CAN 114:3
verse:
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, kansa aperper 
Ɔnye ekyingye piinara
Ko nye suro amen me mpo a
Nyame Eguambaa, maba!
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: CAN 114:4
verse:
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, hianyi, furafo; 
Enyiwa ɔnye ahonya,
Dza mihia nyina wɔ Wo mu,
Nyame Eguambaa, maba!
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: CAN 114:5
verse:
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, ebɛgye m', 'beyi m', 
Edze bɛkyɛ m', na atsew mo ho
Megye W'anasɛm dzi n-tsi
Nyame Eguambaa, maba!
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: CAN 114:6
verse:
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, Wo dɔ kɛse n' 
Ebubu mpampi nyina mu,
N-kyii m'bɛyɛ Wo nko Wodze,
Nyame Eguambaa, maba!
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: CAN 115:1
verse:
. Ɔkra bɔnyarfo Gyefo,
Ma m' gyedzi ma ɔmbɔ m'esu!
Wie W'adom edwùma kɛse n'
Twa no tsia wɔ tseneem'.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 115:2
verse:
. Kasa bio dɛ, Wo ho mfiri!
Yi mo mu bɔn fi hɔ,
Yi fintsidua nyina fi hɔ
Fa dɔ mu tutu no hɔ.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 115:3
verse:
. Monnkɔhewhwέ adzѐ a osuar,
Mommkɔhwehwέ adzѐ a ɔsõ,
Kyɛn dɛ wodze Christ bɛma m'
Christ n-ko, sor o, ase o.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 116:1
verse:
. Maba W'asɛndua n'ase,
Meyɛ fùrafo mbɔbɔrnyi,
Mebu ne nyina ntwaree,
Morohwehwɛ nkwahosan.

       Ewùradze morotwer Wo,
      Calvàry Eguambaa siarfo;
      Misi W'asɛndua n 'ase:
      Gye me, Jesus, gye m' sesei.
title: W. Mc Donald

name: CAN 116:2
verse:
. M'akoma afe W' akyɛr,
Bɔn edzi mu hen akyɛr
Jesus kã nsɛm pa kyѐrɛ m' dɛ-
M'bɔhor wo ho bɔn nyina.
title: W. Mc Donald

name: CAN 116:3
verse:
. Medze m'adze nyina ma Wo,
M'dzѐ a ɔwɔ wiadze nyinaa,
Mo sunsum nye mo honam,
Nyɛ Wodze kὸraa da nyina.
title: W. Mc Donald

name: CAN 116:4
verse:
. Mo wѐrɛ twer W'anohoba n',
Minyim dɛ bɔgya n' ruguar m';
Medze moho ato daadze,
Menye Christ ewu dua n' do.
title: W. Mc Donald

name: CAN 117:1
verse:
. MIGYINÀA abow n' ekyir,
Kwantunyi bɔbɔfo;
Ebum a ɔyɛ dzen,
Otuu m'akoma mu;
Suro hyɛɛ me kra do,
Dɛ bѐr yi mber apa ho!
Mo ho popoo dodow,
Na mosɔɔr abow n' ekyir.
title: Miss. J. Polland

name: CAN 117:2
verse:
. Mekaam' dɛ, Ao, adom,
Soa mo bɔn yi ma me!
Na ndze bi buaa dɛ, Nyoo,
Nà adom dze me kɔr danm'.
Ɔkyekyeer m'epirakur,
Na ɔkaa m'akoma toom';
Ɔhoor m'afɔdzi nyinaa,
Na ɔmaa m' ahomgye.
title: Miss. J. Polland

name: CAN 118:1
verse:
. Tsie me sufrɛ, O hu me mbɔbɔr sesei!
Bra, Gyefo kɛse, bra!
Me krà a ɔabɔm no kɔn adɔ W' dodow,
Bra, Gyefo kɛse, bra!

      Mabɔ ko nam awɔwim' wɔ akokwaa do,
      Mefi fie abɔ ko akɔ ekyirѐkyir;
      O, nkyɛ gye m' na fa m' kɔ Wo nguambuw mu,
      Bra, Gyefo kɛse, bra.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 118:2
verse:
. Minnyi beebi a odu adzeseaà a m'bɛda
Bra, Gyefo kɛse, bra!
Ehwɛ m'prɛko arà a, m'benya kan na nkwa,
Bra, Gyefo kɛse, bra!
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 118:3
verse:
. Mo kwanm' yɛ kɔnn, m'anan so ebubu,
Bra, Gyefo kɛse, bra!
M'enyi tua sor rohwehwɛ W'enyimtsew,
Bra, Gyefo kɛse, bra!
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 119:1
verse:
. DUYƐFO Nwanwanyi, m'adom!
'Wo etsie W'akὸwaa mo sufrɛ;
Hyɛ m' dzen ma daa menkã n' mo somm'
Dɛ, ampa, ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: CAN 119:2
verse:
. Mudur owu n'abowano,
Mesaree na meyɛɛ fὸnafὸna
Na 'gyeem'; ntsi mà ɔnyɛ mo ndwom so
Dɛ, ampa, ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: CAN 119:3
verse:
. Agye mo nkwà efi tamfo nsam'
Na 'so ayɛ m' dehyedehye;
Asɔr Wura, ma menka n' mpaabɔm'
Dɛ, ampa, ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: CAN 119:4
verse:
. 'Dze m' esi kokὸ a ɔkrɔn do,
N-dzepa nnà ama mahyehyɛ,
Si me gyedzi pi wɔ 'yi mu,
Dɛ, ampa, ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: CAN 119:5
verse:
. Sunsum mù esubɔ so mihia,
Ewuradze, mihia n' n-dɛ;
Ma m'enyidar nyɛ aber nyina
Dɛ, ampa, ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: CAN 120:1
verse:
. M' egya dɔfo, hyira m' seesei,
Wɔ mbeamudua n' ase ha;
Fa mo mfom na me yaw kɔ,
Tsie na yɛ m' edur sesei.

      Hyira m' sesei, hyira m' sesei,
      M'Egya dɔfo, hyira m' sesei.
title: Alexander Clark.

name: CAN 120:2
verse:
. Mo Wùra dɔnhwer yim' sesei,
Kyerɛ W'adom ɔnye Wo tum;
Ber a motwer W'anosɛm yi,
Mo Wùra, bra behyira m'sesei.
title: Alexander Clark.

name: CAN 120:3
verse:
. Sesei onsian Christ n-tsi,
Bɛpa m' sum, botu m' apo;
Ber a morohwɛ W' musu yi,
Fa Wo nsa kã m' san mo ho.
title: Alexander Clark.

name: CAN 121:1
verse:
. Hen na me kra a nwanwa aka n' 
Ɔnhyɛ ase nhwɛ sor adze nko?
Onya a mefi wu na bɔn nsa,
Gyantsia a woeyi m' daa daa gya mu,
Minsi dɛn ntonton mbrɛ ɔsɛ,
Minyi Gyefo kɛse n' ayɛw?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 121:2
verse:
. M'Egya, ao, minsi dɛn menka 
Yie a edze ayɛ me yi?
Dɛ hɛll na ebufuw nyimpa
Wɔafrɛ mo so Nyame ba bi;
M'bohu, m'bɛtse mo bɔnfakyɛ,
Ha ara m'benya sor enyigye!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 121:3
verse:
. Aso m'bɔpow m'Egya no dɔ? 
Munnkobu N'akyɛdze no bi?
