Aso m'beyi N'adom emuo?
Mbeamudua krɔnkrɔn n' no pow ntsi,
Aso ne tseneneesɛm no
M'bɛkam do wɔ m'akoma mu?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 121:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 122:1
verse:
. NA ɔbɛyɛ dɛ mibenya
Mfaso wɔ Agyenkwa bɔgyaa m'?
Owui maa 'mi a ne yaw fir m' yir,
Maa 'mi a mitsiiw No kɔr wu mu n'! 
Anwanwa dɔ! Ɔyɛ dɛn yɛ
Dɛ Ɔwo, me Nyame, wui maa m'?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 122:2
verse:
. Esumasɛm a! Nyame bowu;
Woana tum hwehwɛ N'akwan mu?
Kwa na seraph a odzi kan n'
Ɔper hwehwɛ nyamedɔ bun n',
Mbɔbɔrhu a! Asaase nhua,
Mma abɔfo nnhwehwɛ mu bio.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 122:3
verse:
. Ogyaa N'Egya 'hengua wɔ sor -
N'adom mbordo ɔdze ma kwa-
Ɔpoow ne nyina gyedɛ ɔdɔ,
Wui maa adam afɔdzifo,
Mbɔbɔrhu a! Ɔso, wɔnntɔ;
Ao, me Nyame, ɔtwee me puei!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 122:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 123:1
verse:
. Ɔdɔ Nyame baa wiadze ha, 
Ma 'wo aakɔ sor manm';
Gye dzi, gye Jesus Ne dzin dzi,
Na 'benya bɔnfakyɛ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 124:1
title: Johann Andreas Rothe, 1688-1758;

name: CAN 124:2
verse:
. Egya, W'adom a onnyi eiwiei 
Ɔbor hɛn adwen do koraa;
W'abaatanyɛ mmbɔ adze da.
Wo dɔ abaw no mu da hɔ.
Regye nnuhofo ma wɔaasɔ
Mbɔbɔrhu ahwɛ enya nkwa.
title: Johann Andreas Rothe, 1688-1758;

name: CAN 124:3
verse:
. Ɔdɔ, bun a onnyi ntuadze, 
Mo bɔn nyina ayew wo mu!
Ɔakata mo mumuyɛ do,
Afɔdzi biara nnyi mo do,
Jesus bɔgyaa tseam' kodu wim',
Mbɔbɔrhu, mbɔbɔrhu koraa!
title: Johann Andreas Rothe, 1688-1758;

name: CAN 124:4
verse:
. Medze gyedzi dɔ bun yi mu, 
M'ahomgye, dɛw na enyidar ny' 'i;
Sɛ hɛll tsiw m' a muguan ba ha
Moto m'enyi hwɛ m'Agyenkwa:
Ekyingye nye suro mfi hɔ:
Mbɔbɔrhu nko na ɔwɔ ha.
title: Johann Andreas Rothe, 1688-1758;

name: CAN 124:5
verse:
. Ehum nye asorɛkye tu bɔ m', 
Ahoɔdzen ny e adɔfo pa m',
Me dɛw nsubura nyinaa sa,
Awerɛkyekyer nyina kɔ mpo a.
Iyi nko na me kra bɔtwer,-
Egya, wo mbɔbɔrhu nnwu da.
title: Johann Andreas Rothe, 1688-1758;

name: CAN 125:1
verse:
. Mobɔtow anwanwasɛm no 
Christ owui maa me N'asɛm n';
Mbrɛ ofir N' enyimnyam fie hɔ,
Bae bowui wɔ Calvary, 

   Nyew, m'bɔtow anwanwasɛm no 
   Christ owui maa me N'asɛm n'; 
   Menye ahotsewfo bɔtow, 
   Menye ahotsewfo bɔtow, 
   Wɔ ahwehwɛ po no ho.
title: Francis Harold Rawley, 1854-

name: CAN 125:2
verse:
. Meyewee; na Jesus hwehwɛɛ me- 
'Hun No guan a ɔtɔɔ gon n';
Ɔmaa mo do kaa me berɛww
Dze me baa nkwa kwan no mu,
title: Francis Harold Rawley, 1854-

name: CAN 125:3
verse:
. M-posuow na asehwe pii: 
Maa motɔɔ akɔtɔmborɔnsa;
M'enyi do siiw m', hu kitsaa me:
Jesus gye m' ne nyina mu,
title: Francis Harold Rawley, 1854-

name: CAN 125:4
verse:
. Mbusu mber da ho ba mo do; 
Menantsew yaw kwan mu dze.
Naaso Agyenkwa bɛn me daa
Ogya me, obesi yie.
title: Francis Harold Rawley, 1854-

name: CAN 126:1
verse:
. O, Ɔwo a ifi sor bae  
Edze gya krɔnkrɔn n' rebɛma,
Sɔ dɔ a ho tsew ne gya no
Wɔ m'akoma afɔrmbukyia do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 126:2
verse:
. Ma ɔndzew hɔ mma W' enyimnyam 
Dɛ ne framee no onndum da;
Ɔmfa ahopopo nsan bio,
Wɔ ayɛyi na mpaabɔ mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 126:3
verse:
. Jesus, hyɛ dza m'akoma pɛ ma 
Ɔnyɛ edwuma, nkasa, ndwen mma Wo,
Ma menda ho nweɔn gya krɔnkrɔn n',
Nkenyan W'akyɛdze wɔ mo mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 127:1
verse:
. M' Agyenkwa! m'bɛyɛ dɛn etua 
Me kaw kɛse a medze Wo yi?
Ma dza mowɔ na metse nyina,
Nkyerɛ W'enyimnyam nyina daapem.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: CAN 128:1
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 128:2
verse:
. Igyaa Wegya fie kan n', 
W'ahengua abɔso n',
Baa asaase sum yi mu,
Bɔbɔɔ akwankwan 'werɛhowm':
Nyew, wɔdze ne nyina gyaa m'
Megyaa biribi ama Wo a?
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 128:3
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 128:4
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 129:1
verse:
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, menyɛ Wodze, 
Mbofra adamfo a edɔ m',
Meretsew moho ama W', ntsi,
O Jesus Christ, maba.
title: Marianne Farningham, 1834-1909.

name: CAN 129:2
verse:
. Adzekyee pa akye m' yi, medze 
Mo nkwa ma, mufua me nsewdzim'
Mennkam hwee do, merenyɛ ekyim,
Medze m'akoma nyinaa aba.
title: Marianne Farningham, 1834-1909.

name: CAN 129:3
verse:
. Mebɛtsena Wo kan mu daa, 
Mebɛyɛ dza ɔtsen dabaa;
Medze m'ahom nyina bɔsom Wo,
Ntsi na maba wo hɔ 'i.
title: Marianne Farningham, 1834-1909.

name: CAN 129:4
verse:
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, ahom wɔm' yi, 
Mepɛ maayɛ dansewa mapa
Wɔ nokwar na tsenenee ho ntsi
Mo nkwa Wura, maba.
title: Marianne Farningham, 1834-1909.

name: CAN 130:1
verse:
. Ber a m'akoma yɛ mberɛw yi, 
M'Agyenkwa, migyaam' ma Wo;
M'ahoɔdzen nyina wɔ Wo nsam',
Ma ɔnyɛ Wo nko Wodze.
title: John Burton, 1803-77.

name: CAN 130:2
verse:
. Mo Wura Jesus, gye m' seseiara, 
Fa W'adom gya m'kwan nyinaram'
Ma menyɛ akowaa pa mma Wo
Na Nyame dɔ nhyɛ me ma.
title: John Burton, 1803-77.

name: CAN 130:3
verse:
. Ewuradze, mbrɛ epɛ n' soma m', 
Na mbom Woara kyerɛ me kwan;
Fa W'adom gya m' kwan nyinaram'
Na meetsie Wo enyigyem'.
title: John Burton, 1803-77.

name: CAN 130:4
verse:
. Dza m'bɛyɛ, dza ɔbɛba mo do, 
Ma omfir Wo nko Wo pɛm';
Iyi mo nkwa o, edze kyɛ m' o,
Mo nkwa no Woara Wodze a.
title: John Burton, 1803-77.

name: CAN 131:1
verse:
. Gye me bra, mo Wura, na ma  
Muntu nhyɛ Wo nsa koraa.
Gye me mber na ma me ndafua; 
Memfa nyi W' ayɛw daa daa.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 131:2
verse:
. Gye me nsa na ma ɔnyɛ 
Dza Wo dɔ nko bɛkyerɛ.
Gye m'anan na ma no ho 
Ɔnyɛ har, fɛɛfɛw mma Wo.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 131:3
verse:
. Gye me ndze na ma daa daa 
Montow ndwom mma Woara.
Gye m'anofamfa na ma 
Ɔnhyɛ Wo nsɛmpa ara ma.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 131:4
verse:
. Gye mo dwɛɛtɛɛ na sika: 
No mu wen mpo mennkɛfa.
Gye m 'adwen fa m'ahoɔdzen 
Yɛ dza Woara ehwɛ a ɔtsen.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 131:5
verse:
. Gye me pɛ, yɛ n' Wodze nwiom: 
Ɔnnyɛ medze  ara bio.
Gye m'akoma,-Wodze ampa: 
Medze bɛyɛ W'ahengua.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 132:1
verse:
. Mo, sunsum, kra, nye honam,
Jesus, medze ma Wo,
Afɔrbɔdzѐ a no ho tsew krɔnn,
Ɔnyɛ Wodze daa nyinaa.

      M'adze nyinaa gu pata no do,
      Morotweɔn ogya n' ma ɔaaba,
      Morotweɔn, morotweɔn, morotweɔn,
      Morotweɔn ogya n' mà ɔaaba.
title: Mrs. James.

name: CAN 132:2
verse:
. Jesus, Agyenkwa tumfo,
Motwer Wo dzin kɛse n';
M'enyiwa da Wo nkwangye n' kwan
W'anohoba n' meregye.
title: Mrs. James.

name: CAN 132:3
verse:
. Ao, ma ogya n' nsian sesei,
Ɔmbra mo sunsum do,
Ɔmbra mbɛhyew m' afɔrbɔdze,
Ɔmma mo ho ntsew krɔnn.
title: Mrs. James.

name: CAN 133:1
verse:
. JESUS siarfo! Jesus siarfo!
'Wὸ a ѐdze Woho maa me ntsi,
Mma nngyaa m' mma minnkyin wɔ bɔn mu;
Ma membra mbɔhom Wo mu.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 133:2
verse:
. Abrɛfo nyina enyidar
Bɛyɛ mo so m' enyidar;
Jesus siarfo! Jesus siarfo!
Ma membra mbɔhom Wo mu.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 133:3
verse:
. Twe m' ekyir fi bɔn nyina ho,
Gye m' mara mo suban nsam';
Jesus siarfo! Jesus siarfo!
Ma membra mbɔhom Wo mu.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 134:1
verse:
. Nyame adɔfo, hom mbra 
Mbɛda hom dɛw edzi;
Hom nsuo m' ma yɛntow ndwom dɛɛdɛw 
Ngu N'ahengua ho aprɔw.
Nyia onnyim hɛn Nyame n'
Ɔanntow bi a ɔnnyɛ hwee;
Na Ɔsor Hen nkowaa dze otwar dɛ
Wɔda hɔn dɛw edzi.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 134:2
verse:
. Nyame ɔsor Hen a  
N'enyi bɔ wiadze aprɔw,
Ɔnantsew ehum do wɔ wim',
Na ɔtseam' ma po taa dzinn n'-
Dɛm Nyame yi yɛ hɛndze 
Yɛ hɛn Egya dɔfo:
Ɔbɛma sor etumfo no
Abɔsoa hɛn akɔ.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 134:3
verse:
. Hɔ yebohu N'enyim, 
Na yɛnnkɛyɛ bɔn da;
Hɔ yɛbɔnom daa enigye
Wɔ adom esutsen mu:
Nyew, ansaana yeetu
Yɛakɔ bɛkyebo mu n',
Dɛm eyiedzi ho adwendwen
Ma hɛn dɛw ntaataado.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 135:1
verse:
. Konyim Asɔr n 'Ewuradze, 
Yɛdze dɛw yi Wo ayɛw;
Yɛwɔ ha yi
Yɛbɔtow ndwom
Dɛ enyimnyammufo no, 
Yɛhyɛ ase ha ara 
Ma akoma na n-dze do
Kekam'  dzendzen
Yi Nyame ayɛw 
Wɔ hɛn n-kwahosan ntsi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 135:2
verse:
. Yɛda fona fononoo mu yi 
Na yɛnam ogya mu yi 
Yehyira Wo dɔ a
Onyim hɛn nda 
Na daa ɔdze hɛn bɛn Wo. 
Yɛbɔ hɛn nsam' dzi ehurusi 
Wɔ W' enyimtsewee no mu;
Wo dɔ a ɔmaa 
Yɛyɛɛ Wodze n'
Bɔkora hɛn wɔ Wo nkyɛn daa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 135:3
verse:
. Ɔwo nye Wo nkorɔfo nam 
Ngyigye n'esuyiriim';
Ebɛn hɛn yi 
Yennkosuro
Amandzehu gyatanaa. 
Wiadze nye bɔn nye abɔnsam 
Wonnkotum esi hɛn mpa;
Yɛnam Wo do
Bɛtsew hɔn mu
Na yɛatow konyim ndwom no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 136:1
verse:
. O me Nyame, sɛ me kra hwɛ 
W'ehumbɔbɔr nyina a,
Bobor nye dɔ nye ayɛyi
Ɔhyɛ mo do koraa.
title: Joseph Addison, 1672-1719.

name: CAN 136:2
verse:
. Eyiedzi pii a wɔnnkan na  
Wo dɔ dze nyɛɛn me kra.
Ansaana m'abofra koma
Hun nyia 'yiedzi n' fir no.
title: Joseph Addison, 1672-1719.

name: CAN 136:3
verse:
. Esian horow, fona na wu  
Ɔpae guu foo maa me,
Na dza ɔyɛ hu kyɛn yinom-
Akɔndɔbɔn n'efir.
title: Joseph Addison, 1672-1719.

name: CAN 136:4
verse:
. Akyɛdze mpempem, ɔsom bo 
Gye me ndaase daa daa,
Na W'enyi sɔ 'koma a ɔdze 
Dɛw gye dɛm akyɛdze n'.
title: Joseph Addison, 1672-1719.

name: CAN 136:5
verse:
. Mo nkwa ne mber nyinaa mu 
W'adɔe na m'bɛtaa do:
Na muwu so a, 'kyirkyir wiadzem'
M'bɔtow W'ayɛyi bio.
title: Joseph Addison, 1672-1719.

name: CAN 137:1
verse:
. Siar dasedzi- dɛ Jesus yɛ medze! 
Ao, Nyame enyimnyam nkahwɛ bɛn ny' i!
Nkwagye dzifo nye m', Nyame atɔdze;
No Sunsum awo m', bɔgyaa n' ahor m'.
 
  M'asɛm na mo ndwom ara nye yi, 
  Mekamfo m'Agyenkwa adzekyee nyina.
title: Frances Jan van Alstyne, 1820-1915.

name: CAN 137:2
verse:
. Ahobrɛasdze koraa, enyigye koraa, 
Ahotsetɛ epue m'enyi do wora;
Abɔfo fi sor sian ba bɔbɔ
Mbɔbɔrhu na dɔ ho amandzɛɛ.
title: Frances Jan van Alstyne, 1820-1915.

name: CAN 138:1
verse:
. Ao, bra ma yendzi dɛw,
Sɛ nkan n' meyɛ hianyi a,
Afei menya Nyame ho dɔ,
Ɔdɔ a ɔkyɛn sika.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 138:2
verse:
. Ao bra ma yendzi dɛw,
Sɛ nkan n' motɔɔ bahaw a,
Afei menya Otumfo a
N'abaw weɔn me dabaa.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 138:3
verse:
. Ao, bra ma yendzi dɛw,
Sɛ nkan n' mobɔɔ ekὸ a,
Nyame dze No dɔ atwe me
Dɛ mensan m'Egya fie.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 138:4
verse:
. Ao, bra ma yendzi dɛw,
N-kyɛ me kra reyew;
M'Agyenkwa Jesus abɔtwe m'
Wɔ bɔn na abɔnsam nsa.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 138:5
verse:
. Ao, bra ma yendzi dɛw,
Afei menya Nyɛnkὸ a
No dɔ kyɛn onua mpo no dɔ,
title: Unknown

name: CAN 139:1
verse:
. Ɔbra n' adandan nyina mu, 
Ahokyer nye ahotɔm',
M' akoma nye me gyirama
Beyi me Nyame ayɛw
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.

name: CAN 139:2
verse:
. M'botuw No nkwagye ho 'kodu 
Dɛ ahokyerfo nyina
Bɔhwɛ m' enya awerɛkyekyer,
Na hɔn yaw ahera.
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.

name: CAN 139:3
verse:
. O nye me nhuhor Ewuradze, 
Ma yɛntonton Ne dzin,
Mefrɛɛ No m'ahokyer mu no,
Ɔbae beyii m' fiir mu.
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.

name: CAN 139:4
verse:
. Nyame no dɔmtutuw twa hyia 
Atseneneefo tsenabea;
Hɔn a wɔtwer No mboa nyina 
Ɔma hɔn No nkwagye.
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.

name: CAN 139:5
verse:
. O, bra bɔsɔ No dɔ no hwɛ, 
Na woana bohu dɛ
Hɔn a wɔtwer No nokwar no,
Hɔn na wɔyɛ esiarfo.
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715.

name: CAN 140:1
verse:
. M' beyi mo Bɔfo ayɛw nkwaber m', 
Na ber a me ndze bɛyew wum no,
Medze tum kɛse bɛkamfo N':
M'ayɛyi nda nnkotwa mu da,
Nkwa na adwen na ahom wɔ hɔ 'i,
Anaa bɛkyebo wɔ do yi.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 140:2
verse:
. Siarfo nye nyia n'enyidar twer 
Israel Nyame! Ɔno yɛɛ wim'
Asaase, Po, nye dza ɔwɔm' nyina:
No nokwar tsim hɔ pintsinn daa;
Ɔgye afonafo, ɔhwɛ ehiafo,
Na N'anohoba nnyɛ gyan da.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 140:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 141:1
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 141:2
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 141:3
verse:
. Na ɔbaatan n'abadaa 
Befi ne ba ho ara da?
Nyew, ɔyɛ a no werɛ befir n';
Emidze, m'bɛkaa wo daa.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 141:4
verse:
. Emi Mo dɔ n' ɔnndan da, 
Ɔkrɔn kyɛn ɔsor m-po,
No mu dɔ kyɛn po no bun,
Ɔyɛ dzen, ɔkyɛn owu.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 141:5
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 142:1
verse:
. Ɔtra n-hum', Wo dɔ a ho wɔ na n' a, 
M'Agyenkwa Jesus; naaso me kra yi
Ɔpɛ dɛ ohu Wo dɔ no mbordo,
Ne trɛ, no war, no krɔn, no bun, na ne dzen
A ɔyɛ nyinaa.
title: Mary Sheckleton, 1827-83.

name: CAN 142:2
verse:
. Ɔtra n-kaa, Wo dɔ a ho wɔ na n' a, 
M'Agyenkwa Jesus; naaso m'ano yi
Pɛ dɛ dɔ a otum yi afɔdzi suro,
Na ɔwo dɔ no, ɔka kyerɛ abɔn a
Wɔbɛn, wɔtwem'.
title: Mary Sheckleton, 1827-83.

name: CAN 142:3
verse:
. Ɔtra ayɛyi, Wo dɔ a ho wɔ na n' a, 
M' Agyenkwa Jesus; naaso m'akoma yi
Ɔwɔ dɛ ɔkamafo dɔ a ɔhye, yɛ nwanwa a
Ɔdze mara mansotwenyi epin
Nyankopɔn nkyɛn n'.
title: Mary Sheckleton, 1827-83.

name: CAN 142:4
verse:
. Jesus Agyenkwa, fa Wo dɔ n' hyɛ m' ma! 
Gya m' ara, gya m' kɔ nkwa nsunyiwa n' ho;
Ma montɔ nkɔ noara ho wɔ gyedzim'
Na mma da biara pɛn onnkwetsir Wo
Mmfa beebi bio.
title: Mary Sheckleton, 1827-83.

name: CAN 143:1
verse:
. Me Jesus, modɔ W', minyim dɛ medze nye nye W', 
Wo ntsi migyaa bɔn ho enyigye nyinara;
Mo Pomfo domfo, m'Agyenkwa nye Woara,
Me Jesus, sɛ madɔ w' da a, ɔno nye ndɛ.
title: J. H. Dufell: The London Hymn Book, 1864.

name: CAN 143:2
verse:
. Modɔ W', osiandɛ 'Wo edzi kan adɔ m' 
Na epaa kyɛw maa m' wɔ Calvary dua no do;
Modɔ Wo wɔ nsoɛ kyɛw a esoae no ntsi,
Me Jesus, sɛ madɔ W' da a, ɔno nye ndɛ.
title: J. H. Dufell: The London Hymn Book, 1864.

name: CAN 143:3
verse:
. Mobɔdɔ W' wɔ nkwa mu, mobɔdɔ W' wɔ wum' 
Na meyi W' ayɛw ber a edom me nkwa,
Na ber a owu-bɔw egu mo do n', m'bɛse dɛ,
Me Jesus, sɛ madɔ W' da a, ɔno nye ndɛ.
title: J. H. Dufell: The London Hymn Book, 1864.

name: CAN 144:1
verse:
. 'Dɔfo, hom mma yɛndɔ: 
Dɔ fir Nyame;
Ɔdɔ Ne tsenabew pa 
Wɔ Nyame mu.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 144:2
verse:
. 'Dɔfo, hom mma yɛndɔ: 
Na hɔn a wɔdɔ n',
Hɔnara nko nye Ne mba a
Hɔn awoo fir sor.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 144:3
verse:
. 'Dɔfo, hon mma yɛndɔ: 
Na dɔ yɛ ahomgye,
Na obiara a onyi dɔ no',
Ɔnnyɛ siarfo.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 144:4
verse:
. 'Dɔfo, hom mma yɛndɔ; 
Dɔm' na kan wɔ,
Na nyia onnyi dɔ no,
Ɔtse sum mu.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 145:1
verse:
. Mema m'akoma do 
Ma W', me Gyefo;
'Wo nye m'adze nyina,
Na Wodze nye m'
Ana nkabɔm' dzendzen bi kyɛn iyi:
Dɛ mo Dɔfo dze nye m', na ɔyɛ medze.
title: Charles Edward Mudie, 1818-90.

name: CAN 145:2
verse:
. 'Kwan nyinam' Wodze nye m'; 
Na tsitsir dɛ,
Enam W'afɔrbɔ n' do
Eyɛ medze.
Wo dɔ nkyehoma n' adwer m' dɛɛdɛw bi,
Ɔdze me atakyer Wo ho dzendzen.
title: Charles Edward Mudie, 1818-90.

name: CAN 145:3
verse:
. M'afɔrbɔ Eguambaa, 
Medan Wo nwionn;
Dza mowɔm', meyɛm', na 
Minyim nyinam',
Dza mowɔ nyinara nnyɛ medze bio,
Mennda hɔ nndze moho; meyɛ Wodze.
title: Charles Edward Mudie, 1818-90.

name: CAN 145:4
verse:
. Mo Wura, meyɛ dɛn dze 
Biribi kam Wo?
Mber pa, anaa sika?
Anaa ahoɔdzen?
Medze dza ɔsom bo suma Wo dɛn,
Ber a 'Wo a esom bo 'dze Woho ama m'?
title: Charles Edward Mudie, 1818-90.

name: CAN 146:1
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ ɔtwe haahaw nsunwin ho 
Ber a oeguan afona n',
Dɛm na, me Nyame, me kra so
Haahaw hwehwɛ W'adom.
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715; Nicholas Brady, 1659-1726.

name: CAN 146:2
verse:
. Wo ho nsukɔm ɔdze me kra, 
O mo Nkwa Nyankopɔn,
Ao, dabɛn na m'bohu W'enyim
Me Nyame Hen Krɔnkrɔn!
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715; Nicholas Brady, 1659-1726.

name: CAN 146:3
verse:
. Na mindzi mbɔɔ nkodu dabɛn 
M'ahoɔdzen Nyankopɔn?
Mayɛ ankonam, makɛhyɛ
M'atwetwesifo nsa,
title: Nahum Tate, 1652-1715; Nicholas Brady, 1659-1726.

name: CAN 147:1
verse:
. Mobɔhom ha ara afebɔɔ 
Mbrɛ wo mfem' bɔgya n' wɔ;
M'enyidar, m'asɛm nyina nye yi,
Agyenkwa wui maa me.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 147:2
verse:
. M'Agyenkwa a 'ruwu, me Nyame, 
Bura a ehor bɔn fi,
Fa Wo bɔgyaa n' petse mo do
Ma mo ho ɔntsew krɔnn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 147:3
verse:
. Guar me, na ma menyɛ Wodze, 
Guar me, na yɛ medze 
Nnyɛ me nan nko, na me nsa ho,
Me tsirm', na m'akomam'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 148:1
verse:
. Israel Guanhwɛfo, na medze 
Me kra ne dɛw, n'ahwehwɛdze,
Mo 'koma haahaw hwehwɛ Wo,
Mo Kɔn dɔ dɛ menye Wo tsena;
Meper mehu mfunoma pa no,k
Mbrɛ hɔn a wotsie Guanhwɛfo n'
Wɔtwer Wo bom' na wodzidzi n',
Na ewia ne hyew nn-ka hɔn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 148:2
verse:
. Ao! kyerɛ me siar bea yi no do, 
Mbrɛ Wo nkorɔfo nyina tse,
Mbrɛ ahotsewfo dze dɛw hwɛ
Nyame a wɔabɔ N' mbeamudua mu n';
Da Wo dɔ nwanwa no edzi,
W'ahoguan, Wo wu wɔ dua n' do;
Fa me kra kɔ Calvary do,
Menye W' nhu amandze, ndzi konyim.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 149:1
verse:
. Ewuradze, yi Woho kyerɛ hɛn, 
Ber a yekyin wiadze;
Kasa kyerɛ hɛn akoma,
Ma Wo dɔ ndzɛw hɛn mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 149:2
verse:
. 'Nye hɛn kasa a, hɛn werɛ fir 
Aber, ɔberɛ dadwen;
Dwuma yɛ ahomgye, yaw yɛ dɛw,
Ber a, Nyame, ebɛn hɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 149:3
verse:
. Bra me nkyɛn mbɔ, m'adom Nyame, 
Ma m'akoma ndzi dɛw;
Makoma bɔbɔ no mu adze
Ama W', oetsie Wo ndze.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 149:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 150:1
verse:
. Ao, nkyɛ maatakyer Nyame ho, 
Meenya su a ɔdwe,
Kandzea ma ɔaakyerɛ kwan no a
Ɔdze m' kɔ Eguambaa n' nkyɛn.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 150:2
verse:
. Nhyira a ber a muhun Ewuradze n' 
Minyae no wɔ henfa?
Jesus ho yikyerɛ na N'asɛm
A muhunii n' wɔ hen?
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 150:3
verse:
. Asomdwee mber a mehu pɛn a! 
Mbrɛ ho nkaa dua yɛ dɛ a!
Na ndɛ me kra atɔ pan a 
Wiadze nntum nnhyɛ no ma.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 150:4
verse:
. Ao, Ebubur Krɔnkrɔn, san bra, 
Ahomgye ho Bɔfoe,
Mikyir bɔn a opiraa Wo n',
Na ɔpaam Wo m'akomam'.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 150:5
verse:
. Dza modɔ no mbordo biara, 
Mbrɛ no su tse biara,
Boa ma minyi n' W'ahengua ho,
Na monsom Wo nkotoo.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 151:1
verse:
. Ɔkɔm na nsukɔm dze m'; 
Jesus yɛ m'edziban:
Nkwa esutsen, pem fi
Ɔbotan no mu ma m'.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: CAN 151:2
verse:
. Ɔwo a eyɛ Paanoo, 
Ma m' daadaa edziban;
Dɛ mbrɛ enyɛn akra n',
Nyɛn m', ɔno mubowu.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: CAN 151:3
verse:
. Nokwar Wenyinaba, 
Ma monsɔ Wo dɛw nhwɛ;
Woara ma m' nkwa fofor,
Na fa dɔ nyɛn me kra.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: CAN 151:4
verse:
. Ber a m'akwantu hyɛɛ ase 
Mbɔntankyim' na mekyin:
Sor Edziban, nyɛn me;
Nyimpa Ba, yɛ me boa.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: CAN 152:1
verse:
. Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame, 
Wo nkyɛn ara!
Kaansa mbeamudua mpo
Na ɔma mo do a,
Mo ndwom dabaa nye dɛ
Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame,
Wo nkyɛn ara.
title: Sarah Flower Adams, 1805-48.

name: CAN 152:2
verse:
. Kaansa mirikyin mpo 
Ma wi akɔtɔ,
Ma adze so asa me,
Ma mesum bo a,
M'adaaso mu m'bepin
Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame,
Wo nkyɛn ara.
title: Sarah Flower Adams, 1805-48.

name: CAN 152:3
verse:
. Ma kwan m-bɛda hɔ a 
Wɔdze kɔ sor;
Dza edze ma m' nyina
Ehumbɔbɔr kwa;
Abɔfo refrɛfrɛ m'
Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame,
Wo nkyɛn ara.
title: Sarah Flower Adams, 1805-48.

name: CAN 152:4
verse:
. Ber a m'enyi betsetsew n', 
M'beyi W' ayɛw;
M'bodua m'awerɛhow mu
M'esi Nyame fi;
Menam me yawm' m'bepin
Wo nkyɛn ara, Nyame,
Wo nkyɛn ara!
title: Sarah Flower Adams, 1805-48.

name: CAN 153:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 153:2
verse:
. Memmper bio dɛ m'bɛsakyer hweeara 
Ansaana Dɔfo kɛse yi aba:
Misiesie n' yie dɛn ara a, ɔmmfata;
Misianka W' kakra so a, ɔnnsɛ koraa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 153:3
verse:
. Mbrɛ etse n' ara, fa W'ahotsew nye dɛw 
Bra dan mu bɔhwɛ mbrɛ no mu tse ara;
W'enyimnyam kɛse na m'ahohia ntsi
Munnsuro dɛ m'bɛgye W' asoɛ me fi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 154:1
verse:
. Mihia Wo Mber Nyina, 
Domfo Ewuradze;
Ndze bi nntse dɛ Wodze a,
Ɔma asomdwee. 

Mihia Wo, ao, mihia Wo, 
Mber nyina mihia Wo; 
M'Agyenkwa, Maba Wo hɔ, 
Hyira me sesei.
title: Annie Sherwood Hawks, 1835-1918.

name: CAN 154:2
verse:
. Mihia Wo mber nyina, 
Pinkyɛn me daa;
Ber a Ɔwo bɛn me n'
Mennyɛ bɔn da.
title: Annie Sherwood Hawks, 1835-1918.

name: CAN 154:3
verse:
. Mihia Wo mber nyina, 
Dɛw mu o, yaw mu o;
Bra ntsɛm bɛnye me ntsena,
Mma ɔbra annyɛ gyan.
title: Annie Sherwood Hawks, 1835-1918.

name: CAN 155:1
verse:
. Jesus, me Gyefo, Nua, Nyɛnko, 
M'adwendwen nyina da Wo do;
Adze nyina mu medan Wo:
Woara hyehɛ na gye m'asɔr.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 155:2
verse:
. Sɛ W'adom a ɔma nkwagye n' 
Na menya masɔ bi mahwɛ,
Sɛ Woara Wo Sunsum nye m' tse
Na ɔdze N'atsaban kata m' do a:
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 155:3
verse:
. Nna ma ɔnda ho ɔnhyɛ me dzen, 
Na mma onngyaa m' hɔ ara da,
Ma ɔmpa m' esian nye mbusu,
Onsie me kra ma ɔnyɛ fofor,
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 155:4
verse:
. Sɛ mofom fi kwan pa nom' a, 
Ma mentse Ne ndze wɔ m'ekyir
Dɛ, San, bodua wo kwan Christ mu,
Guan kɔ Christ hɔ, na bɔn abɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 155:5
verse:
. No ngo krɔnkrɔn a ofi sor 
Nda ho nkyekye mo werɛ, nkyerɛ m' kwan,
Nkɛpem dɛ m'akoma bɔgow
Na Noara dze dɔ bɛtsena mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 155:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 156:1
verse:
. Christ nsordafo, hom nsoɛr, 
Hom mmia hom akodze,
Nyɛ dzen wɔ tum a Nyame nam
No domankoma Ba n' do ma n'
Nyɛ dzen Dɔm Ewuradzem'
Na No tum ahoɔdzenm'
Nyia ɔtwer Jesus N'ahoɔdzen n' yɛ
Konyimdzifo mbordo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 156:2
verse:
. Hom ngyina No tum kɛsem' 
Mfa N'ahoɔdzen nyina nhyɛ
Na wɔmfa Nyame akodze n'
Mmia wɔ ɔko no mu;
Wɔayɛ adze nyina ewie n',
Na nkodzen abɔ adze n'
Hom nam Christ do eedzi konyim,
Ewiei n' hom eedzi mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 156:3
verse:
. Hom nsoɛr ntsia atamfo 
Wɔ mpu-na-mpu ko mu
Wɔnko ntsia mbɔnsam dɔmtutuw
Wɔ mbusu da nyinam'
Wɔnye sum mu mba nsi
Wɔnserew hɔn apam hun
Wɔmma ɔsor kan akodze
Ɔnye tsenenee nhyɛ hɔn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 157:1
verse:
. Memmfɛr dɛ m'bɛgye mo Wura atom' 
Na maper N'edwuma ho,
Mesuo N'asɛm ho enyidzim',
Ne mbeamudua ho enyimnyam n'.

  (Mbeamudua ho, mbeamudua ho, mbrɛ 
  midzii kan muhun kan, 
  Na m'akoma n'adzesoa n' pirewii fii hɔ; 
  Hɔ na menam gyedzim' muhum adze, 
  Na afei m'ahom ka mo ho daa.)
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 157:2
verse:
. Jesus, me Nyame! minyim No, 
Ne dzin nye m'adze nyina;
Ɔnnkɛma me kra afɛr da
Na m'enyidar ayew.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 157:3
verse:
. N'asɛm tsim hɔ dɛ N'ahengua 
Na obotum akora
Dza medze ahyɛ Ne nsa n' yie
Ekodu ekyir da n'.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 158:1
verse:
. Soɛr, Ewuradze N'abasa, soɛr! 
Fa Wo bɛkyebo tum no hyɛ;
Esoɛr a, hɛll 'henman wosow,
W'atamfo gu ebiritsi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 158:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 158:3
verse:
. Ewuradze, W'abaw du mbea nyina, 
No tum a ɔgye nkwa mmbɔ adze;
Eda ho nye Wo nkorɔfo tse
Egye hɔn fi ɔbra asorɛkyem'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 159:1
verse:
. Christian! mma mmpɛ ahomgye ndɛ 
Tow w' ahomgye adaaso n' gu;
Ewɔ atamfo finimfin:
                   Weɔn na sɔr.
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: CAN 159:2
verse:
. Etumfo nye akɛsefo 
Rotwe hɔn dɔm wɔ akono,
Wɔbɔkɔ wo ntoa awerɛfirm';
 	Weɔn na sɔr.
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: CAN 159:3
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: CAN 159:4
verse:
. Tsie hɔn a woedzi konyim n'  
Wɔrohwɛ mbrɛ isi ko;
Hɔn nyina yɛ ano kor se:
                    Weɔn na sɔr.
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: CAN 159:5
verse:
. Nkanka tsie w' Ewuradze, 
Ɔno a edɔ dɛ itsie n';
Fa N'asɛm sie w'akomam':
                    Weɔn na sɔr.
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: CAN 160:1
verse:
. Ao o, m'afɛ! hom nhwɛ frankaa
Rinyam wɔ sor hɔ!
Afei nkyidɔm riyi hɔnho,
Konyim abɛm hɛn.

      Wontsim aban n', na mereba,
      Jesus rinyam nsa;
      Wɔnto ano nse n' sor hɔ dɛ,
      W'adaworom yetsim n'.
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.

name: CAN 160:2
verse:
. Hwɛ dɔmtutuw a wɔreba,
Abɔnsam dzi kan:
Akatakyi rohwe ase,
Mbanyinndam pέ etu!
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.

name: CAN 160:3
verse:
. Hwɛ, konyim frankaa no rinyam!
Tsie, abɛn rehɛn,
Yɛdze hɛn Hen dzin bedzi nyim
Wɔ adɔm nyina do.
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.

name: CAN 161:1
verse:
. Wɔnko! wɔnko nyi dɔm, Jesus
nsordaafo,
Wɔntwer N'ehumbɔbɔr,
wɔntwer Nanosɛm;
Wɔmma Nsempa frankaa n' do
wɔ wim' nkyerɛ;
Wɔntrɛ mu daa ma aman n-
hwɛ ne fɛw.
Wɔnko nyi dɔm! ako-mbarimba,
Wɔnko! gyedɛ hom dzi konyim,
Wɔnko nyi dɔm! mma
wonngyaam' da;
Na ahomgye n' ayɛ homdze.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 161:2
verse:
. Sɛ ngyata na yɛbɛnye hɔn
ehyia mpo a,
Yerinngyina gyede Zion
abowano;
Daa nyina yɛhom do yɛkɔ hen
enyim,
Kodu Jordan do mbrɛ hɛn enyi
tua fie n'.
Wɔnko nyi dɔm! ako-mbarimba,
Wɔnko! gyedɛ hom dzi konyim,
Wɔnko nyi dɔm! mma
wonngyaam' da;
Na ahomgye n' ayɛ homdze.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 161:3
verse:
. Wɔnko! wɔnko nyi dɔm,
mbeamudua ho dɔm,
Wɔmpow enyigye na fona nyɛ
hom fɛw;
Wommiamia hom ntoa mu,
mmintsim hom mfowa yie;
Wondzi nyim ara nkɔ, wonko
mma hɛn Wura.
Wɔnko nyi dɔm! ako-mbarimba,
Wɔnko! gyedɛ hom dzi konyim,
Wɔnko nyi dɔm! mma
wonngyaam' da;
Na ahomgye n' ayɛ homdze.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 162:1
verse:
. Mma nngyaa mu mma ngyigye
Na ngyaamu yɛ bɔn,
Konyim kor bɔboa w' ma
Eedzi nyim bi so;
Ko mbarimbam' kɔ w'enyim
Hom w'apɛdze do,
Hwɛ Jesus ara daa,
Ɔdze w' bokodu.
Bisa Agyenkwa no hɔ mboa,
Ahoɔdzen nye akomatɔmu;
Ɔpe dɛ obɔboa wo,
Ɔdze w' bokodu.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 162:2
title: Unknown

name: CAN 163:1
verse:
. HƐN Nyame yɛ abankɛse
Akokyɛm nye akodze,
Amandze aba hɛn do dze,
Naaso ɔgye No nkorɔfo,
Tamfo n' rohwehwɛ hɛn,
Ɔpɛ hɛn mbusu pa;
Na no tum so ɔso,
Ndaadaa pii na ɔdze ko
Obi nnsɛ no wiadze ha.
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546.

name: CAN 163:2
verse:
. Nyimpa ahoɔdzen dze osuar,
Ɔnnkyɛr na yɛahwe ase;
Hɛn Gyefo nye Ɔbarimba a
Nyame eyi N' esi hɔ,
Epɛ ehu Ne dzin?
Wɔfrɛ No Jesus Christ,
Edɔm Ewuradze
No domankoma Ba;
Ne nsamu na konyimdzi wɔ.
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546.

name: CAN 163:3
verse:
. Sɛ mbɔnsam ahyɛ wiadze ma
Rohwehwɛ amen hɛn a,
Mma hom mma hɛn bo nntu koraa
Wonnkutum afa hɛn do,
Ma abɔnsam no bo mfuw,
Ɔnyɛ n'enyim kusuww;
Onnkotum ayɛ hwee,
Woebu no fɔ dada;
Asɛm kor bɔhwe n' ase.
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546.

name: CAN 164:1
verse:
. Tsetse Bo a wɔpaae maa me, 
Ma munguan nhunta Wo mu;
Ma nsu no nye bɛgya n' a
Ofi Wo mfem' repem no,
Ɔnyɛ bɔn edufanu,
Ɔmpa m' fɔ, ɔnsan mo ho.
title: Augustus Montague Toplady, 1740-78.

name: CAN 164:2
verse:
. Sɛ me nyinsu kyi daa mpo, 
Sɛ mo mbɔdzen nngow da mpo,
Yinom nnkotum bɔn wer tɔ;
Gyefo nye Wo nkotonoo:
Me nsam' nnyi akatua bi,
Metetar Wo mbeamudua n'.
title: Augustus Montague Toplady, 1740-78.

name: CAN 165:1
verse:
. Asomdwee pa, wɔ bɔn wiadze yi mu? 
Jesus bɔgya ɔwasa asomdwee.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: CAN 165:2
verse:
. Asomdwee pa, dwumadzi akyer do yi? 
Ebɛyɛ Jesus Ne pɛ nye ahomgye.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: CAN 165:3
verse:
. Asomdwee pa, yaw etwa ehyia hɛn yi? 
Jesus No bom' asomdwee ara nko.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: CAN 165:4
verse:
. Asomdwee pa, adɔfo apetse yi? 
Jesus kora hɛn do yi, hwee nnkɛyɛ hɛn.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: CAN 165:5
verse:
. Asomdwee pa, yennyim hɛn ndaamba yi? 
Yenyim Jesus, na ɔtse ahengua n' do.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: CAN 165:6
verse:
. Asomdwee pa, wu gyegye hɛn do yi? 
Jesus apansam wu na no tum nyina.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: CAN 166:1
verse:
. Onyame dua kwan sunsum mu 
Na ɔyɛ N'anwanwadze;
Ɔdze N'anamɔn taataa pom',
Ɔko ehum do nantsew.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 166:2
verse:
. Asaase no bun mu noho, 
Ɔdze nyansa nwanwa
Kora Ne nhyehyɛɛ pa a ɔsom bo n',
Ɔyɛ dza Noara pɛ.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 166:3
verse:
. Esiarfo a hom suro, hom nnhyɛ ahom, 
Ifua a hom suro n' kɛse n',
Mbɔbɔrhu ma, na ɔbɛpaa
Nhyira egu hom do.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 166:4
verse:
. Mma hom mmfa hom nyimpa-dwen mmbua 
Nyame, hom ntwer N'adom,
Ber a ɔaka N'enyim esi n'
Na N'ano serew hyɛm'
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 166:5
verse:
. No botae bɛber ntsɛmara, 
Ɔbɛhan mber nyina;
Kukuduuduw n' yɛ wen mpo a,
Nhyiren n' botu huam pa.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: CAN 167:1
verse:
. Wo kwan a; nnyɛ medze, 
Sɛ no mu kadoo mpo a,
Wankasa gye m' taataa;
Kyerɛ m' kwan a mundua mu.
No mu ye o, no mu muo o,
Ɔnoara na oye;
Ɔkyeakyea o, ɔtsen o,
Wɔdze kɔ W'ahomgyem'.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 167:2
verse:
. Mennkɛfa dza mepɛ; 
Wɔse m' mpo a mennkɛfa:
Mo Wura, Woara, fa ma m'
Na ɔayɛ kwan pa ama m'.
Ɔman a mohwehwɛ n'
Wodze a; na ma kwan a
Wɔdze kɔm' so nyɛ Wodze,
Ɔno m'bɔtɔ dɔnsuar.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 168:1
verse:
. Medze mo bɔn brɛ Wo 
Dza munntum ano bu,
Ama aahor ne nyina
Wɔ bɔgya bura no mu.
M'Agyenkwa, medze ne nyina brɛ W';
No dur hyɛ me kra do dodow.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 168:2
verse:
. Medze m'akoma brɛ Wo, 
'Koma a minnyim mu nsɛm;
Kɔhwinyi, kobɔnyi n',
Akoma bɔn ampa.
M'Agyenkwa, medze hyɛ Wo nsa
Ma m'akoma nsi pi mma Wo.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 168:3
verse:
. Medze m' dadwen brɛ Wo, 
Dadwen a munntum munnguan n'
Ama eesuo mo mu
Ama eeyi no hɔ.
M'Agyenkwa dɔfo, Wo nkyɛn na
Medze m'adzesoa yi meba.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 168:4
verse:
. Medze me yaw brɛ Wo, 
Yaw a munntum nnka n' a;
Ɔnngye dɛ meka mpo,
Ɔnngye dɛ meka mpo,
Woara nyim ne nyina.
M'Agyenkwa a Woara so nyim yaw,
Medze m'awerɛhow brɛ Wo.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 168:5
verse:
. Medze me dɛw brɛ Wo, 
Dɛw a Wo dɔ dze ana m',
Dɛ memfa nyɛ atwer a 
Mofow mipinkyɛn Wo.
Gyefo, Woara tɔɔ ne nyina maa m';
Medze ne nyina gu W'enyim.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 169:1
title: Thomas Rawson Taylor, 1807-85.

name: CAN 169:2
title: Thomas Rawson Taylor, 1807-85.

name: CAN 169:3
verse:
. M'Agyenkwa Ne nkyɛn hɔ-
Sor nye me fie-
Ɔbɛhyɛ m' enyimnyam,
Sor nye me fie;
Eyiefo nye esiarfὸ a
Modɔ hɔn nyina wɔ hɔ;
Hɔ na mo so m'bɔhom,
Sor nye me fie.
title: Thomas Rawson Taylor, 1807-85.

name: CAN 170:1
verse:
. MEDA Jesus abawm' sɔnn,
Meda No bo mu komm,
No dɔ no kata mo do,
Me kra bɔhom hɔ komm.
Tsie! Abɔfo hɔn ndze a;
Wɔdze rotow ndwom frɛ m',
Fir enyimnyam sar no do,
Fir jasper po n' egya.

      Meda Jesus abawn' sɔnn,
      Motwer No bo mu komm,
      No dɔ no kata mo do,
      Me kra bɔhom hɔ komm.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 170:2
verse:
. Meda Jesus abawn' sɔnn,
Mefi kɔdaannda nsa,
Mefi wiadze ngyigye nsa,
Bɔn nnkotum ahaw m' hɔ.
Aka nsɔhwɛ kumaabi,
Aka nyinsu kumaabi,
Ma meefi awerɛhow nsa,
Ma meefi suro nsa.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: CAN 171:1
verse:
. Metse dɛ Gyefo n' se,
"W' ahoɔdzen suar ampa;
Na dwen do weɔn na sɔr,
Fa Me yɛ w'adze nyina."

     Jesus tuaa ne nyina,
     Ne nyina fir Noara;
     Bɔn egu mo ho fi dɛnn,
     Ɔahor ma ayɛ fitaa.
title: E.M. Hall.

name: CAN 171:2
verse:
. Ewùradze, menyà ehu
Dɛ Wo nkotsee Wo tum
Na otu kwata bɔr,
Na ɔnam 'koma bo.
title: E.M. Hall.

name: CAN 171:3
verse:
. 'Midze, minnyi yie bi a
Medze bɛgye W'adom;
M'bɔhor me ntar fitaa
Wɔ Eguambaa bɔgyaa mu.
title: E.M. Hall.

name: CAN 171:4
verse:
. Da bi a me kra bɔsoɛr
Mo wumpa dὸ afow sor,
"Jesus tuaa ne nyina!"
Begyigye wim' hɔ nyina.
title: E.M. Hall.

name: CAN 172:1
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: CAN 172:2
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: CAN 173:1
verse:
. Mber pii na maka n' mo mu; 
Dɛ, Woana bɔfow sor,
Akɛfa Ewuradze Christ,
Dze No esian famu?
Adwendwen dze me botu,
Ma mekohu Noara
Mbrɛ abɔfo yi No ayɛw,
Wonya adzekyee nwoaraba n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 173:2
verse:
. Mber pii na maka n' mo mu: 
Woana besian bun n' mu,
Akɛfa Ewuradze Christ,
Efi ewufom' aba?
Medze nokwar mbrɛahoadze
Siesie m'akoma mu dze a,
Christ bɛhɛn mo mu hɔ ntsɛm,
Nye me abɛtsena daa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 174:1
verse:
. Gyedzinyi, twer No, twer No,
Sɛ ko n' kyer do dɛn arà a;
Ɔyɛ dέn arà a ibedzi nyim,
Wo Nyame b]ko ama w'.

     Twer No, twer No,
     Sɛ sum n' yɛ hu dɛn ara a;
     Twer No, twer No,
     Na adzekyee no abɛn.
title: Eliza A. Walker.

name: CAN 174:2
verse:
. Twer No, na mbusu n' rebɛn,
Ngyigye dzendzen rebɛn;
Obokutow wo arta
Ɔbra n'awor huhu n'.
title: Eliza A. Walker.

name: CAN 175:1
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, kyerɛ hɛn ma yɛnsɔr yie, 
Yɛmfia enyindzi na suro:
Kaansa yɛyɛ dɛtse na nso a,
Otwar dɛ yɛbɛn Wo.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 175:2
verse:
. Yegyaa sɔr a na yeedzi emia: 
Dom hɛn tua ma yɛnsɔr!
Na yɛroboa hɛnho nye W' ehyia a,
Ewuradze, hyia hɛn kwan.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 175:3
verse:
. Ma hɛn ahobrɛadze ɔnye 
Bɔn ho nnuho krɔnkrɔn,
Awerɛhyɛmu dzendzen a ɔma
Yɛtse Wo ndze nya nkwa.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 175:4
verse:
. Dom hɛn gyedzi wɔ Afɔr a 
No nko tum pata bɔn n';
Ma yɛmfa enyidar enyi
Ntsim Christ n-ko ara do.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 175:5
verse:
. Abotar a 'kyɛr dɛn ara a 
Ɔweɔn, ɔtweɔn na osu;
Mbanyinndam a osie hɛn kra
Na 'ruku n' mpo a ɔtwer Wo.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 176:1
verse:
. YƐBA W'ahengua enyim
Bobu ntwɛr totɔ sѐrɛ Wo a,
Wo dɔ ntsi yέ aso ma hɛn;
Jesus krɔnkrɔn, tsie hɛn.
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.

name: CAN 176:2
verse:
. 'Wo a egye ndzebɔnyɛfo,
Na hor hɔn ho fi nyina,
Fa Wo bɔgyaa san hɛn ho:
Jesus krɔnkrɔn, tsie hɛn.
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.

name: CAN 176:3
verse:
. Ma yɛnhyɛ hɛn honam do,
Ma yendzi wiadze do nyim,
Kã abɔnsam gu ma hɛn:
Jesus krɔnkrɔn, tsie hɛn.
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.

name: CAN 176:4
verse:
. Sɛ awѐrɛhow hyɛ hɛn do,
Sɛ yarba tsew tɔ hɛn do,
Sɛ owu dze hɛn rokɔ a:
Jesus krɔnkrɔn, tsie hɛn.
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.

name: CAN 177:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 177:2
verse:
. Asomdwee Hen!
Ɔbɔn no dɔm abɛn!
Naaso yɛwɔ Wo nsam' a hwee nnyɛ hɛn.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 177:3
verse:
. Asomdwee Hen!
Yehia Wo daa nyina,
Dɛ nkwa na owu mu nye hɛn ntsena.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 178:1
verse:
. Me kra nam mo Pomfo no do, 
Efi owu mprɛnu no nsa;
Woeyi m'enyi wɔ nyinsuwa mu,
Woeyi m'anan so efi hɛll.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 179:1
verse:
. Bɛkyebo Kan! Bɛkyebo Kan! 
Mbrɛ kra ho wɔ dɛ ɔtsew
Wɔ W'enyim a, Ehuntahunii;
Ɔmmpem adze, mbom ɔdze dɛw
Tum gyina na ɔhwɛ Wo.
title: Thomas Binney, 1798-1874.

name: CAN 179:2
verse:
. W'ahengua ho esunsum dze 
Tum sɔw siar hyɛnn no;
Na hɔn nko na hɔn su tse dɛm,
Osiandɛ wonnhum bɔn wiadze a
Ɔtse dɛ iyi pɛn.
title: Thomas Binney, 1798-1874.

name: CAN 179:3
verse:
. Ao, m'bɛyɛ dɛn na 'mi a wɔawo m' 
Sum mu, m'adwen kusuww,
Metum mepue, Nyame, Wenyim,
Na mo sunsum kwatserkwaa yi
Asɔw nserɛmɛn hyɛnn no?
title: Thomas Binney, 1798-1874.

name: CAN 179:4
verse:
. Kwan bi wɔ hɔ ma nyimpa dɛ 
Ɔdze fow kɔ sor fie;
Afɔr bi a wɔabɔ ama hɛn,
Nyame enyim Twitwagyefo,
Sunsum krɔnkrɔn No tum.
title: Thomas Binney, 1798-1874.

name: CAN 180:1
verse:
. Agyenkwa Jesus, fi sor bra! 
Fa W'adom krɔnkrɔn n' bɔboa me:
Pra wiadze dɔ fi m'akomam'
Na siesie mu fa ma Woho.
title: Antoinette Bourignon, 1616-80;

name: CAN 180:2
verse:
. O, ma Wo krɔnkrɔnyɛ nhyɛ n' ma  
Na mo sunsum no kɔn ndɔ Wo!
Ewia o, anago, o, me pɛ kor
Nye dɛ minya Wo midzi mee.
title: Antoinette Bourignon, 1616-80;

name: CAN 180:3
verse:
. Kwan a m'Agyenkwa, W'anamɔn 
Hyerɛn mu n', nna m'boduam' mbrɛhoadzem';
Minnketsie na mennkɛka dɔ
Fofor bi ho asɛm dɛ Wodze n'.
title: Antoinette Bourignon, 1616-80;

name: CAN 180:4
verse:
.	Me kra a metu mahyɛ Wo nsa 'i, 
Mma enyigye huhuw nnyam' kyɛpɛn:
Woara fa, na Ewɔ ho kwan
Dɛ akoma n' nyina No Wura.
title: Antoinette Bourignon, 1616-80;

name: CAN 180:5
verse:
. Ɔwo nko ara na mutum, 
Medze enyigye krɔnn dɔ Wo;
Egyigye kɛse bɛn nye yi
Dɛ muhu dɛ edze m' yɛ Wodze!
title: Antoinette Bourignon, 1616-80;

name: CAN 181:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 181:2
verse:
. Dza ɔyɛ dzen sen adze nyina 
Nye dɛ m'begyaa bɔn yɛ koraa;
Naaso ne yɛ nnyɛ dzen, minyim:
Jesus, hwɛ Wo nokwaredzi no!
Sɛ biribiara nnyɛ dzen mma Wo a,
Adze nyina ne yɛ nnyɛ dzen mma m'
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 181:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 182:1
verse:
. Ao, nkyɛ meenya 'koma a bɔn nnyim  
Dze eyi Nyame ayɛw!
Dza ɔtse Wo bɔgyaa no tum,
Bɔgya a wɔkae gui maa m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 182:2
verse:
. Akoma a ɔdwe, bɔbɔfo, 
Mo Pomfo N'ahengua,
Mbrɛ Christ n-ko na ɔkasa,
Mbrɛ Jesus nko dzi hen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 182:3
verse:
. Akoma brɛfo a ɔtwer Wo, 
Nokwafo a no mu tsew;
'Koma a nkwa anaa wu nntum mmpaa
Mmfi nyia ɔtsem' no ho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 182:4
verse:
. Akoma a ɔasakyer koraa, 
Na Nyame dɔ ahyɛm' ma;
Odzi mu, na no mu tsew koraa,
Nyame, ɔnye Wo sɛ!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 183:1
verse:
. Mo Wùra Jesus, mo kɔn dɔ dɛ midzi mu!
Morohwehwɛ dɛ etsena mo mu daa.
Dwuruw abosom, yi atamfo edzi,
Guar m' sesei ma monhoa dέ esukwankyɛba.

      Monhoa fitaa, nyew, monhoa fitaa,
      Guar m' sesei ma monhoa dɛ esukwankyɛba.
title: J. Nicholson.

name: CAN 183:2
verse:
. Jesus, mma efifidze biara nn-ka,
Fa Wo bɔgyaa botu nkekaaba nyina;
Dɛm ahohor ntsi mopow adze nyina,
Guar m' sesei ma monhoa dɛ esukwankyɛba.
title: J. Nicholson.

name: CAN 183:3
verse:
. Jesus, fi sor ahengua do tὸ enyi hwɛ m',
Boa me ma mombɔ afɔr a odzi mu;
Medze moho nye dza mowɔ nyina ma Wo,
Guar m' sesei ma monhoa dέ esunkwankyɛba.
title: J. Nicholson.

name: CAN 183:4
verse:
. Jesus, yi ntsi na mokotow mesѐrɛ Wo,
Ewùradze, mokosɔw W'ananadze ha;
Me gyedzi enyi tua dɛ Wo bɔgyaa repem,
Guar m' sesei ma monhoa dέ esukwankyɛba.
title: J. Nicholson.

name: CAN 184:1
verse:
. Mo Wùra Jesus, W'ahoɔfɛw n'
Na mo kɔn dɔ dɛ m'bohu;
Wo suban, W'adwen fɛɛfɛw n'
Mepɛ mahwɛ mpu-na-mpu.
Hue W'adom gu me kra do,
Mo mu bɔn nyina popo.
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.

name: CAN 184:2
verse:
. Obiara nnkenyà ahotɔ,
Gyedɛ Woara tsena no mu.
Tsew m'adwen ho, ma me dɔ,
Ma m' Nyame dɔ a odzi mu.
Ao, Gyefo dɔfo, yɛ ntsɛm,
Yɛ ntsɛm fa Woho bɛkyɛ m'.
title: Francis C.F. Grant, 1894-1895.

name: CAN 185:1
verse:
. Egya, megye dzi pi 
Dɛ eyɛ mbɔbɔrhufo:
'Bɛsan me kra fɔdzifo n' ho,
Na ayɛ me fofor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 185:2
verse:
. Dɛm a, Jesus ntsi, bra, 
Ma m'akoma mu ntsew:
Botwa mo fona nyina do,
Na ma mingyaa bɔn yɛ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 185:3
verse:
. Adom do na menam 
Mesan meba Wo hɔ:
Ewuradze, to m'akoma pan
Na krɔnkrɔnyɛ nhyɛ n' ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 185:4
verse:
. Mosɔr mberɛw mu serɛ tum, 
Hyɛ W'ahendzi no ma
Ndɛ a wɔfrɛ no n-dɛ yi,
Na mennkɛyɛ bɔn bio.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 185:5
verse:
. Munntum nnhor m'akoma, 
Gyedɛ megye Wo dzi,
Na motweɔn Wo bɔgyaa a ɔma 
Wansayɛ krɔnkrɔn no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 186:1
verse:
. Minyim dɛ mo Pomfo tse ase, 
Na ɔsɔr ma me daa nyina;
Ɔma No dɔ ho sɛnkyerɛdze,
Eyiedzi ahobadze a.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 186:2
verse:
. Muhu N' dɛ ɔrema me tsir do, 
Ɔdze nkwagye abɛn ha,
W'enyim yɛ me dehye ampaara,
Na ɔnnkɛkyɛr na ɔaba.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 186:3
verse:
. Ɔpɛ dɛ meyɛ hotsewnyi; 
'Bɛnadze siw Ne pɛ kwan?
N'adom pamfo a ɔwɔ mo mu n'
Ɔbɛhyɛ m' ma ampaara
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 186:4
verse:
. Jesus W'asɛm na midzi do; 
Me gyedzi nyina nye dɛ
Mo Wura, ebɛsan na agye m',
Ama Woara Woho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 187:1
verse:
. Wodze daa! Ɔdɔ Nyame, 
Fi sor W'ahenguam tsie hɛn;
Yɛnyɛ Wodze afebɔɔ,
Wɔ ha na mbersantsen nyinam'.
title: Mary Fawler Maude, 1819-1913.

name: CAN 187:2
verse:
. Wodze daa! n-kwa Wura, 
Kora hɛn wɔ bra aperdzim';
Wo nye Nkwa n', Nokwar n' na Kwan n',
Gya hɛn kɔ kan man no mu.
title: Mary Fawler Maude, 1819-1913.

name: CAN 187:3
verse:
. Wodze daa! Ao, esiarfo 
Bɛn nye hɔn a wɔhom Wo mu!
Gyefo, Weɔmfo, Sor Nyɛnko,
Ao, twitwa gye hɛn kɔ ewiei!
title: Mary Fawler Maude, 1819-1913.

name: CAN 187:4
verse:
. Wodze daa! Oguanhwɛfo, 
Wo nguan a wɔyɛ mberɛw;
Woara kora hɔn yie,
Fa W'ayamuyie dom hɛn nyina.
title: Mary Fawler Maude, 1819-1913.

name: CAN 188:1
verse:
. Asodzi da mo do
Dɛ miyi Nyame ayɛw,
Megye me kra a onnwu da nkwa,
Na mema ɔsɛ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 188:2
verse:
. Mosom mbersantsen yi, 
Midze dwuma a wɔahyɛ m',
Ao, nkyɛ medze m'ahom nyina 
Maayɛ mo Wura Ne pɛ!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 188:3
verse:
. Fa nhwɛyie bɔ me ban 
Ma mentsena dɛ ihu m';
Na, mo Wura, siesie Wo somfo
Na meebu nkontaa pa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 189:1
verse:
. Gyefo, Ɔwo, dɔ ntsi 
Iwui maa me,
Ɔmmfata dɛ medze,
Hweeara kam Wo;
Dɔm', me kra bɔkotow W',
M'akoma edzi ne nsew do,
Na ɔabɔ afɔr bi,
Ama W' sesei.
title: Sylvanus Dryden Phelps, 1816-95.

name: CAN 189:2
verse:
. Mbɔbɔr egua n' enyim 
Idzi ma me,
Jesus, me gyedzi to
N'enyi hwɛ Wo:
Boa m' ma monsoa mbeamudua n',
Mombɔ Wo dɔ n' dawur,
Montow ndwom, mbɔ mpaa bi
Mma Wo sesei.
title: Sylvanus Dryden Phelps, 1816-95.

name: CAN 189:3
verse:
. Ma m' nokwar 'koma a, 
Ɔsɛ Wodze N',
Na dabiara  a otwam'
Eehu me dɛ
Mahyɛ dɔ dwuma bi ase,
Mayɛ ayamuyie bi,
Matwe kobɔnyi bi,
Medze ama W'.
title: Sylvanus Dryden Phelps, 1816-95.

name: CAN 190:1
verse:
. Nyan, soɛr, yɛ dɔ na edwuma, 
Nnoma asoɛr rusu,
Bɔsu atɔ egu nhaban do,
Wiadze nyina asoɛr
Rihyira, Nkwa Wura Ne Mafo
Ɔhobrɛadzefo No.
title: Geoffrey Anketell Studdert-Kennedy, 1883-1929.

name: CAN 190:2
verse:
. Bra, ma wo ndze mfora hɔn dzem', 
Ka mu bi yi N' ayɛw;
Hwɛ mbrɛ ewia a ofir tsetse,
Asoɛr rehyerɛn dzendzen!
Dɛm na ma Jesus dɔ m'bɔsɔ
Gya wɔ w' akoma mu.
title: Geoffrey Anketell Studdert-Kennedy, 1883-1929.

name: CAN 191:1
verse:
. Nyame asomfo, hom nsoɛr! 
Hom n-tow nsɛmhun ngu!
Hom mfa 'koma, adwen, ndamyɛ
Mbɔsom ahemfo Hen!
title: William Pierson Merrill, 1867-

name: CAN 191:2
verse:
. Nyame asomfo, hom nsoɛr! 
N'ahendzi ekyim dodow;
Hom mma enuadɔ nda edzi,
Na sum nye manso nkɔ.
title: William Pierson Merrill, 1867-

name: CAN 191:3
title: William Pierson Merrill, 1867-

name: CAN 192:1
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 192:2
verse:
. Yɛ ara, ɔnnkɛyɛ gyam bi, 
Dza 'yew n' ha n', fa n' mfaso wɔ sor:
Nɛndze nnkamfo w', mmpɛ w', wommbu w' bi;
Owura pen wo; nyimpa nye bɛn?
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 192:3
verse:
. Yɛ ara, ber a kan wɔ do yi, 
Wiadze edwumayɛ ber resa:
Mma nnyɛ akwadwerɛ, yɛ w'edwuma ntsɛm;
Wonnsi n' dɛm twe sunsum ekyir.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 192:4
verse:
.  Sum ruku nɛndze a wɔnye W' tse, 
Dɛ wonnyi enyidar wɔ wum';
Ma gya no do, na ka n' kɛse,
Gya a ɔma mbrɛ sum wɔ yɛ kan n'.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 192:5
verse:
. Yɛ ara, mma mberɛ, weɔn na sɔr, 
Wɔdze nyansa twe kra ekyir;
Sir wiadze bra ne tsempɔn yim'
Pon akobɔfo ma wɔmbra.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 193:1
verse:
. Kyerɛ m' kwan, Nyame Tumfo,
Ma mundu botae n' ho;
Mutu me nan a ɔnnyɛ,
Na Wo nna wɔdze Wo yɛ
Bɔ m'akɔndɔ mbeamuduam'
Na gye me pɛ fi me nsam'.
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: CAN 193:2
verse:
. Kyerɛ m'kwan, 'Hoɔdzen Farbaa,
'Nnyim' a meyɛ a, ɔnnyɛ da
Mbrɛ metse na dza mowɔ
Nnkotum dze m'aba Wo hɔ.
'Wo nye Sahen, mo Wura
'Mi, meyɛ akowaa koraa.
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: CAN 193:3
verse:
. Kyerɛ m' kwan, m' Egya Papa,
Na Wo som yɛ dɛw ampa.
Sɛ mennya Wo, mennhu Wo,
Mennhyia Wo, Nyame Dɔfo,
Ao, nkyɛ matɔ dɔnsuar koraa
Emi a me gyedzi suar.
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: CAN 194:1
verse:
. Ewuradze, Wo dzinm' na misim', 
Mikedzi me daa daa dwuma,
Wo nko na mesua dɛ m'bɔhwɛ W'
Wɔ dza modwen, meka, meyɛm'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 194:2
verse:
. Edwuma a Wo nyansaa akyerɛ n' 
Ao, ma mempra mo mu nyina nyɛ,
Munhu Wo mo ndwuma nyinam',
Na menyɛ Wo pɛ a ɔsɛ n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 194:3
verse:
. Ma memfa Wo ngyina me nyimfa, 
'Wo a W'enyi tua mo mu nyina,
Na mindzi dwuma a ebɛkyerɛ m',
Muntu mo ndwuma nyina nhyɛ Wo nsa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 194:4
verse:
. Ma monsoa Wo kɔndua harhar n' 
Na ber biara mohweɔn, monsɔr,
Na monhwɛ bɛkyebo ndzɛmba,
Nyɛ ntsɛm ndu W'enyimnyam da n' mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 195:1
verse:
. Ao, mo Wura, ma menye W' nnantsew 
Som dwumadzi mbrɛadze kwan mu;
Kyerɛ m' W'esumasɛm, boa m' ma monsɔw,
Dwumadzi ne yaw, dadwen no dur;
Boa me ma memfa dɔ kasa
Mpuhim akoma nyaanyaa bi:
Kyerɛ me ma mingya akobɔfo,
Memfa hɔn nsi sor kwan no mu.
title: Washington Gladden, 1836-1918.

name: CAN 196:1
verse:
. M'egya, minyim me bra nyina 
Akyekyɛm' ama me,
Na nsakyer a otwar dɛ ɔba n'
Munnsuro dɛ m'bohu;
Dza meserɛ nye adwendahɔ a
Ɔper sɔ W'enyi daa.
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: CAN 196:2
verse:
. Meserɛ Wo adwendwen ɔdɔ a 
Ɔyɛ aweɔn ho nyansa,
Dze ma ahomkafo enyigye,
Pata nyinsuwakyifo;
Ɔnye 'koma a ɔpow noho
Na ɔtse ma binom so.
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: CAN 196:3
verse:
. Monnhwehwɛ ɔpɛ ɔnnda hɔ komm, 
Odzi akɔnaaba,
Ɔhwehwɛ akɛsedze ɔayɛ
Na oehu esumasɛm;
Mepɛ dɛ meyɛ abɔtoaba a
Woara gye me taataa.
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: CAN 196:4
verse:
. Wiadze mu mbrɛ m'bɛfa biara, 
No mu dzibew biara,
Menye nkorɔfo edzi nkitaho a
Meper ara ma oeenyin,
Na medze ahobrɛadze nye dɔ
Mayɛ Mo Wura edwuma.
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: CAN 196:5
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: CAN 197:1
verse:
. Hom a hom enyi tsim 
Zion kwan do, hom mbra,
Wɔmma yɛnyɛ kor nyi
Hɛn Wura No ayɛw;
Wɔmma yentu ntsen Jesus mu
Nkɛpem dɛ yebopue N'enyim.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 197:2
verse:
. Mber nyina yɛda ho 
Tow kɔ hɛn man no ho,
Kɔ sor kokwaa no ho
Kwantunyi fonafo fie;
Sor Jerusalem fofor no
Ɔdomankoma dɔ fie no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 197:3
verse:
. Ma daa nyina yennya 
Gyedzi ho asomdwee,
Dɛ woeyi hɛn efi
Bɔn, wiadze, wu, na hɛllm';
Hɛn yɛbɔkɔ hɛn Egya fie,
Hɔ yeekehyia hɛn Nua panyin n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 198:1
verse:
. Bethel Nyame, 'Wo a Wo nkorɔfo 
Dan Wo na wonya dzi;
Ɔwò a igyaa tsetse mpanyin
Hɔn akwantu nyinam'.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: CAN 198:2
verse:
. Yɛdze nsewdzi na mpaabɔ ba 
W'adom ahengua enyim;
Hɛn egyaam Nyame, yɛserɛ Wo, yɛ
Hɔn mba so hɛn Nyame.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: CAN 198:3
verse:
. Ɔbra n'akwan nyinara mu 
Gye hɛn anamɔn taataa;
Ma hɛn hɛn daadaa edziban
Na hɛn efuradze so.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: CAN 198:4
verse:
. O trɛ W'atsaban wɔ hɛn do 
Kɔ hɛn akwantu ewiei,
Na hɛn akra eetum edu
Hɛn Egya fie asomdweem'.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: CAN 199:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 200:1
verse:
. Agyedzifo hɔn Kwankyerɛfo a  
lgya sor akwantufo kwan,
Bra na enye hɛn so mbɛtsena,
Yɛpɛ yɛatwer Wo nkotonoo,
Dze hɛn sunsum adan Wo nko
Ber a yɛnam ɔbra kwan mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 200:2
verse:
. Ahɔho nye amamforafo, 
Wiadze ha ɔnnyɛ hɛn tsenabew;
Na yetwa mbusu bɔnsa yim',
Yɛper dɛ yebohu W'enyim,
Yɛpɛ ntsɛm yeedu hɛn kurom',
Hɛn domakoma fie wɔ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 200:3
verse:
. Yennyi mantsimadze wɔ ha,
Yɛhwɛ kurow a wonnhu no kwan;
Yɛhom do nantsew kɔ noho,
Yereper yeedu kan mbew no do,k
Jerusalem kurow krɔnkrɔn a ɔ
Tsease Nyame ɔkyekyeree n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 200:4
verse:
. Yɛdze abotar tu empire n', 
Yegya fona wiadze 'i ekyir:
Fi ahoɔdzenm' kɔ ahoɔdzenm',
Hwehwɛ Jerusalem fofor n';
Hɛn mbɔdzembɔ nyina nye dɛ,
Yenya Jerusalem fofor n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 200:5
verse:
. 'Wo a asoa hɛn bɔn nyina kɔ, 
Na adom hɛn bɔnfakyɛ kwa,
Yɛnam Wo do kɔ hɛn sor fie,
Yɛdze adwontow yɛsan Zion;
Hɛn 'nyimnyam Hen N'ahenkurow no,
Yɛrotow ndwom nna ɔrebɛn hɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 201:1
verse:
. Gya hɛn, ɔsor Egya, gya hɛn 
Wɔ wiadze po pramee do,
Gya hɛn, weɔn hɛn, kora hɛn, nyɛn hɛn,
Yennyi boafo dɛ Wo nko,
Naaso yɛwɔ nhyira nyinak
Sɛ Nyame ne hɛn Egya a.
title: James Edmeston

name: CAN 201:2
title: James Edmeston

name: CAN 202:1
verse:
. Gya m', Kan dɔyɛfo wɔ sum a etwa ehyia yim' 
Gya m' ara kɔ!
'Nago n' yɛ sum, menye fie ntam' so war;
Gya m' ara kɔ!
Weɔn m'anamɔn, mimmbisa dɛ munhu
Mbrɛ kan hɔ tse, namɔn kor ara ma m'.
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.

name: CAN 202:2
verse:
. Nkyɛ menntse dɛm, monnsɔɔr pɛn dɛ Woara 
Gya m' ara kɔ.
Nkyɛ mefa mo kwan, na muhum', afei
Woara gya m' ara kɔ!
Modɔɔ apɔmpɔmpɛ, na musuro mpo a,
Ntsɛn hyɛɛ me ma, mma nnkaa mfe a-etwam' kɔ.
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.

name: CAN 203:1
title: William Williams, 1717-91.

name: CAN 203:2
verse:
. Bue nsunyiwa hyɛnhyɛnn n' sesei, 
Mbrɛ yarsa nsu fi pem no;
Ma ogya na mununkum fadum
Ngya m' m'akwantu nyina mu:
Gyefo tumfo!
Yɛ mo mboa na me kyɛm daa.
title: William Williams, 1717-91.

name: CAN 204:1
verse:
. O adom Hen, fi sor ahengua n' do 
Fa dɔ hwɛ na tsie hɛn mbɔbɔr su.
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.

name: CAN 204:2
verse:
. Hwɛfo pà a edze bɔgya tɔɔ Wo nguan, 
Kora Wo nguankuw a wɔnnkyɛr kwan fom.
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.

name: CAN 204:3
verse:
. O Pomfo pa, Wo wu mu na agye hɛn: 
Ma abɔn awerɛhofo daa nkwa.
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.

name: CAN 204:4
verse:
. Sor Edziban, yɛdze Wo nyɛn hɛnho: 
Pin bɔboa hɛn akra hɛn hia ber mu.
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.

name: CAN 204:5
verse:
. Apatasu, ndzebɔnyɛfo Dɔfo, 
Edɛw na siar nsunyiwa a ɔnnsa da.
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.

name: CAN 204:6
verse:
. Ao, fa sor adom kyekye hɛn werɛ; 
Yi W'enyim fɛɛfɛw n' enyimnyam kyerɛ.
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.

name: CAN 204:7
verse:
. Adzekyeem' mununkum, adzesaam' ogya, 
Bɛn hɛn na dan hɛn sum ma ɔnyɛ kan.
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.

name: CAN 204:8
verse:
. Nye hɛn nnantsew, nye hɛn kwan daa daa, 
Hɛn nkwam' na wum' Werɛkyekyer, Tum, Gyafo.
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.

name: CAN 205:1
verse:
. DZEBƆNYƐNYI kɔbesae a mahaw,
Ɔdomankoma, mma nnto me seraha.
Ɔbra n'ehum rutu, kwanm' ayɛ kɔnn,
Ɔkra no Kwangyafo, gya m' kodu sɔnn.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 205:2
verse:
. Gya m' kodu fie, me kra no korabew,
Mbrɛ ankonam bɔbɔfo biara nnyew.
Me bra n'ewiei to m' a, Onyankopɔn,
Samanadze Kanea, gya m' kodu sɔnn.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 205:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 205:4
verse:
. Sum mu etumfo pii risi me mpa,
Woetwa ayer m'; minnya beebi memfa;
Naaso ber a medan Wo Nyame dɔ n',
M'adɔntsenhen tumfo! gya m' kodu sɔnn.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 205:5
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 206:1
verse:
. Ebufuw da! Ao, nyinsuwa da! 
Dza nkɔnhyɛfo kae n' abam',
Sor nye asaase rotɔ nso.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:2
verse:
. Akomatu a ogura nyimpa, 
Ber a Tsɛmbuafo n' fi sor besian,
Ɔno a ɔka a, obi nnka bi.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:3
verse:
. Totorobɛnto ndze huhu, 
Ɔgyegye ndakamaa nyinam'
Rotwe dɔm nyina kɔ asɛndzii.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:4
verse:
. Wɔatsea Wu, wiadze rowosow, 
Abɔdze nyina rinyanyan,
Eyi ano akyerɛ Tsɛmbuafo n'.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:5
verse:
. Hwɛ, bukuu no mu nsɛm si pi, 
Wɔ dza wɔakyerɛw n' mu nyina ho,
Ɔno na wɔdze bobu atsɛn.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:6
verse:
. Sɛ Tsɛmbuafo n' tsena N'eguam' 
Na esumasɛm biara da edzi a,
Obiara nnkɛfa noho gyan.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:7
verse:
. Emidze m'beyi m'ano dɛn? 
Woana no obotwitwa agye m'
Ber a anokwafo mpo hia adom?
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:8
verse:
. Hen a W'ahentum krɔn mbordo, 
Ɔwo a ebɔ werdam ma hɛn, 
Tsema Wura, pinkyɛn hɛn ɛ.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:9
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:10
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:11
verse:
. Ɔtsɛmbuafo tseneenyi, 
Dom hɛn brafi ho bɔnfakyɛ,
Ansaana werdzi da n' aso.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:12
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:13
verse:
. Egyee ɔbaa dzebɔnyɛnyi n', 
Edze wifo n' no bɔn kyɛɛ no,
Mo so ama menya enyidar.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:14
verse:
. Me mpaabɔ na mo mbɔɔ nnsɛ  hwee,
Naaso, Nyame, kyerɛ W'adom
Na gye m' fi onnyiewiei gya n' mu.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:15
verse:
. Ao, fa me ka Wo nguantsen n' ho, 
Mma mmpem m' adze nnka mberɛkyi n' ho,
Mbom ma m' do si W'abanyimfa.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:16
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 206:17
verse:
. Mewu o! Su na ewuotwa da n' a! 
Nyimpa fi huntumam' reba n' a,
Onsiesie noho mma atsɛmbu.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: CAN 207:1
verse:
. Ewuradze, ɔnnyɛ 'mi m'asɛm 
Muwu anaa metse ase o;
M'afamudze nye m'bɔdɔ W', masom W'
Yi gyedɛ W'adom ma.
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.

name: CAN 207:2
verse:
. Sɛ nkwa war a, m' enyi bɛgye 
Ama maasom Wo akyɛr,
Tsia so a, bɛn ntsi na m'bedzi mbɔɔ
Dɛ m'botu akɔ onnyiewieim'?
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.

name: CAN 207:3
verse:
. Christ ɔmmfa m' ndua mbrɛ hɔ yɛ sum 
Sen mbrɛ Noara koduae n';
Nyia ɔba Nyame ahenman mu n'
Gyedɛ ɔfa abow yim'.
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.

name: CAN 207:4
verse:
. Bra, Mo Wura, sɛ adom ma mesɛ 
Dɛ muhu W'enyim a;
Na W'asaase edwuma yɛ dɛw a,
W'enyimnyam bɛyɛ dɛ dɛn?
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.

name: CAN 207:5
verse:
. Na m'botwa mo suhuhun do, 
Na fona na bɔn ndafua,
Makɔdɔm esiarfo a wɔtow
Jehovah N'ayɛyi.
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.

name: CAN 208:1
verse:
. Man bi wɔ hɔ a dɛw mapa wɔm', 
Ahotsewfo dzim' hen;
Adzekyee nko, adze nnsa da,
Hɔ enyigye tu yaw.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 208:2
verse:
. Hɔ na nhaban wuna dabaa. 
Na hɔ nhiren nnyam da;
Wu tse dɛ po tseabaa a, otwa
Sorman na hɛndze yi ntamu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 208:3
verse:
. Nhaban huanhuam wɔ esuegya hɔ 
Woewuna dukuduku;
Dɛm na Jewfo hun Canaan ma n'
Dɛ Jordan pem twa ntamu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 208:4
verse:
. Na adasa suro bɔ piriw dɛ 
Wobotwa po tseabaa n',
Wɔbɔ ngyangyan wɔ esukɔn do,
Wosuro dɛ wobepia.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 208:5
verse:
. Ao, nkyɛ yeeyi ekyingye akwa, 
Na adwen kusukusu n',
Na yɛdze enyi a do tsew eehu
Canaan a yɛdɔ no.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 209:1
verse:
. Jerusalem, m'ahomka fie, 
Dzin a ɔsom me bo,
M'edwuma bɔbɔ adze dabɛn
Wɔ wo siar asomdweem'?
title: Joseph Bromehead, 1748-1828.

name: CAN 209:2
verse:
. Dabɛn na m'enyiwa bohu 
W'afasu nye mbotsen?
N-kwagye ahyɛ w'aban dzen,
W'abrɔn mu hyerɛn sika.
title: Joseph Bromehead, 1748-1828.

name: CAN 209:3
verse:
. Ehɔ nhyiren n' kyɛn Eden turem'; 
Na bɔn nye yaw nnyi hɔ:
Menam abo nye ehum do
Per kɔ siar bea yi do.
title: Joseph Bromehead, 1748-1828.

name: CAN 209:4
verse:
. Ebɛn ntsi na m'bosuro mbusu, 
Anaa wu mbɔ me hu?
M'enyi da Canaan man pa n' do,
Mbew a adze nnsa do da.
title: Joseph Bromehead, 1748-1828.

name: CAN 209:5
verse:
. Asomafo, atɔfo, nkɔnhyɛfo, 
Abɔ Agyenkwa ho aprɔw;
Na ɔnnkɛkyɛr so na m'adɔfo
Akɔdɔm 'nyimnyam kuw n'.
title: Joseph Bromehead, 1748-1828.

name: CAN 210:1
verse:
. Hɛn nkwaber yɛ tsia wɔ ha 
Yaw tsia, adwendwen tsia
Nkwa a ɔmmbɔ adze da,
Nyinsu nnyim' wɔ noho,
Ao, ndzinoa a ɔyɛ dɛw
Fona tsia, ahomgye daa;
Adasa ndzebɔnyɛ
Nye esiarfo bɛtsena.
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: CAN 210:2
verse:
. Akobɔfo abɔbɔfo a, 
Yebenya fi wɔ sor!
Nsaamaa a yɛrohwehwɛ kobew
Wɔ nworaba n'ekyir!
Ndɛ dze yɛwɔ akono,
'Kyena na yɛso ahenkyɛw
A, odzi mu afebɔɔ
Na ne fɛw mmpa ara da.
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: CAN 210:3
verse:
. Sesei dze yɛroweɔn, yɛreper, 
Yɛtse enyidadom',
Zion wɔ dɛ n'ahoguam'
Ɔnye Babylon si;
Na nyia sesei yɛtwer No n'
Ndaamba yebohu N' kann,
Hɔn a wonyim N' na Wohu N'
Benya N' ayɛ hɔndze.
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: CAN 210:4
verse:
. Ao, enyigye na siar man, 
Nyame Ne mpamufo fie!
Ao, enyigye na siar man,
Akoma kɔn dɔ W', hwɛ W' kwan!
Jesu, mbɔbɔrhum' ara
Fa hɛn kɔ ahomgye bea n',
Ɔwo a 'nye Nyame Egya
Na Sunsum n' woehyira hom.
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: CAN 210:5
verse:
. Jerusalem sika kurow, 
Numfonsu na wo ma
Wo ho adwendwen no ma
Akoma na ndze bɔm
Minnyim ara, ao, minyim
Dɛw a ɔrotweɔn hɛn hɔ,
Enyimnyam a ɔhyerɛn
Nhyira a ɔnntɔ ka.
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: CAN 210:6
verse:
. Zion asa n' nyina mu 
'Nyigye ndwom ahyɛ n' ma,
Abɔfo hyirenn na atɔfo
Ahyɛ mpemdo wɔ hɔ,
Ɔhenba n' tse hɔn finimfin
Adzekyee kan n' tsew wann;
Na esiarfo edzidzibea n'
Ayɛ nomanoma fɛɛfɛw.
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: CAN 210:7
verse:
. David n'ahenguan n' si hɔ; 
Hɔ na konyimdzifo a
Woefi dadwen nsa bɔ se,
Na apontofo tow ndwom
Hɔn a wɔnye hɔn Sahen
Ako edzi konyim n'
Mbersantsen mfesantsen nyina
Woewuna hɔn ntar fitaa.
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: CAN 211:1
verse:
. Hɔn a wu ntwamutam suma hɔn n', 
Hɛn 'gyafo a nkyɛ wɔka hɛn ho n',
Woedu sor adzekyee mu ntsi
Yɛda W' ase.
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.

name: CAN 211:2
verse:
. Hɔn nkwa no yɛ n-kwa ampa, 
Woedu empiresi n'ewiei,
Afei wohu W'enyim petee:
Hwee nnsiw hɔn kwan.
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.

name: CAN 211:3
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ yehun hɔn wɔ fonam' 
Na ahohia mu n', wɔnntse dɛm bio:
Hɔn enyi hu adze kann: Wo dzin
Wɔ hɔn pɔw do.
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.

name: CAN 211:4
verse:
. Kɔdaann-da efi hɔn do koraa, 
Na woehu W'apɛdze nyina;
Wɔdze dɛw a yennyim wɔ ha 
Som Wo daa daa.
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.

name: CAN 211:5
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.

name: CAN 211:6
verse:
. Edwuma so a seesei wɔyɛ n', 
Dza ɔsɛ nyimdzee a oedzi mu a,
Na dza ema wɔyɛ ma hɛn
Yenntum yennhu.
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.

name: CAN 212:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 212:2
verse:
. Jesus, Wo dzin kɛse no mu
Na mirikedzi owu do nym;
Migya dɛtse durdur yi hɔ
Na abɔfo soa m' atsaban do a,
Me kra botwà owu-mprɛnu mpὸ a,
Na oedzi hen daa daa wɔ wim'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 212:3
verse:
. Enyi nnhunii, aso nn-tsee
Dza Christ ahyehyέ ama Ne mba a
Wɔnam Gyefo n' tum mu dzi nyim;
Wɔkɔ emudzi n'etsiwa mu
Wɔdze hɔn nan tsia owu do,
Wowu ahomkam' hyia hɔn Wùra.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 213:1
verse:
. YESÙ mfɛfὸ a wɔkɔ yɛ dɛn?
Yesùro owu dɛm dɛn?
Ana nnyɛ Jesus Ne dzѐ à ɔdze
Frɛ hɔn kɔ Ne nkyɛn bi a?
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 213:2
verse:
. Ohyira No nkὸrɔfo nyina hɔn nda
Ɔdwedwe adaa nyina:
Henfa na mfɛwba no bɔhom?
Hɔn Tsir no Ne nkyɛn a?
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 213:3
verse:
. Hɔ na ofi soɛree foow sor,
Na ɔkyerɛɛ hɛn kwan:
Ɔsoɛrda kɛse n' hɛn honam
Botù akɔ Ewùradze nkyɛn.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 214:1
verse:
. Man bi wɔ hɔ a ɔhyerɛn sen wi mpo,
Na yɛdze gyedzi hu n' wɔ ekyir;
Na Egya n' rotweɔn wɔ kwan no do,
Oesiesie kobew ama hɛn hɔ.

      Da bi da . . . dɛɛdɛw n' mu
      Yebehyia wɔ mpoano fɛɛfɛw n' do.
      Da bi da . . . dɛɛdɛw n' mu,
      Yebehyia wɔ mpoano fɛɛfɛw n' do.
title: S.F. Bennett.

name: CAN 214:2
verse:
. Yɛbɔtow wɔ mpoano fɛɛfɛw n' do
Esiarfo hɔn ndwom a ɔyɛ dɛw n';
Hɛn sunsum nnkedzi yaw ara pɛn,
Apempen nnkɔfὸra hɛn ahomgye.
title: S.F. Bennett.

name: CAN 215:1
verse:
. Ao, dwen ofi a ɔwɔ hɔ ho,
Osi baka fɛɛfɛw n' ho hɔ,
Mbrέ apapafo a wonnkowu pɛn
Woewuna hɔn ntar efufuw . . . .
     
     Ɔwɔ hɔ!. . . . Ɔwɔ hɔ! . . .
title: D.W.C Huntingon.

name: CAN 215:2
verse:
. Ao, dwen w'afέ a wɔwɔ hɔ ho,
Hɔn a woedzi kan ewie akwantu n',
Dwen ndwom a wɔrotow n' hɔ no ho,
Wɔ Nyamѐ ahemfi no mu hɔ . . .
title: D.W.C Huntingon.

name: CAN 215:3
verse:
. M'Agyenkwa no so ɔwɔ hɔ,
Hɔ na m'asɛfo akɔhom,
Da bi mo so m'befi yaw nsa
Makɔ ahomka man no mu . . .
title: D.W.C Huntingon.

name: CAN 216:1
verse:
. Ana yebehyia baka n' ho,
Mbrɛ ahohyѐrɛnfo edua n',
Dza no nsu gyenen-gyenen pem
Daa wɔ Nyame N'egua nkyɛn n'?

     Nyew, yebehyia baka no ho,
     Baka fɛɛfɛw, baka fɛɛfɛw no ho;
     Yɛnyѐ esiarfo n' behyia baka no ho;
     Ofi Nyame N'eguam' pem n'.
title: Rev. R. Lowry, 1826-99.

name: CAN 216:2
verse:
. Baka fɛɛfɛw n' nkɔnkɔnoa hɔ,
Yeboguar ne mpetsema n',
Yɛpasar na yeeyi ayɛw,
Ahomka da fɛɛfɛw n' nyina,
title: Rev. R. Lowry, 1826-99.

name: CAN 216:3
verse:
. Yerubodu baka fɛɛfɛw n' ho a,
Yɛbɔto adzesoa nyina fam';
Adom bɛgye hɛn kra efim',
Na ɔama ntar nye ahenkyɛw.
title: Rev. R. Lowry, 1826-99.

name: CAN 216:4
verse:
. Baka fɛɛfɛw no hyerɛn a,
Hɛn Agyenkwa N'enyim no a,
Esiarfo a wonnwu da no
Wotu nkwagye ndwom wɔtow.
title: Rev. R. Lowry, 1826-99.

name: CAN 217:1
verse:
. Ɔman bi wɔ hɔ, no mu hyerɛn,
No wim' tsew wann daa nyina
Hɔ sum nn-gye dabiara pɛn:
Agyenkwa hyerɛn hɔ daa.

      Sɛ yɛsoa. . . mbeamudua n' a. . .
      Nna ahenkyɛw n'. . . so yɛbɔsoa,. . .
      Na yɛnye . . . ahoɔfɛfo astena, . . .
      Wɔ ahomka no mu da nyina.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 217:2
verse:
. Beebi wɔ hɔ, asomdwee bea
Ɔbra po yi n' ekyir,
Hɔ ehum nn-kotu hɛn da:
Sie w'adze nyina wɔ hɔ.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 217:3
verse:
. Ofi bi wɔ hɔ, enyimnyam fi,
Sor ahemfi papa;
Na hɔn a yɛdɔ hɔn wɔ ha 'i
Bɛyɛ etuu wɔ hɔ.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 218:1
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 218:2
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 218:3
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 218:4
verse:
. N-dɛ yɛ mpaabɔ da: 
Ma asaase mpinkyɛn sor;
Ma hɛn akoma nhwehwɛ Wo,
Bra behyia hɛn wɔ ha
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 219:1
verse:
. Yɛdze adwontow hyɛɛ ase ndɛ, 
Wɔ mbɔbɔr ahengua n' enyim;
Ansaana 'nafua sum bɛba n',
Yɛtow ewimbir ndaase ndwom.
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.

name: CAN 219:2
verse:
. Dza ofir nokwar akomam', 
Enyidzi suro a wɔdze hwɛ W',
Sua a yesua, n-tam a yɛka,
Hɛn Wura Jesus, pen do gye.
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.

name: CAN 219:3
verse:
. Dza W'enyi ehwiram' ehu 
Dɛ ogu hɛn afɔr ho fi n',
Yɛakotow komm wɔ W'enyim yi,
Hɛn Wura Jesus, fa kyɛ hɛn.
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.

name: CAN 220:1
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, da a 'dze kyɛɛ hɛn n' asa, 
Sum etsin W'asɛm do rehyɛ;
Yɛtoow hɛn anapa ndwom maa Wo
W'abɔdzin bɛtsew hen nda ho.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 220:2
verse:
. Ndaase nka W' dɛ W' Asɔr risi pi, 
Ber a wiadze rokɔ kan mu;
W' Asɔr roweɔn wɔ wiadze nyina,
Ɔnngye n' ahom dabiara pɛn.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 220:3
verse:
. Aber a 'napawi hyerɛn ka 
N-kurow a wɔda ham' na pom',
Asɔryɛ ndze ɔda ho ara,
Ayɛyindwom ɔmmbɔ adze da.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 220:4
verse:
. Ewia rinyan hɛn enuanom a 
Wɔtse anee ber a yɛadeda;
Dɔnhwer nyina ano fofor ma
Wɔtse Wo nyɛe nwanwa n' wɔ sor.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 221:1
verse:
. AHOMGYE Wura, tsie hɛn asɔr
Wo da yi mu, wɔ Wo fie ha;
Na ma ndwom a Wo nkὸwaa rotow
Nyɛ afɔr a ɔsɔ W'enyi.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: CAN 221:2
verse:
. Yɛdɔ W'ahomgye yi wɔ ase,
Na mbom ahomgye pa n' wɔ sor;
Ɔno na hɛn kra fὸnafo yi
N'enyi tua kwan dɛ ɔbɔkɔm'.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: CAN 221:3
verse:
. Ɔfona nnyi hɔ, yaw nnyi hɔ,
Na bɔn na mbusu nnkodu hɔ,
N-krumsi biara nnkɔfora
Hɔn a wonnwu da hɔn ndwom no.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: CAN 221:4
verse:
. Wɔnntse atamfo nka wɔ hɔ:
Dadwen biara nnkɔfona hɔn;
Adze nnsa hɔ, mununkum nnsi hɔ,
Na daa nyina ewigyinae a.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: CAN 222:1
verse:
. Sor abɔfo ndze nye nsanku 
Twa W'ahengua ho,
Wɔwosow n-dwom dɛɛdɛw a
Ɔmmbɔ adze ara da;
M-pempem na wohyira Wo
Dɛ tum nyina 
Ewuradze.
title: Francis Pott, 1832-1909.

name: CAN 222:2
verse:
. Ɔwo a ewɔ sorsor noho 
Mbrɛ nyimpa nntum nnhu n',
Aso abɔn yɛtow ndwom a,
Ɔwo 'bu no bi?
Na yetum hu dɛ ebɛn hɛn
Na itsie hɛn?
Nyew, yetum.
title: Francis Pott, 1832-1909.

name: CAN 222:3
verse:
. Nyew, yenyim dɛ idzi ehurusi 
Wɔ W'edwinsa ho;
Eyɛɛ asowa na nsa na kɔmɛr
Dze maa W'ayɛyi;
Dwimfo nyansa, sanku ne dɛw,
Ne nyina bɔm' ma W'
Enyigye.
title: Francis Pott, 1832-1909.

name: CAN 222:4
verse:
. Tumfo Nyame, Woara Wodze 
Na yɛdze brɛ Wo,
Ɔmmfata dze, naaso yɛserɛ
Dɛ gye n' dɛmara:
'Koma, adwen, nsa, na kɔmɛr,
Yɛdze bɔm' wɔ
Hɛn ndwom pam'.
title: Francis Pott, 1832-1909.

name: CAN 223:1
verse:
. Hom ntow Alleluia nkyerɛ hom ndaase, 
Ao, ɔsor mba, hom mfa ndze dɛɛdɛw nhur
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 223:2
verse:
. Kuro krɔnkrɔn no bɛgye hom ndwom no do, 
Na wɔdze ehurusi ndwom enyan
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 223:3
verse:
. Hɔ na hom bɔbɔm' atow afebɔɔ, 
Ndwom a ɔkyerɛ hom Hen N'enyimnyam,
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 223:4
verse:
. Iyi nye afonafo hɔn ahomgye, 
Edziban na nsu a obi nnkehia,
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 223:5
verse:
. Bɔadze a eyɛ adze nyina Yɛfo, 
Yɛdze ndwom bɔ de yi W' ayɛ afebɔɔ
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 224:1
verse:
. Hɛn Nyame yɛ Kɛse, 
N'ayɛyi nyɛ kɛse;
Ɔyɛ N'asɔrasɔr Ne fie,
N' egua a N'enyi gye mu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 224:2
verse:
. N'adom Asɔrfi horow, 
Mbrɛ wodua yɛ fɛw a!
Hɛn asaase do enyidzi,
Hɛn man twitwagyefo.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 224:3
verse:
. Zion na wonyim dɛ 
Nyame yɛ guansumabew;
Mbrɛ No nkwagye esi ahyerɛn
Wɔ n'ahemfie nyina a.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 225:1
verse:
. Nyame, Yɛdɔ Wo Fie, 
Mbrɛ W'enyidzi wɔ no;
Wo tsenabea no mu dɛw
Kyɛn wiadze dɛw nyina.
title: William Bullock, 1798-1874

name: CAN 225:2
verse:
. Ɔyɛ m-paabɔ fie, 
Mbrɛ Wo nkowaa dzi ehyia;
Na 'Wo, Ewuradze,
Eba behyira Wo mba.
title: William Bullock, 1798-1874

name: CAN 225:3
verse:
. Yɛdɔ n-kwasɛm no; 
Ɔma hɛn asomdwee,
Nye dzenhyɛ wɔ ko mu,
Nye dɛw a ɔmmbɔ adze.
title: William Bullock, 1798-1874

name: CAN 225:4
verse:
. Yɛdɔ dɛ yɛtow ndwom 
Kamfo Wo mbɔbɔrhu;
Na mbom yɛpɛ yeesua
Ɔsor konyimdzi ndwom.
title: William Bullock, 1798-1874

name: CAN 226:1
verse:
. Sor wiadze horow Nyame, 
Mbrɛ Wo dɔ tsenabea
Na ase ha asɔrfi
Dua yɛ fɛw yɛ ahomka a!
M'akoma per
Ba Wo tsebea
Ama oeehu
Me Nyankopɔn.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 226:2
verse:
. Ao, akra esiarfo na  
Wɔsɔr bea a Nyame tsie,
Ao, esiarfo nye hɔn 
A wɔsom wɔ hɔ daa!
Wɔtonton Wo,
Wɔyɛ esiarfo
Hɔn a wɔfow
Zion kokwaa n'!
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 226:3
verse:
. Wofi ahomm' kɔ ahom mu, 
Wɔ nyinsu bɔnsa yim',
Kɛpem dɛ obiara dzi nyim,
Kɛpem dɛ obiara pue sor,
'Nyimnyam egua!
Hɛn Hen Nyame
Dze hɛn pɛ anan
Dze bodu hɔ.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 226:4
verse:
. Nyame nye hɛn 'kokyɛm, 
Hɛn kan na akoban;
Ne nsamu akyɛdze ma,
Yenya hɛn nhyira fir mu
Ɔbɔdom hɛn
Nkorɔfo nyina
Nkwagye adom,
Nye enyimnyam so.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 227:1
verse:
. Wo sor abangua yɛ fɛw, 
Wɔ kan na dɔ man no mu;
Ha so W'abangua yɛ fɛw,
Wɔ bɔn na mbusu man yim'
Ao, mo sunsum no kɔn dɔ
W'asɔrmba hɔn fɛkuwbɔ,
W'enyim ne hyerɛn fɛɛfɛw n',
W'amayɛ n', Adom Nyame!
title: Henry Frances Lyte, 1793-1847.

name: CAN 227:2
verse:
. Abɔso Nyame, nnoma a 
Wosu kyin Wo fie, woewie!
Na akra a wɔhom sor Egya
No bom' no, woewie dodow!
Wɔtse dɛ ebubur n' a
Oennya 'saase do sibea n',
Wɔsan kɔ hɔn hɛn no mu,
Hɔ na hɔn enyi gye daa.
title: Henry Frances Lyte, 1793-1847.

name: CAN 227:3
verse:
. Woewie ampa! hɔn ayɛyi 
Pem mbusu bɔnsa 'i mu mpo;
N-su pue sar do ma hɔn,
Edziban fi sor nyɛn hɔn.
Wofi ahom mu kɔ ahom mu,
Dze kodu W'ahengua n' ho;
W'anan ho na wobom som,
'Wo a agye hɔn ne nyinam'.
title: Henry Frances Lyte, 1793-1847.

name: CAN 228:1
verse:
. M'akoma dzii ehurusi 
Dɛ me mfɛfo see dɛ,
Bra ma yɛnkɔ Nyame Ne fie;
Afahyɛ da nye ndɛ.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 228:2
verse:
. Hɛn anan bɛyɛ ntsɛm 
Ahɛn asɔrdan nom'
Ber a mobra na mpanyin pii
Rehyɛ som-bea no ma.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 228:3
verse:
. Ebusua wɔtɔ dɛ 
Wɔbɔ punkum ba ha;
Ehumbɔbɔr egua n'enyim
Wɔdze dɛw kotow hɔ.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 228:4
verse:
. Sɔr ma Jerusalem, 
Nyankopɔm ahenkurow n';
Nyame ntɔ Ne nhyira ngu hɔn a
Wɔdɔ Ne fie papa.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 228:5
verse:
. Ha 'i dze wɔmma koryɛ 
Na asomdwee ntsintsim daa;
Zion, ahonya pii nhyehyɛ
W'ahemfi amaama.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 229:1
verse:
. Jesus, fa wusoɛr tum n' 
Gyina hɛn finimfin;
Ma hɛn asɔryɛ yi
Ɔnyɛ mber krɔnkrɔn.
title: William Pennefather, 1816-73.

name: CAN 229:2
verse:
. Hue Wo Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn 
Gu akoma nyina do;
Tu suro na yaw fi
Akra nyina mu.
title: William Pennefather, 1816-73.

name: CAN 230:1
verse:
. 'EWimbir ansaana wi rotɔ n' 
Ewuradze, nna ayarfo gu W' nkyɛn;
Ao, yaw horow bɛn nna ɔannka hɔn!
Ao, dɛw bɛn nna wɔammfa annkɔ!
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: CAN 230:2
verse:
. Bio, edu 'wimbir, na hɛn so 
Yɛdze yarba horow twe pin;
Sɛ Yennhu wo mpo a, ɔyɛ dɛn?
Yenyim na yɛtse dɛ 'wɔ ha.
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: CAN 230:3
verse:
. Agyenkwa Christ, pam hɛn mbusu, 
Na binom abɔm,
Na binom nndɔɔ W' nokwar mu pɛn,
Binom so ayew dɔ a wonyae.
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: CAN 230:4
verse:
. Binom hu dɛ wiadze yɛ gyan, 
Naaso wonntum mmfi wiadze nsa;
Binom hɔn mfɛfo how hɔn werɛ,
Naaso wɔmmfaa Ɔwo nnyɛɛ nyɛnko.
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: CAN 230:5
verse:
. Ewuradze hɔn nyina serɛ ahomgye, 
Na wobefi bɔn mu koraa;
Hɔn a wɔper asom Wo yie n'
Nna wohu bɔn a ɔwɔ hɔn mu.
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: CAN 230:6
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: CAN 231:1
title: John Fawcett, 1740-1817.

name: CAN 232:1
verse:
. Asɔr ne fapem kortoo 
Nye Jesus Christ hɛn Wura;
Ɔnam nsu nye N'asɛm do
Yɛɛ n' N'abɔdze fofor.
Ofi sor bɔhwehɛɛ no.
Yɛɛ n' N'ayefor krɔnkrɔn.
Ɔdze No bɔgyaa tɔɔ no
No nkwa ntsi na owui.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: CAN 232:2
verse:
. Wɔpaam' yii n' aman nyinam', 
Naaso ɔyɛ Asɔr kor.
No nkwagye tum ɔnye yi-
Wura kor, gyedzi kor,
Dzin krɔnkrɔn kor na ohyira;
N'edziban krɔnkrɔn kor,
Enyidar kor na ɔper ho,
Adom nyina wɔ mu.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: CAN 232:3
verse:
. Sɛ mpo nyimpa si atwetwe 
Hwɛ N'ahokyer kɛse,
Dɛ mpaapaam' atsetsew mu
Nkyerɛkyerɛ bɔn tseetsee N' a,
Ahotsewfo n' weɔn, wosu
Dɛ, ondu da bɛn ara?
Anago su n' nnkyɛkyɛr na
Ɔadan anapa ndwom.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: CAN 232:4
verse:
. Berɛ nye amandzehu mu, 
N'akodzi dede n' mu,
Ɔtweɔn daadaa asomdwee a
Ɔmmbɔ adze n' n'emudzi n',
Kɛpem dɛ n'enyi bohu
'Nyimnyam enyidado n',
Na Asɔr konyimdzifo no
Bɛhɛn n' ahomgye mu.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: CAN 233:1
verse:
. Nyame kurow mbrɛ odua so 
Na n' afasu war a!
'Nokwafo nye W' adehye dɔm,
Wɔ mbew na mber nyinam'.
title: Samuel Johnson, 1822-82.

name: CAN 233:2
verse:
. Asɔr krɔnkrɔn kor, nkodɔm kor, 
Botae a ɔkrɔn kor,
Dwumadzi kuw kor, ndɔbaa ndwom kor,
Ɔhen Otumfo kor.
title: Samuel Johnson, 1822-82.

name: CAN 233:3
verse:
. Ofitsi nyimpa n' ahyɛse 
Mbrɛ W' asɛm esi edwir n'!
Mbrɛ W' aman esi atserɛw
Wɔ ahotɔ na dɔm' a!
title: Samuel Johnson, 1822-82.

name: CAN 233:4
verse:
. Mbrɛ Wo gya si dzɛw anago 
Dze weɔn na ɔnnhwer a!
W' akoban hyerɛn sunm' ara
Dze kɛpem adzekyee.
title: Samuel Johnson, 1822-82.

name: CAN 234:1
verse:
. Wɔka wo ho enyimnyam nsɛm, 
Zion, hɛn Nyame Ne man;
Nyia ɔnnsan N' asɛm no kyekyeer
Wo dɛ No kurow a ɔtsenam'.
Tsetse Bo no nye wo fapem,
Ebɛn botum awosow w'?
N-kwagye yɛ wo ho afasu;
Ebɛserew w' atamfo.
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: CAN 234:2
verse:
. Hwɛ, n-kwa nsu a ofi Nyame 
Ne daadaa dɔ mu pem no
Ma wo mba wɔmee, na oyi
Hia ho suro fi hɔn do.
Woana na ɔbɔtɔ bitsi
Wɔ dɛm esutsen yi ho?
Adom a ɔpem daa nyina
Wo Nyame dze dom wo daa.
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: CAN 235:1
verse:
. Yɛda ho yɛtse nkwam'? 
Yeehu hɛn enyim bio?
Christ N' adom a ɔapon hɛn ntsi
Hom mma yenyi N' ayɛw.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 235:2
verse:
. Nyame tum akora hɛn 
Wɔ nkwagye a odzi mum';
Yɛbɔm' bio wɔ Christ N' ayɛyim',
Yedzi N' enyim ehyia.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 235:3
verse:
. Mbusu pii a yeehu a! 
Akodzi a yeeduam' a!
Guado ɔko', na hɛn mu hu' a!,
Fitsi dɛ yehyiaa nkan n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 235:4
verse:
. Ewuradze No dɔ 
Agye hɛn ne nyinam',
Na ɔda ho dze No mboa ma hɛn
Na osie hɛn nkwa wɔ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 235:5
verse:
. Dɛm a hom mma yentuw 
No nkwagye tum no mu,
Tum a ɔgye hɛn nkwa koraa
Kɛpem dɛ yeetua bɔn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 236:1
verse:
. Ma hɛn honam ndzi mpaa 
Nkɔ mbew horow do mpo;
Jesus N'adɔfo dze, dabaa
Hɔn akoma yɛ kor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 236:2
verse:
. Jesus na odzii kan 
Dze hɛn akoma bɔɔm';
Hɛn a yɛnye N' nantsew fufuwn'
Ɔma yɛka koryɛm'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 236:3
verse:
. O wɔmma yɛnkɔ do 
Wɔ Jesus N'edwumam';
Asɔr ne Tsir konyimdzifo n',
Yɛnka No do ndzi nyim.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 236:4
verse:
. Christ no wenyin ture n' 
Saw n'edwumafo enyim;
Na hwɛ! akatua kɛse no 
Da sor hɔ rotweɔn hɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 236:5
verse:
. O hɛn 'koma nye adwen 
N-da ho ara mfow sor,
Nkɔhwɛ hɛn ahomgye bea no,
Mbrɛ hɛn fona bɔ adze.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 236:6
verse:
. Hɔ dwumadzen nyina, 
Nye amandzehu nye yaw
Wotwa do wɔ siar mpoano hɔ;
Hɔ yehyia a yɛmmpaam' bio.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 236:7
verse:
. Ahomka bea dɛɛdɛw, 
Hɔ na abɔfo hyia hɛn,
Hɔ yebohu hɛn enyim bio,
Na yeekyiakyia hɛnho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 236:8
verse:
. Abakamfo Asɔr, 
Hɔn nhyira n' yebenya,
Na yɛdze dɛw ayɛ abɔtsir
Yɛakɔ sor ahomgyem'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 237:1
verse:
. Christ a nhyira nyina fir Wo, 
Ema ahosewfo dzi mu,
Tsie hɛn a Wo su sɛ hɛn,
Yɛyɛ Wo honam nwanwa n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 237:2
verse:
. Ka hɛn ho wɔ sunsum korm', 
Ma yɛnda ho nya Wodze n';
Yɛba bebisa mbordo,
Ɔwo a ehyɛ adze nyina ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 237:3
verse:
. Kenyan, nunu na gya hɛn  
Kyɛn ankorankor akyɛdze,
Wɔahyehyɛ n' dɛ mbrɛ epɛ,
Ma hɛn ndwuma nyina nhyɛ ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 237:4
verse:
. Dɛw mu ara yɛnyɛ kor 
Yennya tsema mma hɛnto:
Na yɛmboa hɛnho nkorkor;
Obiara nyɛ n'afamudze.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 238:1
verse:
. Jesus, 'nye W' Asɔr ntsena, 
Yɛ n' Agyenkwa, Wura, Gyafo;
Wɔrosɔ ne gyedzi ahwɛ n',
Yɛserɛ Wo, tsie hɛn.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: CAN 238:2
verse:
. Tsew ne bra na nkyerɛkyerɛ ho; 
Dom n' abotar ma ɔnsɔw
Na ɔntwer W' anohoba n',
Yɛserɛ Wo, tsie hɛn.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: CAN 238:3
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: CAN 238:4
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: CAN 238:5
verse:
. Ongya ehiafo na efurafo, 
Nda ho nhwehwɛ dza ayew n',
Ɔnkyekyer 'koma bobɔe,
Yɛserɛ Wo, tsie hɛn.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: CAN 238:6
verse:
. No nokwar kanea n' nhyerɛn; 
Ɔmma ne kan n' do wɔ sor
Wɔ abosom-man sum mu.
Yɛserɛ Wo, tsie hɛn.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: CAN 239:1
verse:
. Guanhwɛfo pa, dom hɛn Wo mboa 
Wɔ hɛn mbusu nda yim',
Tum a wɔdze weɔn, wɔdze sɔr,
Fa ma Wo mba nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 239:2
verse:
. Ber a yɛda ho da nsɔhwɛm', 
Ber a yɛso mbeamudua 'i,
Ma yɛmfa hɛn kra nto Wo do
Wɔ mpaabɔ a ɔmmbɔ adzem'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 239:3
verse:
. Ma yendua gyedzim' hɛn nsa nka 
M-paabɔ sunsum no;
Yemmia ndzi ako gyedɛ yehu
W' enyim nye Wo dzin pa n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 239:4
verse:
. Ma 'koma biara nsu nka dɛ: 
Minnkegyaa Wo ma akɔ,
Gyedɛ ama m' dɔ a odzi mu,
Na edze Woho akyɛ m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 239:5
verse:
. Minnkegyaa Wo ma akɔ gyedɛ 
Ebɔ Wo dzin kyerɛ m',
Na egye me kra nkwa nwionn nwionn,
Ma meyɛ dɛ Ɔwo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 240:1
verse:
. Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
Ewuradze, kyerɛ Wo tum;
Bɔ Wo ndze a onyan ewufom',
Na ma Wo nkorɔfo ntse.
    Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
    Ber a yɛkotow Wo yi, 
    Sian, ao Ewuradze domfo, sian! 
    Bra behyira hɛn sesei.
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.

name: CAN 240:2
verse:
. Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
Ma akra nhwehwɛ nkwa-su n':
O ma hɛn esunsum kɔn ndɔ
N-kwa edziban no!
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.

name: CAN 240:3
verse:
. Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
Krɔn W' enyimnyam dzin no;
Wo sunsum mma hɛn dɔ m-fram
Mma W' nye Wo mba nyina.
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.

name: CAN 240:4
verse:
. Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
Ma W' asɛm no nnya tum;
Ma wɔmfa enyikan gyedzi ntsie
W' asɛmpa a nhyira wɔm' n'.
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.

name: CAN 241:1
verse:
. Ahomka da ɔnye da n' a 
Medze moho maa m' Agyenkwa!
Ɔsɛ dɛ mo 'koma dzi dɛw
Na ɔka ne dɛw kyerɛ aman.

  Ahomka da! ahomka da! 
  Da a Jesus hoor mo ho bɔn nyina 
  Ɔkyerɛɛ m' dɛ monweɔn na monsɔr 
  Na mindzi dɛw aber nyina 
  Ahomka da! ahomka da! 
  Da a Jesus hoor mo ho bɔn nyina!
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: CAN 241:2
verse:
. Siar n-hyehyɛɛ! ɔsɔw nsew a 
Midzii kyerɛɛ mo Dɔfo n' ano!
Ber a meba N' asɔrfim' yi,
Wɔmma ayɛyindwom nhyɛ hɔ ma.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: CAN 241:3
verse:
. Ahyɛmu kɛse no yeewie dzi! 
Mo Wura dze nye m', No so yɛ medze;
Ɔtwetwee m' ma mekaa No do,
Ne Nyame ndze n' ɔyɛ me dɛw.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: CAN 241:4
verse:
. M' akoma a ekyima akyɛr 
Bɔhom wɔ ahomka bea ha:
Mma mmfi w' Ewuradze nkyɛn da
Afa N' a, afa siar nyina.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: CAN 242:1
verse:
. Hwɛ mbrɛ Israel Guanhwɛfo 
Esi dze dɔ gyina hɔ;
Tsie! ɔrefrɛ m- bɔtoaba,
Ɔreyɛ hɔn etuu.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: CAN 242:2
verse:
. Ɔse, Hom ngyaa hɔn ma wɔmbra, 
Mma hom mmbu hɔn 'nyimtsia!
Osian akra yinom n-tsi
Na Ewuradze bae.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: CAN 243:1
verse:
. Ɔkofo, soɛr gyina, 
Suo Christ mbeamudua n' mu;
Fa wo Pomfo dzin ka ntam dɛ
Apow wiadze ndzɛmba
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: CAN 243:2
verse:
. Soɛr ma wonnuma wo- 
Wɔnhor wo ho bɔn nyina;
'Nye wo Nyankopɔn ndzi ahyɛmu,
Ndɛ to wo gyedzi dzin.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: CAN 243:3
verse:
. Ndɛ Christ akowaa nye wo 
Wɔkan wo fora esiarfo n',
Ndɛ edɔm tsetse nkɔnhyɛfo n',
Na asomafo n' na atɔfo n'.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: CAN 243:4
verse:
. Ma Nyame akodze nyina 
Nhyɛ w' dzen; 'nye abɔnsam nko:
Ɔsa n' bɛyɛ dzen, ɔbɛkyɛr,
Na otwar dɛ yedzi nyim.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: CAN 244:1
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: CAN 245:1
verse:
. Ewuradze Krɔnkrɔn, memmfata 
Dɛ 'Wo 'bɛba mo hɔ,
Kasa ara: ka adomsɛm kor, 
Na me kra ho bɛsan.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 245:2
verse:
. Memmfata: me kra mu tsenabew 
Yɛ nwinwin, yɛ nkɔnkɔw;
Ebɛyɛ dɛn ahɛn mu hɔ?
Kasa, na m'bɛtse apɔw.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 245:3
verse:
. Memmfata dze; na m'bɛyɛ dɛn 
Mesiw me Nyame kwan?
Ɔwo a Wo honam nye bɔgyaa
Edze tɔɔ nkwa maa me.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: CAN 246:1
verse:
. Afei hɛn Egya yɛrekaa Wo dɔ n', 
Dɔ a ɔtɔɔ hɛn prɛko wɔ mbeamudua n' do n';
Na hɛn sor Dzimafo n' so wɔ ha yi,
Yɛtrɛ hɛn afɔrbɔdze mu ma Wo,
Afɔrbɔdze a no nko fata W'enyim,
