Jesus, nokwar afɔrbɔdze a otsim.
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.

name: CAN 246:2
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.

name: CAN 246:3
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.

name: CAN 247:1
verse:
. Agyenkwa no dɔ ho nkaa ntsi 
Na yɛaba pon yi ho:
Ha na Jesus to nsa dze frɛ
Hɔn a woenu hɔnho.
title: Thomas Cotterill, 1779-1823.

name: CAN 247:2
verse:
. Yɛnam gyedzim' fa nkwa paano 
Yɛdze nyɛn hɛn akra;
Yɛnom wenyin dze kaa bɔgya a
Ogui maa abɔn no.
title: Thomas Cotterill, 1779-1823.

name: CAN 248:1
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ W'adom Asɛm no tse, 
Ahobrɛadzem' ara
Yi na m'bɛyɛ, m'Ewuradze a
'Ruwu, mebɛkaa Wo.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 248:2
verse:
. Wo honam a 'mi ntsi wobui n' 
Bɛyɛ mo sor paanoo;
W'ahyɛmudze kuraba n' na megye,
Ma medze makaa Wo.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 248:3
verse:
. Sɛ medan m'enyi hwɛ mbeamudua n' 
Na mohom Calvary hɔ a
Nyame Egumba e, m'afɔrdze e,
Otwar dɛ mekaa Wo.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 248:4
verse:
. M'bɛkaa W' ɔnnye Wo fona nyina, 
Nye Wo dɔ a adɔ m' nyina 
Nyew ber a ahom kakra wɔ hɔ 'i
M'bɛda ho ara makaa W'.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 249:1
verse:
. Ma yenhu W' ber a yeridzidzi, 
Na mma nn-dan hɛn nngya;
Agyenkwa, nye hɛn ntsena, na to
Wo pon hɛn 'koma mu.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 250:1
verse:
. Sor paano a enyɛn me, 
'Wo 'yɛ edziban ampa:
Ma nokwar nkwa paano yi
Nyɛn me kra daa daa nyina;
Ɔwo a iwui na etse ase,
Minnya Wo mu ahoɔdzen daa.
title: Josiah Conder, 1789-1855.

name: CAN 251:1
verse:
. O Ewuradze, ha na muhu W'enyim, 
Ha na mepɛ mesuo dza wonnhu mu;
Morohwehwɛ menya Nyame N'adom,
Na medze me berɛ mato Wo do.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 251:2
verse:
. Ha na m'bedzi Onyame edziban, 
Na menye Wo anom ɔsor wenyin;
Na medze m'adzesoa mato n-kyɛn
Na makaa Wo fakyɛ ne dɛw no bio.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 251:3
verse:
. Edzidzi na adwontow aber nye yi, 
Ɔsor pon na wɔato ama me yi.
Ma menye Wo mbɔ mu yendzidzi ha,
Na enye me ndzi nkitaho dɛɛdɛw.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 251:4
verse:
. Ɔnnkyɛr na wɔakata nsɛnkyerɛdze n' do: 
Aponto n' etwam'; dɔ no dze nntwam' da.
Woyi paano na wenyin no kɔ mpo a
'Wo, hɛn Kyɛm na Ewia, ebɛn hɛn daa.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 251:5
verse:
. Minnyi mboa bi dɛ Wo nko Wodze no, 
Na onnhia mpo dɛ motwer obi so.
M'Ewuradze, Woara dɔɔ so ma me,
Wo tum n-ko ara nye m'ahoɔdzen.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: CAN 252:1
verse:
. Christ abɔ werdam apon hɛn, 
No ho nkaabɔdze na yɛyɛ yi;
Yɛkyerɛ hɛn Wura No wu kɛpem
Da a ɔbɛba.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: CAN 252:2
verse:
. No honam a wobui maa hɛn 
Wɔ nkaabɔ paano yi mu ha,
Ɔno na ɔnyɛn hɛn dɔ kɛpem
Da a ɔbɛba.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: CAN 252:3
verse:
. Bɔgya a oruwu a okyii no 
Wenyin yi yɛ ho sɛnkyerɛdze.
Yɛbɔnom ara akɛpem
Da a ɔbɛba.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: CAN 252:4
verse:
. Anago bɔn a wonyii N' mae n' 
Na Ne mbae a odzi ekyir no
Yɛdze dɔ nyɛbea bɔm' kɛpem
Da a ɔbɛba.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: CAN 253:1
verse:
. N-dze a wɔtsee wɔ Eden 
Ayerhyia kan n-dze n',
Asɔpɔn awar nhyira n'
Ɔda ho ara wɔ hɔ.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 253:2
verse:
. Christian ɔbaa na barimba 
So rokɔ awar a,
Nyame Ɔkorsa wɔm' bi,
Na yɛserɛ Ne nhyira:
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 253:3
verse:
. Dɛ ɔndom hɔn m-ba pa, 
Nye dɔ na nokwardzi,
Na ɔndom hɔn koryɛ bi a
Biribiara nntum mmpa mu.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 253:4
verse:
. Sor Egya, Woara bɛfa, 
Ayefor yi ma awar,
Dɛ mbrɛ 'dze Eve maa Adam,
Fii noara ne mfem' no.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 253:5
verse:
. Agyenkwa domfo, bra na 
Bɛka hɔn bɔm' ɔdɔm',
Dɛ mbrɛ edze su ebien
Bɔɔm' wɔ Woara Wo mu n'
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 253:6
verse:
. Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, behyira hɔn, 
Ber a wɔrobɔ mpaa yi,
Dɛ mbrɛ ehyira Christ N'Asɔr
Ma ɔyɛ N'Ayefor n'.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 253:7
verse:
. Tserɛw W'atsaban wɔ hɔn do, 
Pa hɔn mbusu nyina,-
Ber a worutu anamɔn
Ba W'afɔrmbukyia ho,
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 254:1
verse:
. Egya, adze nyina Yɛfo, 
Wo nyansaa, tum na dɔ
Dzii kan dze akra ebien bɔɔm'
Wɔ Eden ture mu;
N-dɛ fa nkan n' akyɛdze n'
Ma Wo mbofra yi so,
Ofi a W'asomdwee wɔ mu,
Ɔdɔ a nokwardzi wɔm'.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 254:2
verse:
. Gyefo a ekɔr Galilee 
Ayeforase hɔ,
N-dɛ so fa enyimpa ma
Hɔn a wɔfrɛ Wo yi:
Ma hɔn wiadze enyigye
Ɔndan sor enyingye
Na wɔsɔ hwɛ a, ma wonhu
Dɛ Woara W'akyɛdze a.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 254:3
verse:
. O Nyame Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, 
Ɔwo a Wo dɔ yɛ dzen,
W'ahotsewee so dzi mu,
Fi sor gu hɔn do ahom,
Ama Woara wowaw hɔn
Fi ntokwaa ho n-tsi,
Hɔn bra aakyerɛ dɛ 'Wo na 
Ehyɛ hɔn 'koma do.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 255:1
verse:
. YƐBƆ Wὸ ewuo, Domfo Nyame Ɔkorsa,
Nana Adam na Evѐ hɔn hyiafo kor!
Fa Wo Nyame suro, ɔdɔ, nye nyansa
Behyira Okumfor na Ayefor.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 255:2
verse:
. Ehumbɔbɔr, kyɛw nyѐ yi, dom hɔn awarsɔ,
Wɔ bra n'atseetsee gyatanaa mpo mu;
Ndafua nyinara mu ɔsor enyisɔ
Nyɛ hɔn kyɛpɛn ber a hɔn nkwa wɔw do
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 255:3
verse:
. Sɛ yaw to hɔn, wɔka n' fabi a ɔmmbà a,
Ɔbra n'ehum Taafo, pa hɔn esian;
Weɔn hɔn, na ma wɔmfa enyi ntsim Wo do,
Mbɛgye akatua pà a ofi nkodzen
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 256:1
verse:
. SUNSUM Krɔnkrɔn, tsena hɛn kra mu,
Na ma Wo gya mfi sor nhyerɛn;
Edze sunsum ngo sera hɛn,
Na ema akyɛdze horow.
title: Anonymous, 9th or 10th cent;

name: CAN 256:2
verse:
. W'adom ngohuam a ofi sor
Yɛ awerɛkyekyer, nkwa na dɔ;
Na Wo kan a onndum da no
Nhyerɛn hɛn do, ɔmpa hɛn sum.
title: Anonymous, 9th or 10th cent;

name: CAN 256:3
title: Anonymous, 9th or 10th cent;

name: CAN 257:1
verse:
. Ewuradze, kasa kyerɛ me, 
Ma munsusu Wo do nkasa;
Ahwehwɛ me yi ma mo so
Monhwehwɛ Wo mba a wɔayew no.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 257:2
verse:
. Mo Wura, gya me kwan ma mo so 
Mingya W'akobɔfo taataa;
O nyɛn me ma mo so memfa
Manna mma hɔn a kɔm dze hɔn.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 257:3
verse:
. O hyɛ me dzen ama ber a 
Migyina pintsinn wɔ Wo mu n',
Maatsen me nsa ama hɔn a
Woridzi aper wɔ bra po do.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 257:4
verse:
. Kyerɛkyerɛ m' na meetum makyerɛ 
N-dzɛmba pa a ada n' edzi;
Ma m'anosɛm n-hwira ndu
Akoma pii ase noho.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 257:5
verse:
. Fa W'asomdwee dɛɛdɛw n' ma me, 
Ma minnya nyansa memfa nka
Asomdwee nsɛm nkyerɛ Wo mba
Asonafo wɔ mbusu mber mu.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 257:6
verse:
. Mo Wura, fa Wo mayɛ no ma m', 
Kodu dɛ m'akoma bu do,
Ma memfa ndam mombɔ dawur,
Menka Wo dɔ, minyi W' ayɛw.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: CAN 258:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, hyerɛn hɛn do,
Ɔwo, adasamba Kan;
Dua Wo kyerɛwsɛm do
Yi Woho kyerɛ hɛn ndɛ;
Na yɛhwɛ W'enyim a
Hɛn akoma dzɛw ntsi
Nkɔkowaba nam hɛn do
Eesua W'adom nwanwa n'.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 258:2
verse:
. Ewuradze, hue Sunsum
Gyaframee n' gu hɛn do,
Ma yɛdze ano kor
Yaabɔ Wo dzin dawur.
Ma Wo mba aso pa,
Ma hɔn adwen ontsim,
Na hɔn nyina eehu
Ndzɛmba akɛse a ayɛ.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 258:3
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, kasa ma hɛn,
Dza yɛka nyina mu,
Ma dza yɛkyerɛ nyɛ dɛ
Mbrɛ W'asɛm tse ara;
Ama nguambaa aatse
Hɔn Guanhwɛfo n' Ne ndze,
Na wɔaaka No do daa,
Na woeedzi No mu dɛw.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 259:1
verse:
. N-dɔbaa Ewuradze, tsie 
Wo nkowaa ehiafo hɛn su;
Tsie hɛn gyedzi mu mpaabɔ yi
Na dom hɛn dza yehia.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 259:2
verse:
. Yɛtweɔn Wo mbɔbɔr mu; 
Inyim hɛn hia nyina:
Ampa dɛ n-dɔbaa no so,
Na edwumafo no suar.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 259:3
verse:
. Sakyer wobinom so 
Na soma hɔm W'asɔr mu
Ma wɔnka Wo tum kasa no
Dɛ 'Wo nye hɔn wɔ hɔ
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 259:4
verse:
. Ma wɔnka W'asɛmpa a 
Adom ahyɛ no ma n',
Wɔnkyerɛ dɛ 'Wo nye Ewuradze,
Adasamba Gyefo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 260:1
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, sɛ W'asɛm ntsi 
Yedua n-kwasɛm n' a,
Wo tum nsa no gugu do yi
Aba no befifir.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 260:2
verse:
. W'adom ne ndam ara 
Na ɔbɛma ndɔbaa pii,
Na ɔadɔr agyedzifo a 
Wɔtse ma W'enyimnyam.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 260:3
verse:
. Nsɛmpa n' ne nhyira nsu n', 
Ma ɔntɔ mma hɛn daa,
Ma tum a ɔsakyer akra n'
Ɔmbra W'asɔfoe do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 261:1
verse:
. O Twearammpon Nyame, 
Ma W'ahendzi no mbra,
O Christ, ma W'abaw do
Bubu ɔbɔn no tum.
title: Lewis Hensley, 1824-1905.

name: CAN 261:2
verse:
. W'ahendzi a asomdwee 
Nye dɔ wɔ mu n' wɔ hen?
Dabɛn na enyitan
Bɔbɔ adze wɔ ha?
title: Lewis Hensley, 1824-1905.

name: CAN 261:3
verse:
. W'anohoba n' wɔ hen 
Dɛ mber bi rebɛba a
Akodzi nye brafun
Boguan efi W'enyim?
title: Lewis Hensley, 1824-1905.

name: CAN 261:4
verse:
. Ewuradze yɛserɛ Wo, 
Ma Woho do na bra
Wo tum kɛse no mu,
Na ma hɛn enyi ngye.
title: Lewis Hensley, 1824-1905.

name: CAN 261:5
verse:
. Nyimpa mmbu Wo dzin bi, 
Mbataku kyer Wo nguan;
Pii wɔyew Wo ho dɔ,
Wɔbɔ 'nyimguasebra.
title: Lewis Hensley, 1824-1905.

name: CAN 262:1
verse:
. Wiadze ruwu; daa nyinara
Mpempem mpempem na wɔsen kɔ!
Christianfo, hom m-per ngye hɔn;
Hom nka Jesus nkyѐrɛ hɔn ntsɛntsɛm.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 262:2
verse:
. Ahodze, ahoɔdzen, nyimdzee,
Nyew, hom n-kwa mpo hom mfa mma;
Hom Gyefo ayɛ bi ama hom!
Na 'bɛn na hom nnkɛyɛ ama N'?
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: CAN 263:1
verse:
. Wɔnkɔbɔ dawur wɔ mbea nyinara dɛ,
Asomdwee Hen n' oridzi Ne hen:
N'adzesoa yɛ har, na No som so yɛ dɛw;
Wonyi No ayɛw, ahemfo hɔn Ɔhen.
      
      Jesus akofo atamfo n' gyina a,
      Wɔnper ndzi nyim, ɔkogu yɛ mbusu;
      Christ N'ahenman ntsi yɛsɔw ɔfona a,
      No som yɛ dɛw, na owu yɛ mfaso.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 263:2
verse:
. Jesus Ɔkatakyi no dɔm adehye,
Wɔnsoɛr ngyina ma adasa nnya nkwa;
Wɔnhwɛ mbrɛ Christ Ne dzin edua atahye,
Wɔ mbea nyina dɛ wiadze Agyenkwa.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 264:1
verse:
. WƆMFÀ Asɛmpa n' nkɔ ekyirѐkyir,
Mbrɛ wɔnntsee Jesus Ne nka.
Wɔmpaam' dɛ No mu wɔ fafir,
Asomdwee, isiar na nkwa.
Wɔnka N' yie ma bahatɔfo
Wɔmfa dɛw nkamfo Ne dzin.
Na mber nyinara wɔmpaa mu
Nka dɛ, Jesus bedzi Hen.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 264:2
verse:
. Wɔmfà enyigye nsi Asɛm n' do,
Wɔnka n' bɔkɔɔ ara dɛ:
Nyame Ba Jesus ebowu
Na wiadze enya nkwa ndɛ!
Obiara a ɔgye No dzi no
Obenya sor ahendzi n';
Na amanaman ntonton No
Nse dɛ, Jesus bedzi Hen.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 265:1
verse:
. Hom ngyina, hom ngyina mma Jesus! 
Mbeamudua ho nsordaafo;
Hom mma N'ahen-frankaa n' do;
Onnyi dɛ ofi nsa
Obedzi No dɔm kan fi
Konyimm' akɔ konyimm'
Kyerɛ wɔka atamfo nyina hyɛ
Ma Christ dzi hen ampa.
title: George Duffield, 1818-88.

name: CAN 265:2
verse:
. Hom ngyina, hom ngyina mma Jesus! 
Hom ntsie abɛn ne frɛ;
Hom nduom ɔko kɛse n' mu
Wɔ N'enyimnyam da yim'!
Mbarimba, afei hom nsom no
Mfa ntsia atamfo dɔm n'
Hom mfa ndam ngyina mbusu ano,
Hom ntutu dɔm nka dɔm.
title: George Duffield, 1818-88.

name: CAN 265:3
verse:
. Hom ngyina, hom ngyina mma Jesus! 
Hom ngyina N'ahoɔdzen nkom'
Honam abaw bɛpa hom;
Mma hom nntwer hombo da.
Hom nhyɛ Christian akontar,
Na hom nweɔn asɔryɛm',
Edwumayɛ mu o, mbusu mu o
Mma hom nntwa abrɔdɔ.
title: George Duffield, 1818-88.

name: CAN 266:1
verse:
. Christian n-sordaafo, 
Hom nduom akono!
Jesus Ne mbeamudua n'
Dzi hɛn enyim kan.
Hɛn Hen Christ etu sa 
Roko tsia tamfo n',
Hom nduom n-seraban do,
Hom nhwɛ ne mfrankaa n'.
  
    Christian n-sordaafo, 
    Hom nduom akono! 
    Jesus Ne mbeamudua n' 
    Dzi hɛn envim kan.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: CAN 266:2
verse:
. Yɛma Ne frankaa n' do a, 
Abɔnsam dɔm gu;
Dɛm a Christ akofo,
Hom nkedzi konyim!
Yɛbɔ se yi ayɛw a,
Hɛll fapem wosow;
Enuanom, hom ntow ndwom,
Hom mma hom ndze do.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: CAN 266:3
verse:
. Nyame N'asɔr tse dɛ 
Dɔm a wɔyɛ dzen:
Yɛnam ahotsewfo
Hɔn anamɔn mu.
Hɛn mu nnyi mpaapaamu,
Yɛyɛ adze kor.
Hɛn botae, hɛn nkyerɛkyerɛ
Hɛn dɔ nyina kor.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: CAN 266:4
verse:
. Ahengua botutu, 
Ahenman etwam',
Na Jesus N'asɔr dze
Betsim afebɔɔ;
Samanadze akoban
Runntum ahyɛ do:
Christ Noara na ɔkae,
N'asɛm so yɛ hɔ.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: CAN 267:1
verse:
. Ma m' gyedzi ntsaban na muntu 
Nkɔ fua n' mu hɔ nkɔhwɛ
Sor esiarfo hɔn dɛw kɛse n',
Mbrɛ hɔn 'nyimnyam hyerɛn pa.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 267:2
verse:
. Ber bi nna wogyam wɔ ase ha, 
Na wɔkaa m' kyii nyinsu;
Wɔnye bɔn, ekyingye na suro
Dzii aper dzen dɛ hɛn so.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 267:3
verse:
. M'bisa dɛ hɔn konyim n' fir hen? 
Hɔn nyina bɔ mu ka dɛ
Hɔn konyimdzi fir Eguambaa n',
Hɔn konyim fir No wu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 267:4
verse:
. Wɔhyɛɛ mbrɛ otsiatsiae no nsew; 
No ndwuma hyɛɛ hɔn nkuran,
Na wɔkaa Nyame- nyimpa N' do
Nyaa anohoba ahomgye n'.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 268:1
verse:
. Ahotsewfo a apon hɔn edwuma a 
Wiadze enyim wɔbɔɔ Wo dzin no ntsi,
O Jesus, nhyira nka Wo dzin daa daa.
                             Alleluia!
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: CAN 268:2
verse:
. Hɔn Bontan, Aban, Ahoɔdzen, nye 'Wo, 
Eyɛɛ hɔn Sahen wɔ nkodzen no mu;
Sum kadoo no mu hɔn nokwar kan kor.
                             Alleluia!
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: CAN 268:3
verse:
. O ma Wo nkowaa anokwafo wɔnko 
M-barimbam' dɛ tsetse ahotsewfo n',
Ama wɔnye hɔn eenya ahenkyɛw no!
                            Alleluia!
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: CAN 268:4
verse:
. Siar nkitaho bit! fɛkuwbɔ krɔnkrɔn! 
Yɛper mberɛwm', wɔhyerɛn enyimnyam mu;
Naaso wɔnye hɛn bɔm' yɛ kor Wo mu.
                             Alleluia!
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: CAN 268:5
verse:
. Sɛ aperdzi n' yɛ dzen, ko n' war m-po a, 
Konyim ndwom no fi 'kyirekyir du asomu,
Ma akoko yɛ dur, abaw hyɛ dzen.
                             Alleluia!
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: CAN 268:6
verse:
. Witɔree dze sika hyerɛn wim' guann, 
Ɔnnkyɛr na akofo enya ahomgye.
Wohu siar Paradise no mu dɛw no.
                             Alleluia!
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: CAN 268:7
verse:
. Hwɛ! enyimnyam da bi so ɔreba a, 
Ahotsewfo n' bɔsoɛr konyimdzi mu,
Enyimnyam Hen no bopue No kwan do.
                             Alleluia!
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: CAN 269:1
verse:
. Woanam' wɔhyɛ futuw yi, 
Wɔhyerɛn sen wigyinae mpo 'i?
Kan no mu mba a wodzi kan,
Wɔbɛn Nyame N'ahengua 'i?
Yinom na wɔsoaa mbeamudua n',
Wodzii Christ ho dase pa,
Hɔn Wura N'asɛ ntsi wowui,.
Wɔkaa Nyame a owu n' do n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 269:2
verse:
. Wofir fona kɛsem' bae, 
Wɔdze gyedzi hoor hɔn ntar
Wɔ Eguambaa n' bɔgyaa mu,
Bɔgya a ɔma ahosan krɔnn:
N-tsi wɔbɛn ahengua n',
Na wɔsom hɔn Wura daa daa,
Nyame ko No nkorɔfo mu.
Nyame pɛ N'apapafo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 269:3
verse:
. Wɔkyɛn ekonyimdzifo, 
Ha na hɔn nsɔhwɛ asa;
Hɔn berɛ nyina etwam',
Kɔm na nsukɔm nnyi hɔ bio;
Wɔnntse ɔhyew a ɔyɛ dzen a
Ofir ewia ne mfirii no mu,
Wɔtse ahomka mbew no mu,
Domankoma bea no do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 270:1
verse:
. JESUS dze nkwagye reba n'
Zion hɔ na ɔbae,
Mbofraba nyina soɛree
Wɔtoow Hosanna maa N'.
Hɔn ho annyɛ No ebufuw
Na ɔtse abowa do n',
Ɔmaa wɔkaa No do ara:
Hɔn ndwom yɛɛ N' enyigye.
title: John King, 1789-1858.

name: CAN 270:2
verse:
. Na osiandɛ Ewuradze
Da ho dɔ mbofra ntsi,
Kaansa n-dɛ odzi hen
Wɔ sor Zion m-po a,
Yɛbɔfɔr Ne frankaa ho,
Ɔhen Jesus frankaa n',
Na yɛatsea n' dɛ, Hosanna 
N-ka David ne Ba.
title: John King, 1789-1858.

name: CAN 271:1
verse:
. Jerusalem mbofraba 
Toow Jesus N'ayɛyindwom;
Ndɛ mber yi mbofraba so
Bɔm' tow Gyefo N'ayɛyi:

    Tsie! mbofra kekam' dzendzen 
    Dɛ, Hosanna nka hɛn Hen.
title: John Henley, 1800-1842.

name: CAN 271:2
verse:
. Wɔkyerɛ hɛn Ewuradze dɔ, 
Wɔkyerɛ hɛn N'asɛm kenkan,
Wɔkyerɛ hɛn ɔsor do kwan:
Yi ntsi yeyi Nyame ayɛw.
title: John Henley, 1800-1842.

name: CAN 272:1
verse:
. JESUS brɛfo a edwe,
Kyea W'enyi hwɛ W'abofra;
Hu mo botooyɛ mbɔbɔr,
Ma me kwan membra Wo hɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 272:2
verse:
. Mepɛ dɛ wɔdze m' brɛ Wo;
Adom Wura, mma nnsiw kwan,
Ma W'abɔtoaba yi kwan,
Wɔ W'adom ahenman n' mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 272:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 273:1
verse:
. EWIMBER som ekyir,
Asɔrfi sunkamm no m'
Krɔnkrɔn 'daka n'enyim
Kanea n' ayɛ munsumm,
Awerɛfir mu ara na
Nyame Ne ndze ɔgyegyee hɔ.
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.

name: CAN 273:2
verse:
. Nna akɔdaa brɛfo,
Israel sɔfo n' ada;
Levinyi kakraba n'
Roweɔn asɔrfi m' hɔ:
Na dza ohuntaa Eli no,
Ewuradze yii kyerɛ Hannah ba n'.
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.

name: CAN 273:3
verse:
. O Ewuradze, ma me
Samuel asomkyɛn a
No mu yɛ har, ɔtse
W'ano wasa biara;
Emi so m'bɛgye Wo frɛ do,
Na m'bedzi kan metse Ɔwo.
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.

name: CAN 273:4
verse:
. O ma m' Samuel akoma,
Akoma brɛfo a ɔtweɔn 
W'asɔrfi mbrɛ ewɔ mu
Anaa ɔweɔn W'abow;
Adzekyee na adzesaa akoma a
Otsin Wo pɛ do dzi dwuma.
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.

name: CAN 274:1
verse:
. Dza ɔyɛ fɛw na ɔhyerɛn, 
Abɔdze nyinara,
'Nyansadze na anwanwadze,
Nyame yɛɛ ne nyina.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 274:2
verse:
. N-hyiren biara a ɔpae, 
Nyame maa n' ahoɔfɛw;
Anomaba a ɔtow ndwom,
Nyame yɛɛ ne ntɛkyerɛ.
Dza ɔyɛ fɛw—
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 274:3
verse:
. Bepɔw a osi habanm', 
'Sutsen a ɔda ho,
N-woraba na bosoom,
Adzekyee na adzesaa.
Dza ɔyɛ fɛw—
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 274:4
verse:
. N-su a ɔtɔ esusow, 
Ewia a ɔpae pɛber,
N-duaba a ɔsow ndua do,
Na hamu edziban.
Dza ɔyɛ fɛw—
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 275:1
verse:
. Modɔ dɛ metse nsɛm a 
Abɔfo ndze ka no,
Dɛ enyimnyam Hen n' mber bi
Ɔbɛtsenaa asaase do.
Bɔnyɛnyi a meyɛ mberɛw so,
Na 'yi minyim petee
Dɛ, Ewuradze bae bɛgyee m' nkwa.
Osiandɛ ɔdɔ m' kɛse.
title: Emily Huntington Miller, 1833-1913.

name: CAN 275:2
verse:
. M' Agyenkwa siarfo bɛyɛɛ 
Abɔdomaba dɛ emi,
Ma ɔaakyerɛ No nkɔkowaba
Krɔnkrɔnyɛ mu akwan;
Na sɛ mobɔ ho mbɔdzen
Tsiatsia N' anamɔnm' a,
Ɔnnkɔtow m' akyen ara da
Osiandɛ ɔdɔ m'kɛse.
title: Emily Huntington Miller, 1833-1913.

name: CAN 276:1
verse:
. Ka Jesus ho n-sɛm kyerɛ m', 
Mepɛ metsie;
Ndzɛmba a nkyɛ mibebisa No,
Sɛ ɔwɔ ha a:
Ɔkwan nkyɛn ndzɛmba,
Epo do nsɛm,
Jesus No ho nsɛm,
Ka kyerɛ me.
title: William Henry Baker, 1845-1929.

name: CAN 276:2
verse:
. Ma mindzi kan ntse mbrɛ mbofra 
Kɔbɔɔ N' aprɔw;
Na emi so me nsa bɛka
Ne nhyira n' bi.
Ayamuyie kasa,
Adom ndzeyɛɛ,
Dze ɔdɔ hyerɛɛn
Jesus N' enyim.
title: William Henry Baker, 1845-1929.

name: CAN 277:1
verse:
. David ahenkurowm' prɛko bi, 
Nantwibuw tantan bi mu,
Ɔbaatan dedaa ne ba bi
Wɔ mbowa dzidzidaka mu.
Mary nye ɔbaatan pa n',
Jesus Christ ɔnye ne Ba n'.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 277:2
verse:
. Nyame, adze nyina Wura, 
Fi sor siaan asaase do;
M-bowadan ɔnye No dɔbea,
Ne dabew nye mpɔnkɔbuw,
Hɛn Agyenkwa Krɔnkrɔnnyi
Ɔnye abɔbɔfo tsenaa ase.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 277:3
verse:
. No mbofraber nwanwa nyina 
Ɔyɛɛ enyidzi na setsie;
Ɔdɔe, ɔweɔn ne na brɛfo a
Ɔdaa n' abaw mu foo n' yie.
Christian mbofra nyɛ setsie,
Wɔndwe, nyɛ pa dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛe.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 277:4
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: CAN 278:1
verse:
. Akɔkowaba Jesus ennya adasoe; 
Wɔdedaa N' wɔ mbowa edzidzidaka mu.
N-woraba fi sorsor hyerɛɛn mbrɛ ɔda no,
Nna Jesus ada komm wɔ efuw no do.
title: Anonymous

name: CAN 278:2
verse:
. Anantwi no sui na Ɔba no nyanee, 
Naaso, hwɛ, oennsu, na mbom ɔdaa hɔ komm.
O Jesus, modɔ Wo; fi sor hwɛ mo do,
Tsena me nkyɛn araa kodu adzekyee.
title: Anonymous

name: CAN 279:1
verse:
. Sɛ meba Jesus hɔ a,
Mo hom bɔtɔ mo ho;
Sɛ mo werɛ how a
Ɔbɛkyekye m' werɛ.

       Sɛ meba Jesus hɔ a,
       Ahomka bɛka m';
       Oegum' arà refrɛ
       Mbofra tse dɛ emi.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 279:2
verse:
. Sɛ meba Jesus hɔ a,
Obetsie m' asɔr,
Ɔbɔdɔ m' ampaara,
Owui maa mo bɔn.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 279:3
verse:
. Sɛ meba Jesus hɔ a,
Obosuo me nsam',
Obogum' ara egya me
Akɔ man papam'.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 280:1
verse:
. Mepɛ mesũa Jesus:
Ɔyέ ayamuyie;
Obowui agye m' nkwa,
Wɔbɔɔ N' mbeamuduam'.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 280:2
verse:
. Sɛ mokɔ Jesus hɔ a,
Obetsie m' asɔr,
Ɔbɛma mo hὸ atsew,
Ɔdze m' bɔn bɛkyɛ m'.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 280:3
verse:
. Mobɔdwen Jesus ho:
Ɔyɛ dɔ dodow
Ɔtse N' ahenguam hɔ,
Ɔhwɛ m' ase ha.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 280:4
verse:
. Sɛ mo werɛ twer Jesus,
Sɛ meyɛ Ne pέ a,
Nna m' ahom bɛka m' ho,
Biribiara nnkɛyɛ m'.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 281:1
verse:
. Daa daa nyina yɛtonton Wo, 
Ber a adze akye bio,
Yebu ntwɛr wɔ fie hyira Wo,
Wɔ adzekyeem' adom ho.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 281:2
verse:
. Daa daa nyina yɛtonton Wo, 
Ber a yeetu hɛn ndwom wɔ skuul,
Dabaa yɛdze W' ayɛyi hyɛ
Dwumadzi ase, yɛdze wie.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 281:3
verse:
. Daa daa nyina yɛtonton Wo, 
Wɔ hɛn ndwomm' ana yɛada;
Abɔfo tsie, wɔweɔn hɛn,
Christ no nguambaa anago nyina.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 281:4
verse:
. Daa daa nyina yɛtonton Wo, 
Nnyɛ ayɛyi nsɛm mu nko;
Nokwardzi na setsie mu so
Yɛkyerɛ Woara W' enyimnyam.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 281:5
verse:
. Daa daa nyina yɛtonton Wo, 
Dɛ ɔnam Jesus ara ntsi
Yɛdze abotar sɔw mfom nyina,
Na yeku ɔbɔn biara.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 282:1
title: Henry James Buckoll, 1803-71.

name: CAN 282:2
verse:
. W' ehumbɔbɔr ho yɛsɔr Wo, 
Edze dom hɛn kwan nyinam',
Nyame yetwa hwe W' enyim bio
Ma hɛn edwuma nkɔ do daa
Ma hɛn sunsum
Na adwen nnya W' akyɛdze pa.
title: Henry James Buckoll, 1803-71.

name: CAN 282:3
verse:
. Ma fidua mu enuadɔ ntsim 
Akoma biara mu daa,
No tum nkyerɛkyerɛ hɛn ma
Yenyi pɛsɛankonya akwa
Ndu dɛ Wo mba
Bohu dɛ hɔn Egya nye W'.
    
       Mpaamudzi
title: Henry James Buckoll, 1803-71.

name: CAN 282:4
title: Henry James Buckoll, 1803-71.

name: CAN 282:5
verse:
. Ma Wo Sunsum pa no nkenyan 
Ndzepa biara a yeenya n' ha,
Na dza ndzebɔn dze na nyina nsɛɛ,
Fa Wo tum kɛse n' siw ano,
Na yɛmper daa
Nnya nyimdzee na dɔ mapa.
title: Henry James Buckoll, 1803-71.

name: CAN 282:6
title: Henry James Buckoll, 1803-71.

name: CAN 283:1
verse:
. Nyame dɔyɛfo a W'ehumbɔbɔr 
Dom hɛn fie kan na enuadɔ,
Fa hɛn nguankuw gu W' abaw mu,
Dɛ mbrɛ eyɛɛ n' tsetsebaado n'.
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1809-94.

name: CAN 283:2
verse:
. N-dze a yɛdze tow ndwom yɛserew, 
Ma hɛn fie yɛ enyigye yi,
Yɛdze tow ndwom yi Wo ayɛw a,
Aso, Ewuradze, innketsie hɛn?
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1809-94.

name: CAN 283:3
verse:
. Ɔbram' nhyira na awerɛhow ntsi, 
Enyigye a wɔtse ase n-tsi,
Nye hɔn a woewu nyina ntsi,
Yɛda W' ase, hɛn Egya pa.
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1809-94.

name: CAN 283:4
verse:
. Hɛn mber pam' dɛw a etwam' ntsi, 
Enyigye a yɛwɔm' sesei ntsi,
Hɛn bra n' ewimbir mu kan ntsi,
Yɛda W' ase hɛn Egya pa.
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1809-94.

name: CAN 284:1
verse:
. Ahomka fi nye mbrɛ wɔdɔ wo kɛse, 
'Wo, Nyɛnko pa, adasa Agyenkwa,
Na wɔdze Wo tsena mpanyin tsenabea
Wɔ ahɔho a wɔba hɔ nyina mu.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: CAN 284:2
verse:
. Ahomka fi nye mbrɛ beenu abɔ mu 
Ayɛ kor gyedzi na enyidar mu,
Ma owu nkotoo na otum paa hɔn mu,
Na ɔno mpo nntum nnsɛɛ koryɛ n' koraa.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: CAN 284:3
verse:
. Ahomka fi nye bea a wɔdze no mu mba 
Hyɛ Wo nsa wɔ gyedzi nye mpaabɔ mu,
Na Ɔwo, hɔn Damfo, ifi sor weɔn hɔn,
Na ehwɛ hɔn do kyɛn mbrɛ na bɔhwɛ.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: CAN 284:4
verse:
. Ahomka fi nye mbrɛ obiara som Wo 
Ahobrɛadze mu wɔ no dwumadzim',
Dze kodu dɛ fam' dwuma nyina ho tsew,
Dɛ wɔdze rema Wo, Ewuradze.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: CAN 284:5
verse:
. Ahomka fi nye beebi a werɛ mmfir Wo 
Ber a enyigye na dɛw abor do;
Ahomka fim' na wɔdze sunsum pirafo
Brɛ Wo, Duyɛfo, Werɛkyekyefo.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: CAN 285:1
verse:
. Nyame hɛn mboa mber a ɔasen, 
Hɛn ndaamba enyidar,
Hɛn sumabew wɔ ehumtu ber,
Hɛn domankoma fi.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 285:2
verse:
. W' ahengua no no nwim ase 
Na yɛbɛda ho ahyɛ;
W' abaw no nko mpo ɔdɔɔ so,
Obotwitwa agye hɛn.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 285:3
verse:
. Ansaana wɔreyɛ nkokwaa, 
Mbrɛ Wonnyae mmbɔɔ wiadze
Ofi tsetse eyɛ Nyame,
Eyɛ so afebɔɔ.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 285:4
verse:
. M-fe apem yɛ W' enyi do 
Dɛ da kor a ɔasen,
Ɔyɛ tsia dɛ anago sum
Na anapa kan ehyiae.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 285:5
verse:
. Adasamba a wɔtse wiadze 
Na hɔn dadwen nyina,
Ɔnnkyɛr biara na wɔapem kɔ,
Wɔayew hɛn enyi do.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 285:6
verse:
. M-ber soa ne mba nyina kɔ 
Dɛ esu a ɔrepem;
Wɔhera dɛ mbrɛ adaaso hera
Ber a adze rekye.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: CAN 286:1
verse:
. Nyame ngye hɛn Hen pa, 
Hɛn Hen kunyin nnyin nkyɛr,
Nyame ngye Ɔhen!
Ɔmma n' konyimdzi daa,
Ahomka nye enyimnyam,
Ma ɔnhwɛ ɔman do nkyɛr;
Nyame ngye Ɔhen!
title: Attri, to Henry Carey, d. 1743.

name: CAN 287:1
verse:
. Amansuon Twerammpon,
Yesu bɔ Wo ewuo,
Dɛ tsie Wo mba abɔn,
Hwɛ hɛn do dwudwoodwo.

      Nyame, ma Ghana Mbew ngyina,
      Nhyira nka no mu mba nyina.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 287:2
verse:
. Ao, dom hɛn President
Ɔsor tum na nyansa,
Ama n' aber yi do
Nsiesie aakã hɛn nsa.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 287:3
verse:
. Nyame, apam Wura,
Pam hɛn man mu apamfo;
Ma Woho do, kora
Wo mba anokwafo.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 287:4
verse:
. Edwumayɛfo pà a
Wɔdwen na wɔhwɛ kan,
Ewuradze, ma daa
Wɔnsoɛr wɔnhwɛ hɛn man.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 288:1
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 288:2
verse:
. Yɛtotɔ sѐrɛ Wo amandwee
Ɔnye Wo ho nyimdzee daa so;
Ma yie nyina mu yɛnnkɛyɛ hwee
Atwe hɛn man yi do mbusu.
Ber a ndzepà abɛn n',
Ɔdɔ Nyame, bɛn hɛn,
Egya, hu hɛn mbɔbɔr;
Yehia gyedzi no dɔr.
Adom Wura, tsie hɛn asɔr.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 288:3
verse:
. Aman Wura, Tsetse Tumfo,
'Wo nye hɛn Enyindado Sekyɛ!
Egyanom mpanyin hɔn Boafo
Dza yɛafom do nyina fakyɛ.
Dzi Wo tum daa wɔ ha,
Mma nnto hɛn seraha.
Dom hɛn mbanyinndam
Wɔ krɔnkrɔnyɛ nyinam'.
Na dzi hen wɔ hɛn akomam'.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 288:4
verse:
. Asomdwee Hen, bɔ ndze yie ma
Amankofo ngu ndadze fam'!
Fa koryɛ na ɔdɔ homa
Twe wiadze nyina bra W' afam'.
Nyame, mber nyɛ ntsɛm mbra
Ma wiadzem' amambra
N-yɛ Wo nko Wodze,
N' amambu na tumdzi,
M-fata Wo sor ahendzi.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 289:1
verse:
. NYAME Egya Tumfo,
Tsetse mpanyin Boafo
Na Guandɔbea!
Kyea W' enyi hwɛ hɛn m an,
Ao, yɛ n' dɛ W' ahenman,
Yie nyinara fa ma n';
Hɛn awobeà a!
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 289:2
verse:
. Abɔ hɛn man ne tsir
Sika pa abɔtsir
Enyimnyam mu;
Na mbrɛ Woara esi
Ehyira hɛn asaase,
Aman nntum nntse ase;
Ntonton nkã Wo.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 289:3
verse:
. Egyapadze bɛn nye
Hɛn siar awobea yi!
Ahomka man!
No mu ndzepà a wɔnntɔ,
N' amandzwee, n' ahotɔ,
Ofir, Nyame, Wo dɔ
Dadaada no.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 289:4
verse:
. Egyanom fὸna piigyan n'
Aso ɔbɛyɛ gyan?
Dabiarada!
Hɛn man ne yieyɛ ntsi
Atseetsee mpo Wɔanntse;
Wɔpɛ hɛn yie; dɛm ntsi
Yɛkaa hɔn daa.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 289:5
verse:
. Nyame, nsiesie Pɛfo
Na asomdwee Mafo,
Yɛ hɛn Fapem.
Sɛɛ mansotwe akɔndɔ;
Ma nsisi nyina nkɔ;
Fa koryɛ, amandɔ
Dom hɛn daapem.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 291:1
verse:
. AWERƐKYEKYER Nyankopɔn,
Gye nyim no yɛ Wodze;
Woara Wodze na yɛdze ma W'
Wɔ daa ayɛyi mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 291:2
verse:
. Yɛnam Woara Wo mu yɛbae,
Hɛn akoma yɛ kor;
O Jesus, yehyiaa Wo dzin mu,
Yɛpaam' so Wo dzin mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 291:3
verse:
. Yɛpaam' honamm', nnyɛ sunsum mu,
Na hɛn adwen si kor;
Hɛn nyina yɛfam Jesus hὸ a,
Hɛn nsa bɛda nsam' daa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 291:4
verse:
. Hɛn sunsum nyinaa yέ adze kor,
Wɔpaa hɛnm' à ɔnnkɛyɛ;
Nkokwaa bɔsoɛr, epo bɛpram,
Worunntum mmpaa hɛn mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 291:5
verse:
. Hɛn nkwa wɔ Christ hɔ wɔ Nyamem';
Hɛn Nkwa befir edze ntsɛm,
Na oeyi N' enyimnyam akyѐrɛ
Wɔ Ne mfɛwbam' wɔ ha.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 291:6
verse:
. Hɛn sunsum wɔ No tum n-sam',
Ɔdze hɛn besie daa;
Na menye wo yɛnye N' begyina
zion koko no do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 291:7
verse:
. Hɛn enyi bohu No wɔ hɔ,
Yɛbɛhyѐrɛn dɛ Ɔno:
Ahotsewfo nye abɔfo hyia a,
O 'bɛn enyimnyam nye 'i!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 291:8
verse:
. O, n-hyiamu no bɛyɛ dɛw!
Yɛbɛhyɛ ntar fitaa,
Yebenyinam menankɔnson
Na yɛasoa ahenkyɛw.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 291:9
verse:
. Nna hom mbɔ mbɔdzen ma yɛnko,
Yɛnko ntsew mu nkɔ sor;
Hɛn adwen ngyinà ewiei no do,
Hɛn enyi ntsim botae n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 292:1
verse:
. ƆDƆFO, yɛma w' "Nantseyie!"
Nyame nkora wo nkodu fie,
Ongya w' nkɔ w' akwantu n' ewiei
Sɔkyee na komm.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 292:2
verse:
. Nyame N' enyimpa nkã wo do,
Ɔmboa w' akwan nyinara mu,
Ɔnweɔn wo yie ara nkodu
Da a yebehyiam'.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 292:3
verse:
. Kaansa hɛn honam ridzi mpaa
Ma yennkohu w' enyim mpo a,
Yebehyiam' wɔ Nyame mu daa
Dɛ yɛnnkɛpaam'.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 293:1
verse:
. Krɔnkrɔn Nyame a w' enyim 
Atantandze remmba,
Naaso edze mbɔbɔrhu
Ehwɛ bɔn wiadze yi;
Ma hɛn akɔndɔ pa ma
Yembubu bɔn mpokyerɛm',
Ma hɛn Christ mbɔbɔrhu ma
Yɛmpɛ hɔn a wɔayew.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: CAN 293:2
verse:
. Hɛn tamfo n' yɛ nyitsewfo; 
No dɔm so ho yɛ hu
Ɔdze mbusu piinara
Sɛɛ hɛn asaase pa;
Hɔn a wɔko tsia hɔn no
Wɔ ɔko dzendzen no mu n',
Wɔ dɛ wɔyɛ dzen mbordo
Wɔ Christ akodze mu.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: CAN 293:3
verse:
. 'Wo na ayɛ wɔ hɛn mu 
Ndwuma akɛse a yehu 'i,
Yɛda W' ase dza ayɛ,
Ɔnye dza ebɛyɛ;
Yɛda W' ase wɔ enyidar
A ɔhyɛ hɛn nsa dzen,
Ma yɛper hwehwɛ nhyira a
Ɔkyɛn dza hɛn nsa aka.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: CAN 294:1
verse:
. Dza yɛdze ma W' biara, 
Hɛn Wura, Woara Wodze a;
Dza yɛwɔ nyina yɛ Wodze:
Edze maa hɛn esie.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: CAN 294:2
verse:
. Ma yɛngye W' akyɛdze 
Dɛ ahwɛdofo pa,
Dɛ mbrɛ ihyira hɛn n', yɛmfa dɛw,
Mfa hɛn ndɔbaa mbrɛ Wo.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: CAN 294:3
verse:
. 'Koma pii abobɔ, 
Hia wɔ efi pii mu,
Na nguambaa pii a Guanhwɛfo n'
Wui maa hɔn n' atɔ gon.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: CAN 294:4
verse:
. Ebɛkyekye werɛ, 
'Behyira abɔbɔfo,
Bɔhwehwɛ ankonam nye ngyanka,
Iyi nye nyamesom.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: CAN 294:5
verse:
. Ebɛgye adaduafo, 
'Dze abɔn bɛbrɛ Nyame,
'Bɛkyerɛ nkwa na asomdwee kwan n',
Yɛ Christianyɛ ampa.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: CAN 295:1
verse:
. Christ, W' enyimnyam hyɛ wim' ma, 
Christ, Wo nko nye nokwar kan,
Ndzeyɛtsenenee Ewia, pue,
Hyɛ anago sum nyina do;
Sor Adzekyee, bra me nkyɛn
Hyerɛn m' akomam', yɛ hɔ kann.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 295:2
verse:
. Annka adzekyee ho ammba a, 
Nna da n' nyina ayɛ awerɛhow;
Metse sum nye mbusu mu,
Kɛpem dɛ W' ehumbɔbɔr
Hyerɛn dze dɛw hyɛ mo mu,
Na ɔbɔ m' akoma mu hyew.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 296:1
verse:
. Me kra, yɛ ntsɛm nye ewia nnyan 
N-si mu ntu wo daadaa kwan;
Sun akwadwer to nkyɛn na soɛr
Fa dɛw bɔ w' anapa afɔr.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: CAN 296:2
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: CAN 296:3
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: CAN 296:4
verse:
. Me kra, nyan na ma woho do, 
Fa woho bɔ abɔfo ho,
Na hɔndze, anago nyina
Wɔtow ndwom ma Ɔsor Hen daa.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: CAN 296:5
verse:
.	Ayɛyi nka W', Ɔwo a esie m' 
Na ama m' ahomgye a ɔwɔ ndam':
Sɛ mifi wum' so minyan a
Ma mo so me nsa nka daa nkwa.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: CAN 296:6
verse:
. Mobɔ W' anohoba fofor: 
Ma mo bɔn ntwamm' dɛ bɔsu nkɔ,
Woara weɔn m' adwen nsunyiwa,
Fa Wo Sunsum hyɛ me kra ma.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: CAN 296:7
verse:
. M' adwen, me nsɛm, nye me ndeyɛɛ- 
Woara dzi ne nyina do ndɛ,
Na dza mowɔ na dza mutum
Nyina aabɔm' wɔ Wo nkamfom'.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: CAN 297:1
verse:
. ADZEKYEE kan
Ama menyan,
Na mefi me nda mu;
M' Egya, minyim
Dɛ Wo dɔ nko
Na ɔkὸra W' abofra.
title: Thomas Osmand Summers, 1812-82.

name: CAN 297:2
verse:
. N-dɛ da yi,
Meserɛ Wo,
Gya me, yɛ mo Hwɛfo;
Yi mo bɔn kɔ,
Jesus siarfo,
Na ma mentsѐna Wo nkyɛn.
title: Thomas Osmand Summers, 1812-82.

name: CAN 298:1
verse:
. Bra ntsɛm, O hɛn Wùra, pa Jesus,
Ansaana adze akye,
Yenyan a ma yenhu W' enyim
Anapa yέ Ewia ma hɛn.
title: Walter Hawkins.

name: CAN 298:2
verse:
. Bɛn hɛn O hɛn Wùra pa Jesus,
Na yeennsuro ara da;
Ewiaber mu hyew kã hɛn a,
Yɛsѐrɛ Wo dɛ yɛ hɛn Nwin.
title: Walter Hawkins.

name: CAN 299:1
verse:
. ADZЀ akye O!
Da fofor yi
Dze enyigye frɛ me dɛ
Monsoɛr m-fi me mpa do.
title: Alfred H. Vine, 1845-1917.

name: CAN 299:2
verse:
. Adzekyee
Pa a ɔtse dɛm
Nn-kyee wɔ wiadze ha pɛn 
Da fɛɛfɛw yi yɛ sὸronko.
title: Alfred H. Vine, 1845-1917.

name: CAN 299:3
verse:
. Adzekyee
Pii bɛba bio;
Na wim' a ɔatsew kann yi
Ɔnnkɛyɛ dɛmara bio.
title: Alfred H. Vine, 1845-1917.

name: CAN 300:1
verse:
. Gyefo, hyira hɛn ana yɛakɔ;
Fa Wasɛm hyɛ hɛn adwen mu;
Fa dɔ, mbrɛhoadze, nye pε pa
Bɔ hɛn akoma nwin yi hyew.
O Jesus brɛfo, yɛserɛ dɛ
Nkwa mu o, owu mu o, yɛ hɛn
Kan.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 300:2
verse:
. Adze asa, no mu mber etwam',
Konyim kakra a adom edzi,
Hɛn esintɔ, hɛn asehwe,
Ebu ne nyina ho nkontaa.
O Jesus brɛfo, yɛserɛ dɛ
Nkwa mu o, owu mu o, yɛ hɛn
Kan.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 300:3
verse:
. Ewuradze, dom hɛn ahosan
Fi akwan bɔn nyinara mu;
Dom hɛn krɔnkrɔnyɛ nye
asomdwee
Ma ɔnkyɛn mber a abɛsen.
O Jesus brɛfo, yɛserɛ dɛ
Nkwa mu o, owu mu o, yɛ hɛn
Kan.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 300:4
verse:
. Nnyɛ fakyɛ nko bi na yɛserɛ,
Dom hɛn Wo suro nye fahodzi,
Nye akoma a dɔ ahyɛ no ma,
Na ɔpε dε ɔnye Wo sε.
O Jesus brɛfo, yɛserɛ dɛ
Nkwa mu o, owu mu o, yɛ hɛn
Kan.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 301:1
verse:
. Anapawi hyɛnhyɛnn n' etwam' 
Ɔahwer ne hyɛnhyɛnn nyina ntsɛm
Adzesaa no sunsuma retsen
Prɛko so bio.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: CAN 301:2
verse:
. Hɛn nkwa tse dɛ ɔpɛber da 
N' enyimnyam wi n' twam' ntsɛmara
Gya hɛn, O Christ, 'Wo a eyɛ nkwa,
Kodu fie sɔnn.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: CAN 301:3
verse:
. Fa W' adom a ɔhyɛ kra nkuran n' 
Twe hɛn 'koma kɔ sor man ho;
Boa hɛn ma yɛmfa hɛn enyi
Ntsim sor man n' do.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: CAN 301:4
verse:
. Mbrɛ kan na dɛw na asomdwee 
Bɔ mu yɛ kor dzi hen wɔ hɔ n',
Nna sor abɔfo nngyaa hɔn ndwom
Tow ara da n'.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: CAN 302:1
verse:
. Gyefo dɔfo, me kra n' ewia, 
Ɔwo 'bɛn a, adze nnsa da;
O mma mununkum biara mmfi fam'
Nn-suma W' mmfi W' akowaa enyiwam'!
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 302:2
verse:
. Ber a enyikom aka me 
Dɛ bɔsu a ogu asaase do,
N-da refa m' a, m' adwen nyɛ
Dɛ Christ bom' nda n' ɔbɛyɛ dɛw!
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 302:3
verse:
. Bra begya m' kwan fi ahema, 
Na innyi hɔ a, munntum mmbɔ bra;
Adze sa so a nye me bɛtsena:
Musuro owu sɛ innyi hɔ a.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 302:4
verse:
. Wo ba bi a ɔafom kwan wɔ hɔ a 
N-dɛ so oetsia W' asɛm do a,
Adom dwuma n' nhyɛ ase ber yim';
Mma ɔnnda ho ara nnda bɔn mu.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 302:5
verse:
. Hwɛ ayarfo do; ma ehiafo 
Nhyira a ofi W' adom mbordo;
Hɔn a awerɛhow atɔ hɔn do,
Wɔnda dɛ mbɔtoaba berɛww.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: CAN 303:1
verse:
. Adze resa ampa 
Ewimbir aba,
Na enyimkan rudum,
Ma wim' reyɛ sum.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: CAN 303:2
verse:
. Isum rehyɛ ampa, 
Nworaba rupuepue,
Nnoma, mbowa nye nhyiren
Bɛdeda sesei.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: CAN 303:3
verse:
. Jesus, fa Wo nsa to 
Hɔn a wɔaberɛ do;
Na fa Wo nhyira pa
Dom hɔn ma wɔnda.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: CAN 303:4
verse:
. Dom mbofra nkakraba 
Ma wonhu Wo daa;
Hɔn a wɔwɔ po do,
Woara hwɛ hɔn do.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: CAN 303:5
verse:
. Hɔn so a wonntum nnda, 
Hyɛ hɔn dzen daa daa;
Hɔn a wɔdwendwen bɔn,
Dan hɔn na twe hɔn.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: CAN 303:6
verse:
. W' abɔfo mpa m' mbusu 
Anago yi mu,
Wɔmfa hɔn atsaban
M-bɔ mo ho ban.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: CAN 303:7
verse:
. Ao, fa mo bɔn kyɛ me, 
Na ma adze nkye me
Dɛ m' akoma mu tsen
Na mo ho yɛ dzen.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: CAN 304:1
verse:
. Ansaana m' bɛda n', yie biara 
Me Nyame
Ayɛ m' ndɛ,
M' bɛda m' Agyenkwa ase.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: CAN 304:2
verse:
. Mo Wura, memfa ndaase bɛn mma 
Wo dzin a
Ɔnnsesa n'
Mbɔbɔrhufo, dɔfo?
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: CAN 304:3
verse:
. M' ekyinkyin nyinam' 'Wo na 'gya m' 
Wɔ Wo kwanm',
Tsiee m' asɔr,
Saan me nyɛe nyina ho.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: CAN 304:4
verse:
. Mma nndan me nngya na dɔ me daa; 
W' Asomdwee
Nyɛ me nhyira,
Nkodu dɛ 'beyi me ha.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: CAN 304:5
verse:
. Mo botan, mo weɔmfo, m' aban, 
Kora m' sɔnn,
Ber a mada,
Fa Wo tum nyinara.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: CAN 305:1
verse:
. Enye me ntsena! onwim ano rotɔ; 
Sum regye, Ewuradze, nye me ntsena!
Aboafo pa, na akyekyewerɛfo sa a,
Onnyibi-ne-bi-a-ɔba, enye m' ntsena!
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: CAN 305:2
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: CAN 305:3
verse:
. Mihia Wo me nkyɛn aber nyinara, 
W' adom n-ko na ɔka siamfo hyɛ;
Gyafo nye Taafo wɔ hen ka Wo ho?
Isum o, ekan o, enye me ntsena.
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: CAN 305:4
verse:
. Sɛ menye Wo nam a, munnsuro hwee; 
Ɔyaw nnyɛ durdur, na nyinsu nnyɛ wen:
Owu, wo bɔr na wo konyim wɔ hen?
Mo konyim wɔ do daa, sɛ 'Wo nye m' tse a.
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: CAN 306:1
verse:
. Nyame a ebɔɔ sor nye asaase,
Nye kan na sum,
Ma yɛyɛ edwuma adzekyee,
Yɛda anago;
Ma sor abɔfo mbɔweɔn hɛn,
Dom hɛn n-da pa ma yɛnda,
Adaaso krɔnkrɔn mbra hɛn do,
Anago 'i nyina.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 306:2
verse:
. Weɔn hɛn kan mu; weɔn hɛn
sum mu;
Na sɛ yewu a,
Wo tum nsa no nkora hɛn nyina
Ma yɛnda komm.
Abɛn kese no nyan hɛn a,
Da no a, Ewuradze mma mmpa
hɛn,
Na fa hɛn kɔ W'enyimnyam mu
Yenkedzi dɛw.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 307:1
verse:
. Ewùradze, yɛrefrɛ Wo;
Nye hɛn ntsѐna, hɛn Hɔho pa,
Ber a ewia rokɔtɔ
Ma adzesaa so reba.
title: George R. Elliott.

name: CAN 307:2
verse:
. Hɔn a hɔn werɛ ahow,
Nye hɔn ntsѐna, hɔn Hɔho pa;
Fa W'asomdwee na Wo dɛw
Hyɛ hɔn akoma mu ma.
title: George R. Elliott.

name: CAN 307:3
verse:
. Boa akomà a oepira
Nà obiarà a ɔretseetsee n';
Tsѐna hɔn mu dɛ Hɔho pa,
Fa W'adom bɛhyɛ hɔn dzen.
title: George R. Elliott.

name: CAN 308:1
verse:
. EWÙRADZE, Nyame Otumfo,
Tsie Wo mba hɛn ayɛyi,
Ɔwὸ a eyɛ mbɔbɔrhufo,
Yɛ aso ma hɛn mpaayi;
Adom Hen, tsie hɛn asɔr,
Egya, hu Wo mba mbɔbɔr.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 308:2
verse:
. 'Wo a aweɔn hɛn enyimkan,
Weɔn hɛn anago yim' so.
Ma W' abɔfo mbɔ hɛn ho ban,
Wɔmpa hɛn sum mu mbusu;
Gye hɛn awerɛfir wum',
Sie hɛn honam nye sunsum.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 309:1
verse:
. Nhyira nka akomamutsewfo, 
Wobohu hɛn Nyame;
Nyame esumadze yɛ hɔndze
Hɛn kra yɛ Christ ne fi.
title: John Keble, w. 1,3, 1792-1866; William John Hall, vv. 2,4, 1793-1861.

name: CAN 309:2
verse:
. Ewuradze a ofii sor 
Brɛɛ hɛn nkwa na asomdwee,
Nye nyimpa bɛtsenaa botooyɛm',
Yɛɛ Fasusu na Hen-
title: John Keble, w. 1,3, 1792-1866; William John Hall, vv. 2,4, 1793-1861.

name: CAN 309:3
verse:
. Ɔda ho dze Noho 
Ma ɔkra brɛfo no;
Na ɔdze N' ahengua no ma
Akoma a no mu tsew.
title: John Keble, w. 1,3, 1792-1866; William John Hall, vv. 2,4, 1793-1861.

name: CAN 310:1
verse:
. Hom mbra ma yentu 
Hɛn kwan yi fofor
Yɛnye afe yi nkyin,
Na mma yenngyina kyerɛ hɛn Wura aba.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 310:2
verse:
. Hom ma yɛmfa dɛw 
Yɛnyɛ N' apɛdze,
Yɛmfa abotar
Na dɔ dwumadzi nsi hɛn adom no pi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 310:3
verse:
. Hɛn nkwa yɛ adaaso; 
Hɛn mber tse dɛ nsu a
Ɔrepem hwew hwew
Na mber kobɔnyi no nngyina ara pɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 310:4
verse:
. Wɔatow egyen no, 
M-ber no ɔkɔ;
Apem afe no
Ɔrobɔto hɛn, na onnyiewiei aba.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 310:5
verse:
. Ao, nkyɛ biara aaka 
Da a ɔbɛba n' dɛ,
Mako ɔko pa n'
Dwuma a edze maa me n' mewie ne nyina yɛ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 311:1
verse:
. HOM ntow Jehovah N'ayɛyi,
Nkamfo nyina dzi wɔ N';
Ɔno a ɔma hɛn nda mu war,
Hɛn ndwom pa no fata N'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 311:2
verse:
. Ɔahwɛ hɛn do dze hɛn etwa
Afe kor so no mu;
Hɛn nyina dzedze ndwom fofor
Befir Nyame N'enyim.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 311:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 311:4
verse:
. Hɛn ano na hɛn bra bɛka
Wo dɔ n'anwanwadze;
Yɛnam Jesus N'anamɔn mu
Bohu W'enyim wɔ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 312:1
verse:
. Yɛma hɛn akoma do tow, 
N-tonton ndwom ma W' Wura,
Yɛdze hɛn dɛw afɔr brɛ Wo
Wɔ dɛw esebɔm' ara;
Harban ahyehyɛ sika ntar
Mbepɔw dze dɛw rowosow
Mbɔnsam' ayɛ eburow ma
Ma hɔn so wɔrotow ndwom.
title: William Chatterton Dix, 1837-98.

name: CAN 312:2
verse:
. N-dɛ hɛn afahyɛ da yim', 
Yɛkaa Wo nsaano ayamuyie n',
Wo nhyira ndɔbaa-kan ndaase n',
Nna yɛdze gu W' enyim no
Adom akyɛdze soronko n'
Edze nyɛn hɛn nkorɔfo akra;
'Wo a 'ma hɛn asaase paanoo,
Ma hɛn onnyiewiei paanoo.
title: William Chatterton Dix, 1837-98.

name: CAN 312:3
verse:
. Yɛsɔw adzekyee yim' fona, 
Yɛberɛ hɛn dwumadzi mu;
Na wi tɔ a, edwuma sa,
Ma nyia ɔaberɛ n' nya ahomgye
Sɛ abɔfo buber n' wie a,
N-kyɛ ekyir n' yaafata
Christ sika efiefi no a
Wɔdze kɔ asan fɛɛfɛw do n'.
title: William Chatterton Dix, 1837-98.

name: CAN 313:1
verse:
. Nyew, Nyame ye- wɔ sor na ase 
Epo no bun mu na kwaa mu,
Ndze ɔpedu retsea mu dɛ
Nyame bɔɔ hɛn, na Nyame ye.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: CAN 313:2
verse:
. Ewia a ɔnam ne kyenan do, 
Na ɔtow ne nserɛmɛn gu ase ha,
Wimu anago dɔm hyɛnhyɛnn n' nyina
Tsea mu dɛ Nyame ye.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: CAN 313:3
verse:
. Nnoma dze dɛw gye ndwom no do, 
Wɔtow n' fofor afe biara,
Mframa pa a ɔbɔ na nyankom
Wɔsa berɛww dɛ Nyame ye.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: CAN 313:4
verse:
. Metse n' wɔ mframa a ɔrobɔm', 
Ɔnye tsetse mbepɔw no do,
Sor  a ɔpaapaam', po a ɔwor
Hɔn nyinaa gye do dɛ Nyame ye.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: CAN 313:5
verse:
. Nyew, Nyame ye, abɔdze ka 
Dɛ mbrɛ Nyame ama kasahom;
Nyimpa mfa ayɛyi mbordo
Ntow ndwom dɛw mu dɛ Nyame ye.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: CAN 314:1
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, fi Wo sor tsenabew do tsie hɛn: 
Dɛ tsetsemba n' hɛn so yɛfona kwa,
Gyesɛ Ɔwo a eyɛ Kan n' nye hɛn kɔ;
Bra, Ewuradze, ama yeehu W' enyim.
title: William Henry Gill, 1839-1923.

name: CAN 314:2
verse:
. Ewuradze 'Wo na 'dzi po a ɔwor do, 
Ber a oetutu ne tsir sgu do n':
W' abaw yɛ dzen, hɛn ahɛn yɛ mberɛw,
Kaa Galilee, na fa Wo mboa ma hɛn.
title: William Henry Gill, 1839-1923.

name: CAN 314:3
verse:
. Yɛdze hɛn fifo nyina hyɛ Wo nsa: 
Hɔn ntsi na yɛdɔw haban, yenu po,
Hɔn ntsi na dabaa yebu eburow pa,
Na 'nafua yebu pom' ndɔbaa fɛɛfɛw n'.
title: William Henry Gill, 1839-1923.

name: CAN 314:4
verse:
.	Yɛda W' ase na ewia, bɔsu, nyankom, 
Wo tum n-sa no dze fir sor petse;-
Nnoma, mbowa, nam, nhaban, aba, nye eburow:
N-kwa horow nyina Farbaa nye 'Wo.
title: William Henry Gill, 1839-1923.

name: CAN 314:5
verse:
. N-kwa Paanoo, aka n' W' asɛm mu dɛ: 
Nyia ɔfa Wo dzi gyedzim' n' onnkowu da!
Fa ehumbɔbɔr tsie Wo mba hɛn sufrɛ:
Ma hɛn ndɛ so hɛn daadaa edziban.
title: William Henry Gill, 1839-1923.

name: CAN 315:1
verse:
. Nyame, ndɔbaa Wura,
Yɛbɔtonton Wo;
Dza yɛwɔ nyinara
W' ehumbɔbɔr nko.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 315:2
verse:
. Nyame, ndɔbaa Wura,
W' ayamuyie dɔɔ so:
Dza 'dze ma nyinara,
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 315:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 316:1
verse:
. Amansuon, hom mbra,
Na ndɔbaa Wura
N' adom nwanwa no
Sɛ ndaase mbordo.
Hom mfa akasamù
Ne ndze mbɔ hom nsam',
Na hom mbɔ se dɛ,
Ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.

    Ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ
    Ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ,
    Ɔsormba mma do,
    Asempa ngye do;
    Mpanyin na mbofra
    Mbasia na mbarima,
    Hom mbɔ se nka dɛ,
    Ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 316:2
verse:
. Ewia wɔ hɔ yi,
Nyankom nngyaa tɔ yi,
Buber nnkɔbɔ hɛn,
Yebenya kyɛpɛn,
Hɛn anomu nnkofuw,
Hɛn atam nnkosuw,
Ma daa yaakã dɛ,
Ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 316:3
verse:
. Sɛ ɔbra bisiw
Ma enyi do siw,
Sɛ ɔpaa hɛn do,
Ɔkyer do, bam do,
Sɛ yɛkà a ɔmmba,
Sɛ yɛyέ a ɔnnyέ a,
Hɛn ndwom daa nye dɛ,
Ɔnnsõ Nyame yɛ.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 317:1
verse:
. ABƆDZE nyinara wɔmfa ndaase ndwom
Mbra ndɔbaa Wura, Twerammpon enyim;
Duaber nye buber ɔhyew nye awɔw
Ne nyinara fir Nyankopɔn Wo dɔ.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 317:2
verse:
. Dza yɛwɔ biara- sika nye dwɛɛtɛɛ,
Nyimpadua nye kra, -Nyankopɔn dze kyɛe,
Ntsi yɛdze ma N' bio dɛ afɔrbɔdzѐ a
Ɔsɔ n' enyi nwionn na ɔgye nhyira.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 317:3
verse:
. Hambὸwa nye tumbowa, nkakrabà, akɛse,
Hwɛ mbrɛ wɔrekyea dze reda ase!
Dasanyi nkotoo na mayɛ tsiafo;
Me kra, fà ahotɔ bɛkamfo Dɔfo.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 318:1
verse:
. MBЀRANTSƐ na mbabaawa, nkɔdaa na mberwa,
Hom mfa ehurusi ndwom nkamfo
Ɔkyɛso Nyame nno; N' adom nwanwa
Wɔ amanaman nyinara mu.

      Enyimnyam, ndaase, na ntonton sɛ
      Ɔkyɛso Nyame, Ɔbaatan pa;
      Nkɔkowaba ntow ndwom nhyira No dɛ:
      Ɔkyɛso Nyame N' ayamuyie mmpa.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 318:2
verse:
. Yensi dɛn ara nda Nyame ase?
Yensi dɛn nkã No dɔ ho asɛm?
Yɛbɔtow N' ayamùyie ho ndwom kɛse,
Yɛbɔtoa N' adɔyɛ ho atsɛn.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 318:3
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 318:4
verse:
. Ao, hwɛ hamu nkyɛkyɛr ɔnye ndupɔn,
Dza wɔnnto nsa, so wɔnnto anan,
Ɔkyɛso Nyame nsamu bue ma hɔn
Ma wonya hɔn daadaa edziban.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 318:5
verse:
. Ɔkyɛso Nyame, hɛn Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn
Mfir Ne siar ewia no nhyɛ hɛn dzen,
Ntɔ Ne nhyira nsu no nyɛ hɛn prɔmprɔm,
Ma akra nyina nkamfo Ne dzin.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 319:1
verse:
. Wondzi dɛw mma onua a oewu yi, 
No wu yi yɛ no mfaso kɛse,
Woeyi ne kra wɔ efiadze,
Woeyi no honam mpokyerɛ n' mu;
Wɔmma yɛmfa ndwom nka no do,
Yɛnye no sunsum mfow ɔsor,
Oefi nsa kɔ kan man no mu,
Ɔakɛtsena dɔ Eden no mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 319:2
verse:
. Hɛn nua edu ahɛndwirii hɔ, 
Ɔatsew ehum nye aahow no mu,
Tsiabaa yi ne nsa aka n' ahomgye,
Ɔadan n' afrɛ egya ekyir.
Hɔn wɔda ho da fona pom',
Reper edu siar mpoano hɔ,
Beebi mbrɛ asomdwee nko wɔ,
Na bɔn nye yaw nn-yi hɔ bio.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: CAN 320:1
verse:
. Ber a dwumadzi da asa n', 
Ber a bra 'mpiresi abɔ adze n!
Egya, dom Wo ba fonafo
Ahomgye afebɔɔ.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 320:2
verse:
. Ber a bɔn nkodzen abɔ adze n', 
Ber a woeku kra mu tamfo n',
W' adom asɛm no nhyɛ ma-
Asomdwee afebɔɔ.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 320:3
verse:
. Ber a sum no enya apa n' 
Ma enyim atsetsew no,
Ma yenhuahua dɛw kan no-
Kan ara afebɔɔ.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 320:4
verse:
. Ber a yaw atsɛ akoma 
Ma afei oegyaa tow no,
Fa hɛn kɔ mbrɛ nyinsu nnyi n',
Dɛw ara afebɔɔ.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 320:5
verse:
. Ber a yɛrodwen nda a yɛasɛɛ n' ho, 
Nda a ɔrennsan mmba bio n',
Wo dɔm' kyerɛkyerɛ ma yensua
Dɔ ara afebɔɔ.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 321:1
verse:
. Ɔsomfo yi apon ndɛ, 
Oewie ɔko pa no ko;
Afei ɔkwantunyi no
Edu esuegya noho: 

      Egya, yɛdze Wo ba a ɔada 
      Hyɛ W' abaatan dɔ n-sa n' mu.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 321:2
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 321:3
verse:
. Hɔ na Guanhwɛfo no dze 
Nguambaa no a wɔayew ba fie,
Ɔkora hɔn wɔ bea a
Pataku n' nnkotum aba:
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 321:4
verse:
. Hɔn a ɔasakyer wɔ ha, 
Na wɔhwɛ mbeamudua no n',
Wohu Jesus dɔ n' kɛse
Wɔ Ne nkyɛn wɔ Paradise:
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 321:5
verse:
. Hɔ na sum mu etumfo 
Nsa nnkɛka ara da;
Ewuradze Christ bɔweɔn hɔn,
Ɔno a owui gyee hɔn nkwa:
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: CAN 322:1
verse:
. Ber a mbusu abrɛ hɛn adze, 
Ber a hɛn nyinsu abor do;
Yerigyam dɔfo a ɔayew n',
Jesu, Mary Ba, tsie hɛn.
title: Henry Milman

name: CAN 322:2
verse:
. Ber a hɛn akoma ridzi yaw, 
Wɔ no bɔn ho adwen ntsi,
Ber a suro ekitsa hɛn n',
Jesu, Mary Ba, tsie hɛn.
title: Henry Milman

name: CAN 322:3
verse:
. 'Wo abyɛ hɛn honam yi bi. 
'Wo asoa hɛn yaw nyina,
'Wo esu dɛ nyimpa pɛn,
Jesu, Mary Ba, tsie hɛn.
title: Henry Milman

name: CAN 323:1
verse:
. Mbo na kõ, sordaanyi pa;
Gyedzi kõ no ewie kõ!
Sor ahenkyɛw a ɔmmpa
Nna Egya dze bɛma wo.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 323:2
verse:
. Hwɛ, edzikamfo dze dɛw,
Rihyia wo konyimdzi mu;
Hwɛ, wɔhyehyɛ ntar fɛɛfɛw,
Ruhuahua wo dɔ man n' mu.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 323:3
verse:
. Christ N' adaworom edzi
Tamfo owu do konyim;
Daadaa som mu eyiedzi
Nyɛ wodze Nyame N' enyim.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 324:1
verse:
. Da yie, dɔfo fonafo,
W' edwuma abɔ adze;
Ahomgye pa, siar mbordo
Na dɛw mapa nyɛ wodze.

          Da yie, da yie, Nyame mfa w' nsie,
          Adzesaa ahyɛ sum, da yie!
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 324:2
verse:
. Nyinsu bɔnsam' kwantunyi
Hom fi yaw na suro nsa,
Hom mbrɛ sũ na mbusu nnyi,
W' akwantu ber no asa.

          Da yie, da yie, Nyame mfa w' nsie,
          Adzesaa ahyɛ sum, da yie!
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 324:3
verse:
. Twer Jesu N' abaw mu komm,
Nyame dɔ nkata wo do;
Sun W' Agyenkwa No bom' sɔnn,
Mbrɛ bɔn biara nnkɛhaw wo.
         Da yie, da yie, Nyame mfa w' nsie,
         Yebehyiam' afebɔɔ, da yie!
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 325:1
verse:
. Menka dɛn wѐrɛhonyi?
Owu edzi m' emim,
Hwɛ, ɔayɛ m' kyirpaanyi
Na ɔama awɔw dze m'
'Patasu Christ e! suo mo mu
Na gye m' dɔfo n' kra dwudwoodwo.
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: CAN 325:2
verse:
. Menkã dɛn hɛll gyantsia?
Munnhu mo dɔfo n' bio
Henfa na ɔkɔ ara?
Saana ne mber asõ.
'Patasu Christ e! suo mo mu
Na gye m' dɔfo n' kra dwudwoodwo.
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: CAN 325:3
verse:
. Menkã dɛn ankonam?
Saana nyimpa nnsɛ hwee-
ɔnye hɛn edzi mpaam'
N' akwantu abɔ adze.
'Patasu Christ e! suo mo mu
Na gye m' dɔfo n' kra dwudwoodwo.
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: CAN 325:4
verse:
. Menkã dɛn enuanom?
Nyamesuronyi kɔ-
Tsema, ɔdwe, adom
Na dɔ, onyaa n' mbordo.
'Patasu Christ e! suo mo mu
Na gye m' dɔfo n' kra dwudwoodwo.
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: CAN 325:5
verse:
. Menka dɛn? mennka hwee,
Nyame ayɛ dza oye;
ɔbɛkyerɛ m' yi ase
Ndaamba wɔ N' ahemfie.
'Patasu Christ e! suo mo mu
Na gye m' dɔfo n' kra dwudwoodwo.
title: Rev. A.B. Dickson, 1892-1948.

name: CAN 327:1
verse:
. Wɔntow ehurusi ndwom no,
Hom ndwom a ɔyɛ dɛw no;
Hom werɛ mfir hom yaw nyina,
Na hom nhue hom ayɛyi
Mma nyia oegya hom aba ha
Nye mfɛfo ebehyia mu,
Hɔn a wɔakyerɛkyerɛ hɛn
Mbrɛ wodua kɔ Jesus hɔ.

     Wɔntow ndwom, wɔntow ndwom,
     Dɛw na enyigye ndwom no,
     Wɔntow ndwom, wɔntow ndwom,
     Ahomka afe ndwom no.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 327:2
verse:
. Binom dze ndwom nye mfrankaa baa
M-feda hɛn nhyiamu n' mù a,
Wɔrotow Hosanna ndɛ wɔ
Ɔsor mbrɛ abɔfo wɔ n';
Hɔ, Jesus N' enyimnyam mu hɔ,
Na wɔwɔ riyi N' ayɛw,
Nyame dɔ nsɛm dadaada n',
Ɔnye dza wɔtow no hɔ.
title: Unknown

name: CAN 328:1
verse:
. Ahosɛpɛw da ato hɛn,
Nyame N' adom no dɔɔ sõ daa;
Ɔama siar ayɛ hɛn kyɛpɛn,
Yɛbɔtonton No daa daa daa.

      Wonhur ndwom no, wɔmbɔm' kɛse,
      Ahosɛpɛw afe n' aba,
      Nyame Egya fata ndaase
      Yɛbɔtonton No daa daa daa.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 328:2
verse:
. Hɛn Wura Christ a nnsakyer da,
Twitwa gye hɛn Kwesida Skuul,
Kyerɛkyerɛ Wo mbofraba,
Wo a eyɛ Kwangyafo Kor.
title: Gaddiel R. Acquaah, 1884-1954.

name: CAN 336:1
verse:
. Ndaase, ndaase nka Ͻdᴐyɛfo
Ayɛyi, ayɛyi nka Twerammpon o!
Enyimnyam, enyimnyam nka hɛn Gyefo o!
title: Unknown

name: CAN 336:2
verse:
. Oeyi m' sum mu ekesi kan mu.
Ͻsabarimba Katakyi,
Yegya Wo ekyir a ɔnnyɛ o!
title: Unknown
